Amalungu weqembu eliyingxenye yesiko avamise ukubonakalisa ubulungu bawo ngokusebenzisa isitayela esihlukile nesimelela okuthile, esihlanganisa imfashini, ukuziphatha, kanye nendlela yokukhuluma.

UDuvall, otshatile enabantwana ababini abadala, akazange ashiye umbono omkhulu kuMiller, owayebaliselwe ibali.
Uthe ebuzwa izimvo zakhe, u-Miller uthe "u-Mark uthethe kakhulu engxoxweni…Bendizilungiselela ngoku andimvanga ukuba ebesithini."
UDuvall, oshadile nonezingane ezimbili ezindalaa, akazange ahlabe u-Miller umxhwele, lowo otshelwe indaba.
Lapho ecelwa ukuthi aphawule, u-Miller uthe, “U-Mike ukhuluma kakhulu phakathi nokuthethwa kwecala...bengizilungiselela ngakho angikuzwanga ayekusho.”
UDuvall, oshade nezingane ezimbili ezidala, akazange ashiye umbono omkhulu kuMiller, owayetshelwe indaba.

Uthe ebuzwa imibono yakhe, u-Miller uthe "u-Mark ukhulume kakhulu engxoxweni...Bengizilungiselela manje angimuzwanga ukuthi ebesithini."
UDuvall, oshade nezingane ezimbili esezikhulile, akazange ashiye umbono omkhulu kuMiller, owayedlalela indaba.
Ebuzwa ukuthi imibono yakhe, uMiller uthe "uMark ukhulume kakhulu engxoxweni.. Bengizilungiselela manje angizwanga ukuthi uthini".
UDuvall, oshadile enabantwana ababili abadala, akazange ashiye umbono omkhulu kuMiller, owayebaliselwe indaba.
Uthe ebuzwa imibono yakhe, u-Miller uthe "u-Mark ukhulume kakhulu engxoxweni…Bengizilungiselela manje angizwanga ukuthi ebesithini."
UDuvall, oshade nezingane ezimbili esezikhulile, akazange ashiye okuningi kuMiller, owayetshelwe lolu daba.
Ebuzwa ukuthi uphawule kanjani, uMiller uthe "uMark ubekhuluma kakhulu engxoxweni… bengizilungiselela manje angizwanga ukuthi uthini."
Owayesakuba nguSomlomo weNdlu uNewt Gingrich, irhuluneli yaseTexas uRick Perry, kunye noMongameli Congress Michele Bachmann bagqiba kwindawo yesine, yesihlanu, neyesithandathu ngokwahlukeneyo.
Emva kokuba iziphumo zingenile, uGingrich wayincoma iSantorum, kodwa wayenegama elinzima kuRomney, egameni lakhe izibhengezo ezimbi ezazisasazwa eIowa ngokuchasene neGingrich.

U-Perry uye wathi uza "kubuyela eTexas ukuze avavanye iziphumo ze-caucus yanamhlanje ebusuku, ukuze azibonele ukuba ingaba ikhona na indlela eya phambili kolu gqatso", kodwa kamva wathi uza kuhlala elugqatsweni aze akhuphisane ngoJanuwari 21 eSouth Carolina yamabanga aphantsi.
UBachmann, ophumelele i-Ames Straw Poll ngo-Agasti, wagqiba kwelokuba aliphelise iphulo lakhe.
Umkhulumeli Wendlu uNewt Gingrich, umbusi waseTexas uRick Perry, kanye nelungu lesishaya-mthetho lowesifazane uMichele Bachmann baqede endaweni yesine, yesihlanu, kanye neyesithupha, ngokulandelana.
Ngemva kokuba kufike imiphumela, uGingrich ubabaze uSantorum, kodwa wayenamazwi anzima kuRomney, lowo owenzelwa umkhankaso wezikhangiso ezimbi e-Iowa ngokumelene noGingrich.

U-Perry wathi waye"zobuyela e-Texas ukuyohlola imiphumela yekhokhasi yanamuhla ebusuku, nginqume ukuthi ingabe ikhona yini indlela ephambili yami kulo mjaho", kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wathi uzohlala emncintiswaneni futhi ancintisane ngoMasingana 21 e-South Carolina primary.
UBachmann, owawina Ukuvota kwe-Ames Straw ngo-Agasti, wanquma ukuqeda umkhankaso.
OwayenguSomlomo weNdlu Newt Gingrich, umbusi waseTexas uRick Perry, kanye noMongameli Congress Michele Bachmann baqeda endaweni yesine, yesihlanu, neyesithupha ngokulandelana.
Ngemuva kokungena kwemiphumela, uGingrich uncome iSantorum, kepha wayenegama elinzima kuRomney, egameni lakhe izikhangiso ezimbi ezazisatshalaliswa e-Iowa ngokumelene neGingrich.

UPerry uthe "uzobuyela eTexas ukuhlola imiphumela yekhokhasi yanamuhla ebusuku, ukubona ukuthi ikhona yini indlela ehamba phambili kulo mjaho", kodwa kamuva wathi uzohlala kulo mjaho ancintisane ngoJanuwari 21 esikoleni samabanga aphansi eSouth Carolina.
UBachmann, owine i-Ames Straw Poll ngo-Agasti, wanquma ukumisa umkhankaso wakhe.

Gingrich ungusihlalo wangaphambili we uNewt indlu, uRick yaseTexas governor Perry, Michele Bachmann kanye nomongameli We Congress futhi anqume endaweni yesine, yesihlanu, neyesithandathu ngokwehlukana.
Emva imiphumela wangena, iSantorum wayincoma uGingrich, kodwa kanzima kuRomney wayenegama, izimemezelo ezimbili egameni neGingrich yakhe basakaza ngokumelene iowa.

Abantu baseBhabhiloni bakhela uthixo wabo itempile eyayisaziwa njengekhaya lothixo wabo.
Abantu babeza kuzisa amadini koothixo kwaye ababingeleli bazame ukujongana neemfuno zoothixo ngokwenza imithendeleko kunye nemibhiyozo.
Itempile nganye ineyadi yetembile evulelekileyo, kube se kubakho isanctuary engaphakathi ekungena kuphela abapriste kuyo.
Ngamanye amaxesha izakhiwo ezohlukileyo, ezibizwa ii-ziggurat, bezakhelwe ukuba lilungu leecawa.
Phezulu wenqaba kwakho yayindawo yesithixoe.
AbaseBhabhiloni bakhela izithixo zabo ngazinye ithempeli eliyinhloko elalibhekwa njengekhaya lesithixo.
Abantu abaletha imihlatshelo konkulunkulu nakubaphristi bazozama ukunika onkulunkulu izidingo zabo ngemigidi nemikhosi.
Ithempeli ngalinye lalinegceke elivulekile lethempeli kanye nendawo engcwele ephakathi lapho kwakungena khona umphristi kuphela.
Ngezinye izikhathi imibhoshongo ekhethekile engunxa-ntathu, ebizwa ngokuthi ama-ziggurat, yayakhiwe ukuze ibe ingxenye yamathempeli.
Isiqongo sombhoshongo kwakuyindawo engcwele ekhethekile yesithixo.
AbaseBhabhiloni bakhela unkulunkulu wabo ithempeli elaziwa njengekhaya likankulunkulu wabo.
Abantu babeletha imihlatshelo konkulunkulu futhi abapristi bazame ukubhekana nezidingo zonkulunkulu ngokwenza imikhosi nemikhosi.
Ithempeli ngalinye linegceke lethempeli elivulekile, futhi kukhona nendawo engena abapristi kuphela kuyo.
Kwesinye isikhathi izakhiwo ezahlukahlukene, ezibizwa ngokuthi ama-ziggurats, zazakhelwe ukuba yilungu lesonto.
Phezulu kwenqaba yakho kwakuyindawo yesithombe.
Unkulunkulu wasebabiloni abantu bakhe ethempelini likankulunkulu wabo injengekhaya eyayiziwa yabo.
Baletha abantu kanye nabapristi nemihlatshelo onkulunkulu futhi bazama ukubhekana nezidingo imithendeleko woothixo nemibhiyozo ukwenza.
Ithempeli ngalinye nokho ineyadi platform evulekile, bekuyoba isanctuary uma kuphela abapriste ngaphakathi kuwo.
Ngezinye izikhathi izakhiwo ze-ezohlukileyo, zibizwa ngokuthi i-ziggurat, futhi ilungu lokugcina liya ebezakhele.
Yesithixoe of yayindawo yakhe kuze izinqaba.
Abantu baseBhabhiloni bakhela unkulunkulu wabo ithempeli eyayisaziwa njengekhaya lonkulunkulu wabo.
Abantu babezoletha iminikelo kankulunkulu futhi abapristi bazame ukubhekana nezidingo zawonkulunkulu ngokwenza imikhosi nemibhiyozo.
Ithempeli ngalinye lineyadi letembile elivulekile, kube sekuba khona isanctuary engaphakathi ekungena kuphela abapriste kuyo.
Ngezinye izikhathi izakhiwo ezihlukile, okuthiwa ama-ziggurat, bezakhelwe ukuba yilungu lamasonto.
Phezulu wenqaba kwakho yayindawo yesinkulunkulu.
AbaseBabiloni bakhela unkulunkulu wabo ithempeli, elaziwa njengekhaya likankulunkulu wabo.
Abantu babeletha imihlatshelo konkulunkulu futhi abapristi babezama ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zonkulunkulu ngokwenza imikhosi nemikhosi.
Ithempeli ngalinye linamagceke ethempeli avulekile, futhi kunendawo engcwele engaphakathi nokungena kuphela abapriste kuyo.
Ngezinye izikhathi izakhiwo ezahlukahlukene, ezibizwa ngokuthi ama-ziggurat, ukuze zibe ngomunye nomunye.
Phezulu kwenqaba yakho kwakuyindawo yesithombe.

Abantu babeletha imihlatshelo konkulunkulu futhi abapristi babezama ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zonkulunkulu ngokwenza imikhosi nemikhosi.
Ithempeli ngalinye linamagceke ethempeli avulekile, futhi kunendawo engcwele yangaphakathi okungangena abapristi kuphela kuyo.

I-802.11n linqanaba elisebenza ku-2.4Ghz naku-5.0Ghz yefrikwensi
Oku kuza kwenza ukuba isebenzisane ne-802.11a, 802.11b kunye ne-802.11g, logama nje isitishi esisiseko sineeradiyo ezimbini.
Isantya se-802.11n sikhawuleze kakhulu kunesabangaphambili abaphumeleleyo be-600Mbit / s.
Isimiso se-802.11n sisebenza kokubili ezikhawini zokuthatheka komsindo ze-2.4Ghz kanye ne-5.0Ghz.
Lokhu kuzoyivumela ukuthi ihambisane nezinhlelo zakudala ze-802.11a, i-802.11b kanye ne-802.11g, uma nje isikhungo sesiteshi sinemisakazo emibili.
Ijubane lika-802.11n liphezulu kakhulu kunelangaphambili elaligcina ejubaneni elingu-600Mbit/s.
I-802.11n yisistimu yokusebenza esingu-2.4Ghz naku-5.0Ghz yezifiso
Lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi ihambisane ne-802.11a, 802.11b ne-802.11g, inqobo nje uma isiteshi sesisekelo sinemisakazo emibili.
Isivinini esingu-802.11n sishesha kakhulu kunangaphambili esiphumelele esingu-600Mbit / s.
Umsebenzi ezingeni 802.11 n at 2.4 Ghz in the 5.0 ghz yefrikweni
Lokhu kusebenza ukuthi futhi uyokwenza-802.11 a, 802.11 b no 802.11 g, sineeradiyo igama base iziteshi ezimbili nje.
Ijubane 802.11 n kunesabangaphambili abawinile ngokushesha kakhulu thina web-600Mbit / s.
I-802.11n iyizinga elisebenza ku-2.4Ghz naku-5.0Ghz yefrikwensi
Lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi isebenzisane ne-802.11a, 802.11b ne-802.11g, inqobo nje uma isitishi esiyisisekelo sinamaradiyo amabili.
Isivinini se-802.11n sishesha kakhulu kunesabangaphambili abawinile be-600Mbit / s.
I-802.11n yisistimu yokusebenza ye-2.4Ghz ne-5.0Ghz
Lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi ihambisane ne-802.11a, 802.1b ne-082.11g, inqobo nje uma isiteshi sesisekelo sinemisakazo emibili.
Isivinini esingu-802.11n sishesha kakhulu kunangaphambili esiphumelele esingu-600Mbit/s.

Lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi ihambisane ne-802.11a, 802.11b ne-802.11g, inqobo nje isiteshi esiyisisekelo sinamaradiyo amabili.
Isivinini se-802.11n sisheshe kakhulu kunesabangaphambili abaphumelele be-600Mbit / s.

Amagosa esixeko sase Amsterdam nase Anne Frank Museum achaza ukuba lomthi usuleleke kukungunda kwaye kunganefuthe elinobungozi empilweni kuba besithi ubusele usengozini yokuwa.
Ibilindele ukuwiswa ngoLwesibini, kodwa isindile emva kwesigqibo esingxamisekileyo.
Iziphathimandla zedolobha lase-Amsterdam kanye neMnyuziyamu ka-Anne Frank zithi umuthi unesikhunta esiyingozi emphakathini njengoba zithi bowusengozini yokuwa ngokushesha.
Beyihlelelwa ukunqunywa ngoLwesibili, kodwa yasindiswa ngemva kwesinqumo senkantolo sezimo eziphuthumayo.
Izikhulu zedolobha lase-Amsterdam nase-Anne Frank Museum zichaze lesi sihlahla njengesikhunta futhi singaba nomthelela oyingozi empilweni ngoba bethi besisengozini yokuwa.
Bekulindeleke ukuthi lihoxiswe ngoLwesibili, kodwa lasinda ngemuva kwesinqumo esiphuthumayo.
Sass nezikhulu zedolobha zase-Amsterdam Anne Frank zathi isisekelo somuthi i-usuleleke kukungunda Development impact nezingozi futhi zisengozini yokusho isiphuzo se-empilweni sokuwa.
Ngolwesibili futhi ulindele imastment, kodwa emva isinqumo esekhulile esingxamisekileyo.

Kulindele ukuwiswa ngoLwesibili, kodwa isindile ngemuva kwesinqumo esiphuthumayo.
Izikhulu zedolobha i-Amsterdam kanye ne-Anne Frank Museum bachaze lesi sihlahla njengesikhunta futhi singaba nomthelela omubi kwezempilo ngoba bethi sisengozini yokuwa.
Bekulindeleke ukuthi lihoxiswe ngoLwesibili, kodwa lasinda ngemuva kwesinqumo esiphuthumayo.
Ngaphambilana i-arhente yeendaba yaseTshayina iXinhua inikezele ingxelo ngenqwelomoya eza kuphangwa.
Ingxelo zamva zachaza ukuba inqwelomoya yafumana isoyikiso sesiqhushumbisi yajikwa ukubuyela umva e Afghanistan, yahlala eKandahar.
Iingxelo zakwangoko zithi inqwelomoya yabuyela eAfghanistan emva kokuba ingavunyelwanga ukuba ilende ngokungxamisekileyo ukufika e-Urmqi.
Ngaphambili, inhlangano yezindaba yaseShayina i-Xinhua yabika ukuthi kunendiza ethunjiwe.
Imibiko yakamuva yabe isithi indiza ithola ukusongelwa ngebhomu futhi yaphambukiselwa emuva e-Afghanistan, ima e-Kandahar.
Imibiko yasekuqaleni ithi indiza iphambukiselwe emuva e-Afghanistan ngemva kokwenqatshelwa indawo yokuma yezimo eziphuthumayo e-Ürümqi.
Phambilini abezindaba zaseChina iXinhua babike ukuthi indiza izophangwa.
Imibiko yakamuva ikhombisa ukuthi indiza yathola usongo lwebhomu yanikwa ukubuyela e-Afghanistan, yahlala eKandahar.
Imibiko yokuqala ithi indiza ibuyele e-Afghanistan ngemuva kokungavunyelwa ukuthatha indiza ephuthumayo efika e-Urmqi.
Ngephambilana agency esihlinzeka imibiko yezindaba iXinhua yaseTshayina ngenqwelomoya ziphangwe.
Umbiko usongo uthi kamuva kwatholakala ukuya emuva yajikwelomoya e sesiqhushumbisi Bahrain, eKandahar wasala.
Kukhona kanjalo imibiko inqwelomoya wathi emva return eside ukuba ingavunyelwanga eAfghanistan eze ngokungxamisekileyo E-Urmqi.
Ngaphambilana inhlangano yezokuxhumana yaseChina iXinhua inikeze le mibiko ngezindiza ezaphangwa.
Umbiko wakamuva wachaza ukuthi inqola yathola isoyikiso sesiqhushumbisi yajikwa ukubuyela emuva e-Afghanistan, yahlala eKandahar.
Imibiko yangokushesha ithi inqola yabuyela e-Afghanistan ngemuva kokuthi ingavunyelwanga ukuba ilende ngokuphuthumayo ukufika e-Urmqi.
Phambilini abezindaba zaseChina iXinhua babike ukuthi indiza izokhangwa.
Imibiko yakamuva ikhombisa ukuthi indiza ithole usongo lwe-Afghanistan ibuyele e-Afghanistan, yafika eKandahar.
Imibiko yokuqala ithi indiza ibuyele e-Afghanistan ngemuva kokungavunyelwa ukuthatha indiza ephuthumayo eya e-Urmqi.
Ngaphambilana i-ejensi yezindaba yaseShayina iXinhua inikeze umbiko ngendiza ezophangwa.
Umbiko wamuva wachaza ukuthi inqola engokomoya yathola isoyiso lesiqhumane yajikwa ukubuyela emuva e Afghanistan, yahlala eKandahar.
Imibiko yakuleli ithi inqola yabuyela e-Afghanistan ngemuva kokuthi ingavunyelwa ukuba ilende ngokuphuthumayo ukufika e-Urmqi.
Phambilini abezindaba zaseChina iXinhua babike ukuthi ibhanoyi belidunwa.
Imibiko yakamuva ikhombisa ukuthi indiza ithole usongo lwebhomu yaphindiselwa e-Afghanistan, yafika eKandahar.
Imibiko yokuqala ithi indiza ibuyele e-Afghanistan ngemuva kokungavunyelwa ukuthatha indiza ephuthumayo eya e-Urmqi.
Ulimo lokuphila lulimo olwenziwa ngenjongo zokuphuhlisa ukutya okwaneleyo ukuze konele izidingo zomlimi nekhaya lakhe.
Ulimo lokuphila lulula, oludla ngokusebenzisa izichumisi, nesystem ezigciniweyo zembewu efumaneka kummandla edityaniswa nokujikelezisa udidi lwesityalo okanye naluphi na uhlobo ulwandisa isivuno.
Ngokwembali uninzi lwamafama lwaluzibandakanya kwezolimo ngenjongo zokuphila kwaye oku kusenjalo kumazwe amaninzi asakhasayo.
Ukulimela ukuziphilisa ukulima okwenzelwa ukukhiqiza ukudla okwanele ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zomlimi kanye nomdeni wakhe kuphela.

Ukulimela ukuziphilisa indlela elula, ngovamile okususelwe ezintweni eziphilayo, kusetshenziswa imbewu egciniwe yasendaweni enezici ezingokwemvelo kuhlanganiswe nokushintshashintsha izilimo noma ezinye izindlela ezilula zokwenza umkhiqizo ube mningi.
Ngokomlando abalimi abaningi babelimela ukuziphilisa futhi kusenjalo emazweni amaningi athuthukayo.
Ulimo lokuphila luyisimo esenziwa ngenhloso yokuthuthukisa ukudla okwanele ukuze konele izidingo zomlimi nomndeni wakhe.
Ukulima kokuphila kulula, imvamisa usebenzisa umanyolo, nezinhlelo zembewu ezigciniwe ezitholakala esifundeni kuhlanganiswa nokuzungeza isitshalo noma yiluphi uhlobo olwandisa isivuno.
Ngokomlando iningi lezimpumputhe lalibandakanya kwezolimo ngenhloso yokuphila futhi lokhu kusenjalo emazweni amaningi asathuthuka.
Ukuze siphile ngenhloso yentuthuko yezolimo kanye nokuvikeleka kokudla yezolimo olwenziwe izidingo umlimi ukuthi omunye nekhaya yakhe.

Phila ku practice yezolimo, lokhu ukusetshenziswa ngokuvamile izichumisi, kuyatholakala nesystem edityanisa igcinwa endaweni imbewu kwezitshalo noma ukushintshanisa yiluphi uhlobo hlobo kanye isivuno.
Ngokusho irekhodi abalimi abaningi bahlala lwaluzibandakanya lokhu futhi ngenhloso ezolimo kanye ezincane kanye nokuzithiba abalimi emazweni amaningi.
Ulimo lokuphila lulimo olwenziwa ngenhloso yokuthuthukisa ukudla okwanele ukuze konele izidingo zomlimi nekhaya lakhe.
Ulimo lokuphila lulula, oluvame ngokusebenzisa izichumisi, nesystem ezigcinwe zembewu etholakala esifundeni esiyinhlanganisela nokujikelezisa isigaba isitshalo noma yiluphi uhlobo ulwandisa isivuno.

Ihlosi ikwiqela elinye le (Genus Panthera) njenge ngonyama, ingwe kunye ne tshitha. Ezikati zine zizo kuphela ezikwazi ukugquma.
Ukugrhagrhama kwengwe enkulu akufani nokughraghrama-okupheleleyo kwengonyama, kodwa kufuphana kunesivakalisi se-snarly, ekhwaza amazwi.
Umgadli ophelele, ihlosi lingakhuphuka (yize lingakwazi kahle), libhukude, ligxume amabanga amade futhi lidonse ngamandla womuntu onamandla aphindwe kasihlanu.

TIqela elilawulayo, iSouth West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), nayo yaye yagcina isinintsi kulonyulo lwepalamente.

Igolide ingabunjwa nakubuphi na ubumi. Ingabunjwa yenziwa ubumi obuncinane obuninzi.
Inokutsalwa kwicingo olubityileyo, olunokujijeka kwaye lubonakale. Inokufakwa ngesando okanye irolwe ibe ziishiti.

Ingenziwa icekeceke kakhulu, kwaye inamathele kwesinye isinyithi. Ingenziwa icekeceke kangangokuba ngamanye amaxesha yayisetyenziselwa ukuhombisa imifanekiso ezotywe ngesandla kwiincwadi ezibizwa ngokuba "yimibhalo yesandla ekhanyayo".
Igolide lingenziwa libe noma isiphi isibumbeko. Lingagingqwa libe yizibumbeko ezincane..
Ingadonswa ibe ucingo oluncinyanyane, olungasontwa noma lulukwe. Lungabethelwa noma lugoqwe lube amashidi.

Ingenziwa ibe lula, bese inamathiselwa kwenye insimbi. Ingenziwa ibe lula kangangokuthi kwesinye isikhathi yayisetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa izithombe ezidwetshwe ngesandla ezincwadini ezibizwa ngokuthi "illuminated manuscripts".
Igolide lingakhiwa kunoma yisiphi isakhamuzi. Ingakhiwa ibe inani elincane labantu abaningi.
Ingadonswa ocingweni oluncane, olungasonteka futhi lubonakale. Ingafakwa ngesando noma ifakwe emashidini.

Ingenziwa ibe mncane kakhulu, futhi inamathele kwenye insimbi. Ingenziwa ibe ntekenteke kangangokuthi kwesinye isikhathi isetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa izithombe ezidwetshwe ngesandla ezincwadini ezibizwa ngokuthi "ukubhala kwesandla okukhanyayo".
Igolide ingabunjwa nakubuphi ubuzwe. Ingabunjwa obuncinane yisakhamuzi ngobuningi.
Olubityileyo hudula kanye geography, futhi iyabonakala olunokujijeka. Irolwe ziishiti noma audio singasetshenziswa.

Icekeceke kungaba mkhulu, futhi banamathele lowo isinyithi. Ngezinye izikhathi ukuthi kungaba icekeceke ezotywe izikhonkwane izibonelelo uhombisa izithombe babizwa for encwadini isandla "imibhalo yesandla".
Igolide lingabunjwa noma yibuphi ubumi. Ingabunjwa yenziwa ubumi obuncane obuningi.
Kungadonselwa ecingweni elibityile, olunokujijeka futhi lubonakale. Kungafakwa ngesando noma irolwe ibe ngamashiti.

Kungenziwa icekeceke kakhulu, futhi inamathele kwesinye insimbi. Kungenziwa icekeceke kangangokuthi ngezinye izikhathi yayisetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa izithombe ezesabekayo ngesandla ezincwadini ezibizwa ngokuthi "imibhalo yesandla ekhanyayo".
Igolide lingakhiwa kunoma yisiphi isakhamuzi. Ingakhiwa ibe inani elincane kakhulu labantu.
Ukudonswa kwesibhamu esishubile, esinokujijeka futhi kubonakala. Ukufakwa ngesando noma kutholwe kube yishiti.

Ingenziwa ibe mncane kakhulu, futhi inamathele kwenye insimbi. Ingenziwa icekeceke kangangokuba kwesinye isikhathi isetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa izithombe ezipendwe ngesandla ezincwadini ezibizwa ngokuthi "yimibhalo yesandla ekhanyayo".
Igolide lingase libunjwe noma yikuphi ukuphila. Ingabunjwa yenziwa ukuphila okuncane kakhulu.
Kungase kudonswe ecingweni elibi, elingajiki futhi libonakale. Kungafakwa ngesando noma irolwe ibe ngamashidi.

Ingenziwa iceke kakhulu, futhi inamathele kwenye insimbi. Ingenziwa iceke kangangokuthi ngezinye izikhathi yayisetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa izithombe eziqokiwe ngesandla izincwadi ezibizwa ngokuthi "yimibhalo yesandla ekhanyayo".
Igolide lingakhiwa kunoma yisiphi isakhamuzi. Ingakhiwa ibe inani elincane kakhulu labantu.
Ingadonswa ocingweni oluncane, olungasonteka futhi lubonakale. Ingashaywa ngesando noma ifakwe emashidini.

Ingenziwa ibe mncane kakhulu, bese inamathela kwenye insimbi. Ingenziwa ibe ntekenteke kangangokuba kwesinye isikhathi isetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa izithombe ezipendwe ngesandla ezincwadini ezibizwa ngokuthi "ukubhala ngesandla okukhanyayo".
Ngexesha le-1920s, isimo sengqondo esixhaphakileyo sabemi nezizwe yayikukuthanda uxolo nokuzikhetha.
Emva kokubona izinto ezoyikekayo nenkohlakalo ebangelwe yimfazwe ebudeni beMfazwe Yehlabathi I, amazwe aye anqwenela ukuyiphepha le meko kwakhona kwixesha elizayo.
Ngezikhathi zawo-1920, izimo zengqondo zezakhamuzi eziningi kanye nezizwe bezikholwa ukuzonda impi nokulwa kanye nokuzihlukanisa.
Ngemva kokubona izenzo zonya nezishaqisayo zempi phakathi neMpi Yezwe I, izizwe zafisa ukugwema isimo esinjalo futhi esikhathini esizayo.
Ngawo-1920, isimo sengqondo esivamile sezakhamizi nezizwe kwakungukuthanda ukuthula nokukhetha.
Ngemuva kokubona okwesabekayo nokubi okubangelwa impi phakathi neMpi Yezwe I, amazwe aye afisa ukugwema lesi simo ngokuzayo.
Ngesikhathi 1920, isimo kazwelonke izingqondo labantu esixhaphakileyo yayikuthanda ukuthula.
Ngemva kokubona zonke izinto ezimbi ezibangelwa ububi bempi yezwe ii yimfazwe, amazwe ayiziphepha aphinde afisa lesi simo esikhathini esizayo.
Ngesikhathi se-1920s, isimo sengqondo esivame kakhulu sezakhamuzi nezizwe kwakuwukuthanda ukuthula nokuzikhetha.
Ngemva kokubona izinto ezesabekayo nenkohlakalo ebangelwe yimpi ebudeni beMpi Yezwe I, amazwe aye afisa ukuyigwema lesi simo kabusha esikhathini esizayo.
Ngesikhathi sama-1920s, isimo sengqondo sezakhamizi nezizwe kwakungukuthanda ukuthula nokuzikhetha.
Ngemuva kokubona ukwesabeka kwempi phakathi neMpi Yezwe I, amazwe aye anqamule lesi simo ngokuzayo.
Ngesikhathi se-1920s, isimo sengqondo esivame kakhulu sabemi nezizwe kwakuwukuthanda ukuthula nokuzikhetha.
Ngemuva kokubona izinto ezesabekayo nenkohlakalo ezibangelwe yimpi ebudeni beMpi Yezwe I, amazwe ayefisa ukuyigwema lesi simo siphinde esikhathini esizayo.
Ngawo-1920, isimo sengqondo sezakhamizi nezizwe kwakungukuthanda ukuthula nokukhetha.
Ngemuva kokubona ukwesabeka kwempi phakathi neMpi Yezwe I, izizwe bezilangazelela ukugwema lesi simo ngokuzayo.
Ngexesha leMfazwe yoQhushululu, amazwe alishumi elinesithathu aqala ukubumba urhulumente ophakathi obuthathaka- ngeCongress kuphela kwakheyona nto iphantsi- kwamaNqaku oMdibaniso.

Indlu yowiso mthetho ibingenawo amagunya okubiza irhafui, kwaye kungenxa yesizathu sokuba yayingekho balawuli bakazwelonke okanye iijaji, yayixhomekeke kumagunya karhulumente, ebeye ngamanye amathuba angancedisani, ukunyanzelisa yonke imithetho yawo.
Ibingenalo negunya lokuyinyathela imithetho yerhafu namaxabiso phakathi kwamazwana.
Ii-Articles bezidinga imvume ethe gca kuwo onke amaphondoe phambi koba zingatshintshwa futhi amaphondo adelele urhulumente omkhulu kangangaba abameli bawo ebengabikho rhoqo.
Phakathi neMpi Yezinguqugo, izifunda eziyishumi nantathu zaqala zakha uhulumeni obuthakathaka—uKhongolose kuyisici sawo sodwa—ngaphansi kwe-Articles of Confederation.

Ukhongolose wabe engenawo amandla okubeka intela, futhi, ngenxa yokuthi bokungekho sigungu sezwe noma noma isigungu sokwahlulela, uncike ezikhulwini zombuso, ezazingabambisani izikhathi ezingi, ukuphoqelela yonke imithetho yawo.
Yayingenalo futhi igunya lokweqa imithetho yentela nokuthelisa ngempahla phakathi kwezifunda.
Imithetho beyidinga ukuba zonke izifunda zivume ngaphambi kokuba ilungiswe futhi izifunda zithathe uhulumeni omkhulu njengongabalulekile kakhulu kangangokuba abameleli bazo babehlala bangekho.
Ngesikhathi seMpi Yomshoshaphansi, amazwe ayishumi nantathu aqala ukwakha uhulumeni ophakathi obuthakathaka - iCongress kuphela - okuwukuphela kwayo engaphansi kweNhlangano.

Isishayamthetho sasingenawo amandla okukhokhisa intela, futhi ngesizathu sokuthi sasingekho abaphathi bezwe noma abahluleli, sasincike emandleni omphakathi, okwakuthi ngezinye izikhathi angasizakali, ukuphoqelela yonke imithetho yawo.
Ibingenalo igunya lokwephula imithetho yentela nentela phakathi kwamazwana.
Izindatshana zidinga ukuvunywa okusobala kuzo zonke izifundazwe ngaphambi kokuthi zingashintshwa futhi izifundazwe zidelele uhulumeni omkhulu kangangokuthi abamele zazingekho njalo.
YoQhushululu ngesikhathi sempi, abathathu emazweni ayishumi nohulumeni obuthakathaka futhi kwakhiwa phakathi lokuqala-into kuphela kwakheyona ngeCongress sub-amanothi ngaphezu kwalokho.

Umkhandlu kazwelonke ushayele ibingenawo tax power power act, futhi ngenxa yalokho kwakungekho ababusi noma abahluleli for bakazwelonke, kumagunya ayixhomekeke government, ebeye angancedisani kwezinye amathuba, ukuphoqelela yonke imithetho yalo.
Ngaphandle amandla intela kanye value kokuyathela imithetho phakathi kwamazwe.
Lesi sihloko sathi ukuqokwa ngemvume yotshani kuzo zonke izifundazwe nezifundazwe ukuthi ngaphambi kokuba uhulumeni ungashintsha lezi abamele ezinkulu kangangaba ubaba ngokuvamile engekho.
Ngesikhathi seMpi Yoqhushulu, amazwe ayishumi nantathu aqala ukubumba uhulumeni womphakathi obuthakathaka- ngeCongress kuphela kwakheyona ephansi- kwamaNqaku eNhlanganisela.

Indlu yowiso mthetho ibingenawo amagunya okubiza intela, futhi kungenxa yesizathu sokuthi yayingekho abaphathi bakazwelonke noma amajaji, yayincike emagunyani kahulumeni, ebeye ngamanye amathuba angasizakali, ukuphoqelela yonke imithetho yawo.
Ibingenalo negunya lokuyinyathela imithetho yentela namanani phakathi kwamazwana.
Abakwa-Articles bezidinga imvume ethe gca kuzo zonke izifundazwe ngaphambi koba zingashintshwa futhi izifundazwe zidelele uhulumeni omkhulu kangangaba abameli bawo ebeengabikhona njalo.
Ngesikhathi seMpi Yomshoshaphansi, amazwe ayishumi nantathu aqala ukwakha uhulumeni ophakathi obuthakathaka-iCongress kuphela-okuwukuphela kwakhe owayengaphansi kweNhlanganisela.

Isishayamthetho sasingenawo amandla okukhokhisa intela, futhi ngesizathu sokuthi sasingenabo abaphathi bezwe noma abahluleli, sasincike emandleni ombuso, okwakuthi kwezinye izikhathi angabambisani nawo, ukuphoqelela yonke imithetho yawo.
Ibingenalo igunya lokwephula imithetho yentela nentela phakathi kokuphawula.
Izindatshana zazidinga ukuvunywa okusobala kuzo zonke izifundazwe ngaphambi kokuba zithathelwe indawo futhi izifundazwe zazidelela uhulumeni omkhulu kangangokuthi zazingekho njalo zazingekho.
Ngesikhathi seMpi Yokwethuka, amazwe ayishumi nantathu aqala ukubumba uhulumeni ophakathi obuthakathaka- nge-Congress kuphela kwakhe okuyiyona ephansi- kwamaNqaku Omhlanganiso.

Indlu yowiso mthetho ibingenawo amagunya okubiza intela, futhi kungenxa yesizathu sokuthi yayingekho abaphathi bakazwelonke noma amajaji, yayincike eziphathimandla zikahulumeni, ebeye ngamanye amathuba angancedisani, ukuphoqa yonke imithetho yawo.
Ibingenalo negunya lokuyinyathela imithetho yentela namanani phakathi kwamazwana.
Ama-Articles ayedinga imvume ethe gca kuwo wonke amaphondoe ngaphambi kokuba angashintshwa futhi izifundazwe adedelele uhulumeni omkhulu kangangoba abameleli bawo babengabikho njalo.
Ngesikhathi seMpi Yomshoshaphansi, amazwe ayishumi nantathu aqala ukwakha uhulumeni ophakathi obuthakathaka - iCongress kuphela - okuwukuphela kwakhe owayengaphansi kweNyunyana.

Isishayamthetho sasingenawo amandla okukhokhisa intela, futhi ngesizathu sokuthi sasingenabo abaphathi bezwe noma abahluleli, sasincike emandleni ombuso, okwakuthi kwezinye izikhathi angabambisani, ukuphoqelela yonke imithetho yawo.
Futhi ibingenalo igunya lokwephula imithetho yentela nentela phakathi kokuphawula.
Izindatshana zazidinga ukuvunywa okusobala kuzo zonke izifundazwe ngaphambi kokuthi zithathelwe indawo futhi izifundazwe zazidelela uhulumeni kakhulu kangangokuthi ababamele bazo babengekho njalo.
Ngaphantsi kwazo kukho iikati eziphakathi ezitya ixhoba eliphakathi ukusuka kwimivundla ukuya kwi-antelopes kunye nexhama.
Okokugqibela, zininzi iikati ezincinci (kubandakanya iikati ezikhululekileyo) ezitya uninzi lwamaxhoba ezinambuzane, iimpuku, amacikilishe kunye neentaka.
Imifhlo yempumelelo yabo kukwenza imisebenzi enqabileyo, kati nganye inomsebenzi wayo owenza Ukuba ingakhuphisani nezinye.
Ngaphansi kwazo kukhona amakati amancanyana ngobukhulu adla inyama ebanjelwa ukudliwakusuka kunogwaja kuya ezinyamazaneni.

Ekugcineni, kunamakati amaningi amancane (kuhlanganise namakati afuywayo azizulelayo) adla izilwanyane ezizingelwayo eziningi kakhulu njengezinambuzane, izilwane eziququdayo, izibankwa, kanye nezinyoni.
Imfihlo yempumelelo yabo umcabango wesikhundla, umsebenzi okhethekile ikati ngalinye elinawo olenza lingancintisani namanye.
Ngaphansi kwawo kunamakati aphakathi adla isisulu esiphakathi kusuka enkantolo kuya kuma-antelopes namaxhaphozi.
Okokugcina, kunamakati amaningi amancane (kufaka phakathi amakati amahhala) adla iningi lezisulu ezinambuzane, amagundane, amacikilishe nezinyoni.
Imfihlo yempumelelo yabo ukwenza imisebenzi engavamile, ikhodi ngayinye inomsebenzi wayo okwenza ingakuncintisana nezinye.
Kukhona esingaphansi ukuthi phakathi idivayisi kusuka kwimivundla ezitya kuya nexhama kanye antelopes.
Ekugcineni, lo kate eziningi ezincane (kate kubandakanya ezikhululekileyo) ezitya izisulu eziningi izinambuzane, amagundane, izibankwa nezinyoni.
Enqabileyo do imisebenzi Yabo imifhlo impumelelo, okwenza kate umsebenzi Kanye nomunye ingakhuphisani.
Ngaphansi kwazo kunamakati aphakathi okudla isisulu esiphakathi kusukela emivundla kuze kufike e-antelopes kanye nexhama.
Okokugcina, ziningi amakati amancane (kufaka phakathi amakati akhululekile) adla iningi lezisulu ezinambuzane, amagundane, amacikilishi nezinyoni.
Imifhlo yempumelelo yabo kukwenza imisebenzi eyigugu, kati ngayinye inomsebenzi wayo owenza Ukuba ingancintisani nezinye.
Ngaphansi kwazo kunamakati aphakathi nendawo adla ukudla okuphakathi kusuka konogwaja kuya kwantelopes nezinyamazane.
Okokugcina, kunamakati amaningi amancane (kufaka phakathi amakati amahhala) adla kakhulu izisulu ezinwabuzelayo, amagundane, nezinyoni.
Imfihlo yokuphumelela kwabo ukwenza umsebenzi onzima, futhi ikati ngalinye linomsebenzi walo okwenza likwazi ukuncintisana kakhulu.
Ngaphansi kwazo kukhona amakati aphakathi edla isisulu esiphakathi kusukela emigudwini kuya kuma-antelopes kanye nexhama.
Okokugcina, ziningi amakati amancane (kufaka phakathi amakati akhululekile) okudla iningi lezisulu ezinambuzane, izimpuku, amacikilishe nezinyoni.
Imifhlo yempumelelo yabo ikwenza imisebenzi eyigugu, kati ngayinye inomsebenzi wayo owenza Ukuba ingancintisani nezinye.

Ekugcineni, kunamakati amaningi amancane (kufaka phakathi amakati amahhala) adla kakhulu isisulu sezinambuzane, amagundane, izibankwa nezinyoni.
Imfihlo yokuphumelela kwabo ukwenza umsebenzi onzima, futhi ikati ngalinye linomsebenzi walo okwenza liqhudelane.

Uxwebhu,ngokutsho,kokuhletyiweyo kuyakubhekisa kwingxabano zebhoda, efunwa ngama Palestine ebhekiselele kwiibhoda zamgaphambi kwemfazwe ka1967 yase Mideast .
Ezinye izihloko ekuthethwa ngazo zibandakanya imeko yexesha elizayo yeYerusalem engcwele kuzo zombini izizwe nakwi yeJordani Valley.
I-Israel ifuna ubukho obuqhubekayo emkhosini ethafeni kangangeminyaka elishumi emva kokuba isivumelwano sisayiniwe ngelixa i-PA ivumayo ukushiya ubukho obunjalo iminyaka emihlanu kuphela.
Idokhumenti, kuya ngabasiki bebunda, izokhuluma ngombango wemingcele, leyo iPhalestina efuna isekelwe emingceleni ngaphambi kweMpi yaseMpumalanga eMaphakathi yango-1967.
Ezinye izihloko ezikhona zihlanganisa ikusasa leJerusalema eligcwele kuzo zombili izizwe kanye nenkinga Yesigodi saseJordani.
I-Israyeli ifuna ukuba amasosha aqhubeke ekhona esigodini iminyaka eyishumi uma nje isivumelwano sisayinilwe nakuba i-PA ivuma ukuba amasosha abe khona iminyaka eyisihlanu kuphela.
Lo mbhalo, ngokusho kombhalo, ubhekise ezingxabanweni zamabhoda, ezifunwa ngamaPalestine ngamabhoda angaphambi kuka-1967 eMideast.
Ezinye izihloko ezihlanganisiwe zifaka phakathi ikusasa leJerusalema elingcwele kuzizwe zombili naseJordani Valley.
U-Israel ufuna ukuqhubeka nokuba khona kwamasosha emathafeni iminyaka eyishumi ngemuva kokuthi isivumelwano sisayinwe ngenkathi i-PA ivuma ukushiya ubukhona obunjalo iminyaka emihlanu kuphela.
Lo mbhalo, okuyinto, iyakubhekisa kokuhletyiweyo ukungqubuzana ibhodi, ibhodi njengoba kudingwa Impi Palestine ka 1967 Mideast zamgaphambi like .
Ezinye izihloko zihlanganisa ikusasa lezimo okukhulunywa ngazo kuzo zombili izizwe nangenxa yasejerusalema esigodini esingcwele yeJordani.

I-Xinhua ixele isithi abaphandi bakwarhulumente bafumene ezimbhini ii-‘black box’ zeerekhoda zenqwelo-moya ngoLwesithathu.
Ezinye i-wrestlers zanikezela imbeko kuLuna.
UTommy Dreamer uthe "uLuna wayenguKumkanikazi wokuqala we-Extreme. Umphathi wam wokuqala. ULuna wasweleka ngobusuku beenyanga ezimbini. Wayemhle yedwa njengaye. Umfazi owomeleleyo."
UDustin "Goldust" uRunnels uphawule ukuba "uLuna wayengenangqondo njengam ... mhlawumbi nangaphezulu ... ndiyamthanda kwaye ndizakumkhumbula ... ngethemba lokuba ukwindawo engcono."
I-Xinhua yabika ukuthi abaphenyi bakahulumeni bathola ama-“black box” amabilii okurekhoda izindiza ngoLwesithathu.
Umdlali we-wrestling naye washo amazwi okuhlonipha uLuna.
UTommy Dreamer wathi “uLuna bekuyiNdlovukazi Yokwedlulele yokuqala. Umphathi wami wokuqala. ULuna washona ngobusuku bezinyanga ezimbili. Kuyingqayizivele njengaye. Owesifazane Onamandla.”
U-Dustin “Thulilwegolide” Runnels waphawula ngokuthi “uLuna wayehlanya njengami...mhlawumbe ukungidlula...ngiyamthanda futhi ngizomkhumbula...ngiyethemba usendaweni engcono.”
IXinhua ibike ukuthi abaphenyi bakahulumeni bathole ‘ibhokisi elimnyama’ ezimbili zabaqopha izindiza ngoLwesithathu.
Amanye ama-wrestlers anikeze umkhakha kuLuna.
UTommy Dreamer uthe "uLuna wayeyiNdlovukazi yokuqala yase-Extreme. Umphathi wami wokuqala. ULuna ushonile ngobusuku bezinyanga ezimbili. Wayemuhle yedwa njengaye. Owesifazane oqinile."
UDustin "Goldust" Runnels uphawule ukuthi "uLuna ubengenangqondo njengami ... mhlawumbe nangaphezulu ... ngiyamthanda futhi ngizomkhumbula ... ngethemba usendaweni engcono."
Umcwaningi ucacisa Xinhua ezimbhini kanye nohulumeni bethi baye bathola 'black box' zeerekhodi izinqola umoya ongcwele ngolwesithathu.
Ezinye wrestlers ukukunika udumo.
UTommy Dreamer wathi " yebo kuya kuqala futhi wayenguKumkanikazi-Extreme. Umphathi wami wokuqala. Ebusuku wafa wena ezimbili beenyanga. Wayemhle yedwa onjengaye. Unkosikazi amandla aqinile."
UDustin "Goldust" uRunnels uqaphele ukuthi " wayengenangqondo wena nami ... mhlawumbe ngaphezulu ... futhi ngiyakuthanda ndizakumkhumbula ... sethemba ukuthi omunye kangcono."

Umabonakude ubonisa umsi onhlophe ophuma kubuxhakaxhaka.
Abasemagunyeni ekuhlaleni alumkisa abahlali abakufuphi nesakhiwo ukuba bahlale phakathi kwamasango, bacime iziphozisi bushushu kwaye bangawaseli amanzi aphuma etephini.
Ngokwe-nuclear agency yaseJapan, i-radioactive caesium ne iodine ifumanekile kule planti.
Abasemagunyeni bacinga ukuba oku kubonisa ukuba izikhongozeli ezibambe amafutha e-uranium kule ndawo zinokuqhekeka kwaye ziyavuza.
Imibiko yethelevishini ibonisa intuthu emhlophe iphuma esitshalweni.
Iziphathimandla zasendaweni zixwayisa abahlali abaseduze nendawo yemboni ukuba bahlale ezindlini, bacime izipholisa-moya futhi bangaphuzi amanzi ompompi.
Ngokwenkampani yenuzi yaseJapani, imisebe yenuzi ye-caesium ne-iodine itholakale endaweni yokusebenzela.
Iziphathimandla zicabangela ukuthi lokhu kubonisa ukuthi iziqukathi ebeziqukethe amafutha e-uranium endaweni yokusebenzela kungenzeka ukuthi ziqhumile futhi ziyavuza.
Umabonakude ukhombisa intuthu emhlophe ephuma kwinethiwekhi.
Iziphathimandla zendawo zixwayise izakhamizi eziseduze nesakhiwo ukuba zihlale phakathi kwamasango, zicishe iziphozisi zokushisa futhi zingaphuzi amanzi aphuma emgodini.
Ngokwe-ejensi yamagciwane aseJapan, kutholakale i-cesium radioactive ne-iodine kule planti.
Iziphathimandla zikholelwa ukuthi lokhu kukhombisa ukuthi iziqukathi ezibambe uphethiloli we-uranium kule ndawo zingahle ziqhekeze futhi ziyavuza.
Aphume intuthu tv show kuxhakaxhaka onhlophe.

Njengenhlangano yenuzi yaseyasejapan, i-radioactive caesium ne-iodine kutholakala kule planti.
Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi iziphathimandla uma becabanga for the isitsha uphethiloli kule ndawo zinokuqhekeka ziyavuza and uranium.

Abantu bembali bagxeke iipolisi zangaphambili zeFBI ngokusebenzisa ngokuyintloko izinto zalo eziluncedo kumatyala ekulula ukuwacombulula, ingakumbi awokubiwa kweemoto ukuze banyuse izinga lokuphumelela kwabo.
ICongress yaqala ukuxhasa ngezimali inyathelo lokungcola ngo-2005 kwaye yacacisa ukuba i-FBI kufuneka inikezele ngeearhente ezili-10 kwimifanekiso engamanyala yabantu abadala.
Abezomlando bagxeke imithetho edlule yeFBI ngokugxila emacaleni alula ukuwaxazulula, ikakhulukazi amacala okuntshontshwa kwezimoto, ngenjongo yokukhuphula izinga lokuphumelela le nkampani.
Ukhongolose waqala ukuxhasa ngezimali uhlelo olungamanyala ngesikhwama sezwe ngo-2005 futhi wachaza ukuthi i-FBI kumelwe inikele ngezisebenzi ezingu-10 ezithombeni ezingcolile zabantu abadala.
Izazi zomlando zigxeke inqubomgomo yangaphambili ye-FBI yokusebenzisa izinzuzo zayo ngokuyinhloko kumacala okulula ukuwaxazulula, ikakhulukazi ukudunwa kwezimoto ukwandisa izinga lokuphumelela kwabo.
ICongress yaqala ukuxhasa ngezimali isinyathelo sokungcola ngo-2005 futhi yachaza ukuthi i-FBI kufanele ihlinzeke ngamanxusa ayi-10 ezithombe ezingamanyala zabantu abadala.
Umlando wabantu inqubomgomo yangaphambilini ngokusebenzisa bagxeke zeFBI ezintweni ngokwayo ngokuyintloko lula ewusizo, ikakhulukazi ezingeni motor awokubiwa banyuse ukuba ukunqoba.
Isinyathelo sokuqala ukusekela Engezimali ICongress inhlamba nge yacacisa 2005 nokuthi agent kumele kube ukuhumusha embi image yakho engamanyala 10 abadala abantu.

Abantu bomlando bagxeke amapolisi angaphambili e-FBI ngokusebenzisa ngokuyinhloko izinto zalo eziwusizo ezikweletini ekulula ukuwacombulula, ikakhulukazi awokwebiwa kwezimoto ukuze banyuse izinga lokuphumelela kwabo.

Abantu bomlando bagxeke amapholisi angaphambili we-FBI ngokusebenzisa ngokuyinhloko izinto zalo izinzuzo ezinkantolo ezilula ukuzixazulula, ikakhulukazi ukudunwa kwezimoto ukwandisa izinga lokuphumelela kwabo.

Umthetho oyilwayo ufuna imidlalo yevidiyo enogonyamelo ithengiswe kwiphondo laseCalifornia ukuba ibhalwe uphawu lokufunda "u-18" kwaye yenze ukuba ukuthengisa kwabo umntwana kohlwaywe isohlwayo se- $ 1000 ngetyala.

Irisidi ebonisa ukudayiswa kwemidlalo yevidiyo embusweni wase-California ephawulwe ngokuthi “18”okwenza umthengisi wayo ahlawuliswe imali engu-$1000 icala ngalinye.
UMbusi waseCalifornia u-Arnold Schwarzenegger wasayina waba ngumthetho ovimbela ukuthengiswa noma ukuqashwa kwamageyimu wevidiyo okulwa ezinganeni.

Bafumanise ukuba iLanga lisebenza ngemigaqo efanayo nezinye iinkwenkwezi: Ukusebenza kwazo zonke iinkwenkwezi zelilizwe zifunyaniswe ukuba zibenza ngokugqama kwazo, ukujikeleza kwazo, futhi akukho okunye.
Ukukhanya kunye nokujikeleza zisetyenziselwa kunye ukumisela inombolo yeRossby yenkwenkwezi, ehambelana nokuhamba kwe plasma.
Lingalincinci inani le-Rossby, kuya kuba kuncinci ukusebenza kweenkwenkwezi ngokubhekisele kukubuyiswa ngemva yimagnethi.

Bathole ukuthi ilanga lisebenza ngezimiso eziyisisekelo njengezinye izinkanyezi: umsebenzi wezinkanyezi zonke ohlelweni kutholakale ukuthi uqondiswa ukukhanya kwazo, ukuphenduka kwazo, futhi hhayi okunye.
Ukukhanya nokuphenduka kusetshenziswa ndawonye ukuthola inombolo yeRossby yenkanyezi, ehlobene nokugeleza kwe-plasma.
Uma i-Rossby inenombolo encane, inkanyezi ayibi namandla okudonsela emuva amakhulu.
Bathola ukuthi iLanga lisebenza ngezimiso ezifanayo nezinye izinkanyezi: Ukusebenza kwazo zonke izinkanyezi ezweni kutholakale ukuthi zibenza ngokugqama kwazo, ukujikeleza kwazo, futhi akukho okunye.
Ukukhanya nokujikeleza kusetshenziselwa ndawonye ukusungula inombolo yenkanyezi kaRossby, ehambisana nokugeleza kwe-plasma.
Inombolo encane kaRossby, ukusebenza okuncane kwezinkanyezi ngokuvumelana nokubuyiswa kazibuthe.
Bathola ukuthi isimiso esifanayo sisebenza nelanga kanye nezinye izinkanyezi: zonke izinkanyezi zisebenze ezweni ngokugqama zifundiwe, ukushintshanisa lokhu, futhi ayikho enye.
Futhi ukukhanya azungeze insimu star kanye nenombolo isethwe yeRossby zisetyezimisela, uhambe plasma.
Le nombolo lincinci-Rossby, kuyakuba by reference ukusebenza kancane ngemuva izinkanyezi yimagnethi kukubuyisa.
Bathole ukuthi iLanga lisebenza ngemigomo efanayo nezinye izinkanyezi: Ukusebenza kwazo zonke izinkanyezi zezwe kufunyaniswe ukuthi zibenza ngokugqama kwazo, ukujikeleza kwazo, futhi akukho okunye.
Ukukhanya nokujikeleza kusetshenziselwa futhi ukunquma inombolo ye-Rossby yenkanyezi, ehambisana nokuhamba kwe- plasma.
Lingalincane inani le-Rossby, kuzoba kuncane ukusebenza kwezinkanyezi ngokuqondene nokubuyiswa ngemva yidonsa.
Bathola ukuthi iLanga lisebenza ngendlela efanayo nezinye izinkanyezi: Umsebenzi wazo zonke izinkanyezi endaweni yonke kunqunywe ukuthi unembe, nokuzungeza kwawo, futhi akukho okunye.
Ukukhanya nokuzungeza kusetshenziswa ndawonye ukucacisa inombolo yenkanyezi yakwaRossby, ehambelana nokuhamba kwe-plasma.
Uma incane inani le-Rossby, kuzoba kuncane ukusebenza kwezinkanyezi kazibuthe azobamba.
Bathole ukuthi iLanga lisebenza ngezimiso ezifanayo nezinye izinkanyezi: Ukusebenza kwazo zonke izinkanyezi zezwe kutholakale ukuthi zibenza ngokugqama kwazo, ukujikeleza kwazo, futhi akukho okunye.
Ukukhanya nokujikeleza zisetshenziselwa kanye ukumisa inombolo ye-Rossby yenkanyezi, ehambisana nokuhamba kwe plasma.
Lingalincane inani le-Rossby, kuzobe kuncane ukusebenza kwezinkanyezi maqondana nokubuyiswa ngemuva yimagnethi.
Bathola ukuthi iLanga lisebenza ngendlela efanayo nakwezinye izinkanyezi: Umsebenzi wazo zonke izinkanyezi endaweni yonke kunqunywe ukuthi unembe, njengokuhamba kwawo, nokuzungeza kwawo.
Ukukhanya nokuzungezisa kusetshenziswa ndawonye ukucacisa inombolo yenkanyezi yakwaRossby, ehambelana nokugeleza kwe-plasma.
Uma incane inombolo kaRossby, ukusebenza kancane kwezinkanyezi amandla kazibuthe azobamba.
URobin Uthappa ngoyena ube namanqaku maninzi kwii-iining, imitsi eyi-70 kwiibhola eziyi-41 ebetha amanqaku amane ayi-11, namathandathu ayi-2.
Ababethi abaphakathi abakwi oda, uSachin Tendulkar kunye noRahul Dravid, baqhube kakuhle kwaye benza ubudlelwane obulikhulu.
Kodwa,emveni kokulahlekelwa nguthinti ka Kaptein I India ifumene izigaba iziyi 36 yaphulukana noothinti abayi 7 ukuphelisa umdlalo.
URobin Uthappa wenza ama-innings abe aphezulu kakhulu, wenze ama-runs awe-70 kumabhola awu-41 nje ngokushaya ama-fours awu-11 kanye nama-sixes amabini.
Amadoda abhethayo-bat kwikhilikithi adlalela phakathi, u-Sachin Tendulkar no-Rahul Dravid, bedlale kahle futhi benza umsebenzisano wokugijima ka-100.
Kodwa, ngemva kokuba kukhiswhe ukaputeni wayo, iNdiya yenze amaphuzu angu-36 kuphela ilahlekelwa amawikhethi angu-7 kuze kube sekugcineni kwengxenye yomdlalo.
URobin Uthappa ubenamaphuzu amaningi kuma-ining, ama-runs angama-70 emabholeni angama-41 ashiya amaphuzu ayi-11 namaphuzu ayisithupha ayi-2.
Abashayisibhakela abaphakathi ku-oda, uSachin Tendulkar noRahul Dravid, baqhube kahle futhi benza ubudlelwano obukhulu.
Kodwa-ke, ngemuva kokulahlekelwa ngumdlalo kaKaptein i-India ithole izigaba ezingama-36 yalahla amaphuzu angama-7 ukuqeda umdlalo.
Uthappa kuba URobin nezihloko eziningi for the iining, imitsi ezinye balls 70-izihloko ezine by wathi 41-11, kuyinto eziyisithupha-2.
Phakathi kwaze kwaba abantu us, usachin noRahul tendulkar And Dravid, base kahle run futhi benza ubuhlobo obulikhulu.
Kodwa, emva ukulahlekelwa isigaba ii othinti Kaptein India yaphulukana bathola 36 7 othinti the iziyi ukuqeda umdlalo.
URobin Uthappa ngoyena ube namaphuzu maningi kuma-iining, imitsi engu-70 kumabhola angu-41 eshaya amagoli amane kwangu-11, neyisithupha kwangu-2.
Abebethi abebephakathi abakwi odabeni, uSachin Tendulkar kanye noRahul Dravid, baqhube kahle futhi benza ubudlelwano obulikhulu.
Kodwa,ngemva kokulahlekelwa nguthinti ka Kaptein I India ithole izigaba iziyi 36 yalahlekelwa inothinti abayi-7 ukuqeda umdlalo.
URobin Uthappa ube namagoli amaningi kwi-inning, ama-runs angu-70 emabholeni angu-41 eshaya amagoli angu-11, kwathi ayisithupha ayisithupha.
Abagadli abaphakathi kulo mhlangano, uSachin Tendulkar noRahul Dravid, benze kahle futhi benza ubudlelwano obuhle.
Kodwa-ke, ngemuva kokulahlekelwa wukudla kukaKaptein, i-India ithole amaphuzu angama-36 yalahlekelwa ngamawothinti ayi-7 ukuqeda umdlalo.
URobin Uthappa ngoyena ubenamaphuzu maningi kuma-iining, imiguzu engu-70 emabholeni angu-11 eshaya amaphuzu amane angu-11, neziyisithupha ezingu-2.
Ababethi abaphakathi abakwi oda, uSachin Tendulkar noRahul Dravid, baqhube kahle futhi benza ubudlelwano obulikhulu.
Kodwa,emva kokulahlekelwa uthini ka Kaptein I India ithole izigaba iziyi 36 kwephulwa nothingo abayi 7 ukuqeda umdlalo.
URobin Uthappa ube namagoli amaningi kwi-inning, ama-runs angu-70 emabholeni angama-41 eshaya amaphuzu ayi-11, kwathi ayisithupha ayisithupha.
Abagadli abaphakathi kulo mhlangano, uSachin Tendulkar noRahul Dravid, benze kahle futhi bakha ubudlelwano obuhle.
Kodwa-ke, ngemuva kokulahlekelwa ngumdlalo kaKaptein i-India inqobe amaphuzu angama-36 yalahla amaphuzu ayi-7 ukuqeda umdlalo.
Kubantu abayi-1,400 abavotelweyo phambi konyulo luka-2010, abo bachasa i-Australia ekubeni yiriphabliki bakhule ngeepesenti ezisibhozo ukusukela ngo-2008.

Ekhathalayo inkulubaphathiswa u Julia Gillard ubange ngelithi ngethuba lokukhampeynela konyulo luka 2010 lwe federal ukuba wakholelwa ukuba i-Australia imele yenziwe iriphablikhi ekupheleni kolawulo luka Kumkanikazi u-Elizabeth II.
Iipesenti ezingama-34 zabo bavotayo babelana ngolu luvo, befuna ukuba uKumkanikazi uElizabeth II abe yikumkani yokugqibela yase-Australia.

Kwimeko yovavanyo olugqithisileyo, iipesenti ezingama-29 zabo baphononongiweyo bakholelwa ukuba i-Australia kufuneka ibe yiriphabliki ngokukhawuleza, ngelixa i-31 pesenti ikholelwa ukuba i-Australia akufuneki ibe yiriphabliki.
Phakathi kwabantu abangu-1,400 abavote ngaphambi kokhetho lukahulumeni 2010, labo ababengavumelani nokuthi i-Australia ibe iriphabhuliki banda ngamaphesenti angu-8 kusukela ngo-2008.

UNdunankulu Wokunakekela uJulia Gillard wathi phakathi nomkhankaso wokhetho lwango-2010 wayekholelwa ukuthi i-Astralia kumelwe ibe izwe elibuswa ngentando yeningi ngemva kokubusa kweNdlovukazi uElizabeth II.
Amaphesenti angu-34 walabo abavotayo unalombono, ufuna Indlovukazi u-Elizabeth II ukuba abe umbusi wokugcina wase-Australia.

Emananini adlulele wokuvota, amaphesentu angu-29 walabo ababuzwe imibuzo bakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kumelwe ibe yiriphabhuliki ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka, kuyilapho amaphesenti angu-31 akholelwa ukuthi i-Australia akumelwe ibe yiriphabhuliki.
Kubantu abangu-1 400 abavotelwe ngaphambi kokhetho lwango-2010, labo ababephikisana ne-Australia ngokuba yi-republic bakhule ngamaphesenti ayisishiyagalombili kusukela ngo-2008.

UNdunankulu okhathalelayo uJulia Gillard uthi ngesikhathi sokhetho lokhetho lwango-2010 lwaseFederal ukholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kufanele yenziwe kabusha ekupheleni kokubusa kweNdlovukazi u-Elizabeth II.
Amaphesenti angama-34 abavoti abelane ngalo mbono, efuna ukuthi u-Elizabeth II. abe yinkosi yokugcina yase-Australia.

Endabeni yesivivinyo esinzima, amaphesenti angama-29 alabo okwaxoxwa nabo bakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kufanele ibe yiriphabhuliki ngokushesha, kuyilapho amaphesenti angama-31 akholelwa ukuthi i-Australia akufanele ibe yiriphabhuliki.
Not abantu-luka abavotelweyo 1,400 ngaphambi kokhetho - 2010, labo abaphikisa yiriphabliki Australia basuke kokuba kusukela amaphesenti ayisishiyagalombili cent in 2008.

Julia Gillard ngeke inkulubaphathisa Ekhathalayo a grade of luka ngesikhathi 2010 federal ukhetho ukukhampeynela ukuthi angikholwa Ukuthi Australia kufanele kube ifolda wadala ekupheleni the republic of luka the queen-Elizabeth II.
Iphesenti ingqikithi 34 bavotayo by babelana yabo lo mqondo, uma befuna ukuba owokugcina yikumkani uElizabeth indlovukazi Australia.

Ngokwedlulele uma kwecala, iphesenti ingqikithi 29 yabo baphononongiweyo bakholelwa Ukuthi Australia kufanele ngokushesha yiriphabliki, kanti angu-31 bakholelwa ukuthi kumelwe kube yiriphabliki Australia.
Kubantu abangu-1,400 abavotelwe ngaphambi komunyu ka-2010, labo abamelana ne-Australia ekubeni yiriphabliki bakhule ngamaphesenti ayisishiyagalombili ukusukela ngo-2008.

Okukhathalayo ngobukhulu baphathiswa u Julia Gillard ubange ngelithi ngesikhathi sokukhampeynela komunyu ka 2010 federal ukuthi wakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kumele yenziwe iriphablikhi ekupheleni kokubusa kwe Nkosikazi u-Elizabeth II.
Amaphesenti angu-34 alabo abavotayo babelana ngoluvo, befuna ukuba yiNkosi u-Elizabeth II abe yinkosi yokugcina yase-Australia.

Endabeni yokuhlolwa ngokweqile, amaphesenti angu-29 abo abuyekeziwe akholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kufanele ibe yiriphabliki esheshayo, ngenkathi i-31 phesenti ikholelwa ukuthi i-Australia ayidingeki ibe yiriphabliki.
Abantu abangu-1,400 abavotelweyo ngaphambi kokhetho lwango-2010, labo ababephikisana ne-Australia njengeRiphabhulikhi bakhule ngamaphesenti ayisishiyagalombili kusukela ngo-2008.
UNdunankulu uJulia Gillard uthi ngesikhathi somkhankaso wokhetho lwango-2010 wayekholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kumele yenziwe i-republic ekupheleni kokubusa kweNdlovukazi u-Elizabeth II.
Amaphesenti angama-34 alabo abavotayo abelana ngalo mbono, befuna ukuthi u-Elizabeth Elizabeth II abe yinkosi yokugcina yase-Australia.

Isimo sesivivinyo esinzima, amaphesenti angama-29 alabo okwaxoxwa nabo bakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kufanele ibe yi-republic ngokushesha, kuyilapho amaphesenti angu-31 akholelwa ukuthi ama-Australia akufanele abe yiriphabhuliki.
Kubantu abangu-1,400 abavotelwe ngaphambi kokhetho luka-2010, labo abachasisa i-Australia ekubeni yiriphabliki bakhule ngamaphesenti ayisishiyagalombili kusukela ngo-2008.

Ekhathalayo inkulukazi u Julia Gillard ubange ngelithi ngethuba lokukhampeynela kokhetho luka 2010 lwe federal ukuthi wakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia imele yenziwe iriphablikhi ekupheleni kokubusa kukaNkosikazi u-Elizabeth II.
Amaphesenti angu-34 alabo abavotayo babelana kanje ngovo, befuna ukuthi uNkosikazi u-Elizabeth II abe ngumbuso wokugcina wase-Australia.

Esimweni sokuhlolwa okwedlule, amaphesenti angu-29 alabo ababuyekeziwe bakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kufanele ibe yiriphabliki ngokushesha, kuyilapho ama-31 pesenti akholelwa ukuthi i-Australia akufanele ibe yiriphabliki.
Kubantu abangu-1 400 abavota ngaphambi kokhetho lwango-2010, labo ababephikisana ne-Australia njenge-republic bakhule ngamaphesenti ayisishiyagalombili kusukela ngo-2008.

UNdunankulu okhathazekile uJulia Gillard wathi ngesikhathi somkhankaso wokhetho lwenhlangano ka-2010 wathi ukholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kumele yenziwe kabusha ngesikhathi sokubusa kweNdlovukazi u-Elizabeth II.
Amaphesenti angama-34 abavoti abelane ngalo mbono, efuna ukuthi u-Elizabeth Elizabeth II abe yinkosi yokugcina yase-Australia.

Endabeni yesivivinyo esinzima, amaphesenti angama-29 alabo okwaxoxwa nabo bakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kufanele ibe yi-republic ngokushesha, kuyilapho amaphesenti angama-31 akholelwa ukuthi i-Australia akufanele ibe yiriphabhuliki.
Zonke izikrobo zomqolomba, ezazithiywe "Oodade Abasixhenxe", zingange 100 yeemitha ukuya ku-250 weemitha (amanyathelo ayi328 ukuya ku820) ukuxwesa.
Imifanekiso ye-Infrared ibonisa umahluko kwiqondo lobushushu phakathi kobusuku nemini ibonisa Ukuba kusenokwenzeka yimiqolombha.
"Zipholile kuneendawo ezisondeleyo emini futhi zifudumale ebusuku.

Ubushushu bayo abufani njengemiqolomba emikhulu eMhlabeni ehlala igcina ubushushu obungagungqiyo, kodwa iyahambelana nale meko yokuba yimingxunya enzulu emhlabeni," utshilo uGlen Cushing wese United States Geological Survey (USGS) IQela le-Astrogeology yaseMelika kunye neYunivesithi yase-Arizona eseFlagstaff, eArizona.
Zonke izindawo zokungena emhumeni, ezazibizwa ngokuthi "Odadewabo abayiSikhombisa", zingububanzi ngokungenani obungamamitha angu-100 kuya kwangu-250 (amafidi angu-328 kuya kwangu-820).
Izithombe eziveza ukushisa zibonisa ukuthi ukuhlukahlukana kokushisa kwasebusuku nasemini kubonisa ukuthi zifana nomgede.
"Ipholile kunezindawo ezizizungezile emini futhi ifudumale ebusuku.

Ukuziphatha kwayo kokushisa akuzinzanga njengemigede emikhulu eMhlabeni leyo egcina izinga lokushisa cishe elifanayo kaningi, kodwa iyafana nalena ngokuba imigodi ejulile enhlabathini," kwasho uGlen Cushing we-United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team kanye neNorthern Arizona University eseFlagstaff, e-Arizona.
Yonke imigede yomhume, eyayibizwa nge "Oodadewabo abayisikhombisa", ingamamitha ayi-100 kuya ku-250 wamamitha (ama-328 kuya ku-820 amagadango) ubuhle.
Izithombe ze-infrared zikhombisa umehluko emazingeni okushisa phakathi kobusuku nemini okukhombisa ukuthi kungenzeka kube nemihume.
"Zipholile kunezindawo eziseduze emini futhi zifudumale ebusuku.

Izinga lokushisa kwalo alifani nelomhume abakhulu kunabo bonke eMhlabeni, ohlale unezinga lokushisa njalo, kodwa uhambelana nokuba ngomunye wemigodi ejulile emhlabeni, "kusho uGlen Cushing we-United States Geological Survey (USGS).
Zonke zomqolomba izikrobo, ezazithiywe "Odade Abayisikhombisa", a yeemitha kuya 100-250 of smith (820 izinyathelo ayi328) ukuxwesa.
Izithombe of the Infrared show umehluko lokushisa phakathi imini nobusuku bangase babonise Ukuthi yimiqolombha.
"Isipho ebusuku nemini nendawo izisondeleyo ukufudumala.

Ukushisa kwenjengemiqolomba yakhe kuhlala emhlabeni njenge-obungagungqiyo enkulu egcina ukushisa, kodwa imingxunya efanelana nezimo ezijulile emhlabeni, " kusho Ukushisa E-United States Geological Survey uGlen (USGS) Iqembu Ne-Astrogeology yaseMelika neYunivesithi Yase-Arizona eseFlagstaff, eArizona.
Zonke izikrobo zomhume, ezazithiywe "Odade abayisikhombisa", zingange 100 wamamitha afinyelela ku-250 wamamitha (izinyathelo eziwu328 kuya ku-820) ukuxwesa.
Isithombe se-Infrared sibonisa umehluko ngezinga lokushisa phakathi kwamabili nemini ibonisa Uma kungenzeka kube yimiqolombha.
"Zipholile kunezindawo eziseduze emini futhi zifudumale ebusuku.

Ukushisa kwayo abufani njengemihume emikhulu eMhlabeni ehlala igcina ukushisa okungagungqiwe, kodwa iyahambisana nalesi simo sokuba yizingxunya ezijulile emhlabeni," kusho uGlen Cushing we-United States Geological Survey (USGS) Iqembu le-Astrogeology laseMelika kanye neNyuvesi yase-Arizona eseFlagstaff, e-Arizona.
Yonke imigede yomhume, eyayibizwa nge-"odade Abayisikhombisa", ingamamitha ayi-100 kuya kuma-250 metres (ama-328 kuya ku-820).
Izithombe ze-infrared zikhombisa umehluko emazingeni okushisa phakathi kobusuku nemini okukhombisa ukuthi kungenzeka kube khona imihume.
"Zipholile kunezindawo ezizungezile emini futhi zifudumale ebusuku.

Heat bayo abufani njengemihume emikhulu eMhlabeni ehlala njalo enezinga lokushisa njalo, kodwa uhambelana nalesi simo sokuba yimigodi ejulile emhlabeni ", kusho uGlen Cushing we-United States Geological Survey (USGS). I-Astrogeology yaseMelika ne-University of Arizona eseFlagstaff, e-Arizona.
Zonke izikhali zomhume, ezazizondwe "Oodade Abayisikhombisa", zingange 100 wamamitha kuya ku-250 wamamitha (amanyathelo angu328 kuya ku820) ukuxwasa.
Izithombe ze-Infrared zibonisa umehluko emqondweni wokushisa phakathi kwamabili nosuku zibonisa ukuthi kungenzeka yimihuzuko.
"Zipholile kunezindawo eziseduze emini futhi zithuthele ebusuku.

Ukushisa kwayo akufani njengemigogodla emikhulu eMhlabeni ehlala igcina ukushisa okungaguquguquki, kodwa kuyahambisana nalesi simo sokuba yimigodi ejulile emhlabeni," kusho uGlen Cushing wese United States Geological Survey (USGS) IQembu le-Astrogeology laseMelika neNyuvesi yase-Arizona eliseFlagstaff, e-Arizona.
Yonke imigede yomgede, eyayibizwa nge "Sisters Seven", ingamamitha ayi-100 kuye kuma-250 metres (ama-328 kuya ku-820 amagadango) ngaphesheya.
Izithombe ze-infrared zikhombisa umehluko emazingeni okushisa phakathi kobusuku nemini okukhombisa ukuthi kungenzeka kube khona imihume.
"Ayabanda kunezindawo ezizungezile emini futhi afudumele ebusuku.

Izinga lokushisa kwalo alifani nelemihume emikhulu eMhlabeni, ehlala igcina ukushisa okungaguquki, kepha kuhambisana nokuthi ingenye yemigodi ejulile emhlabeni, "kusho uGlen Cushing wase-United States. Ucwaningo lweGeological (USGS).
Abantu bokuqala ukosulelwa sesi sifo kweli xesha lonyaka baxelwe ngasekuphelni kwenyanga yeKhala.
Esi sifo sithwalwa ziihagu, size emva koko sifudukele ebantwini singena ngeengcongconi.

Ukugqbhuka kwesifo kuye kwabangela ukuba urhulumente wase-Indiya athathe amanyathelo afana nokuthunyelwa kwababambisi beehagu kwiindawo ezichaphazeleke kakhulu, esasaza amawaka amakhethini eengcongconi kunye nokutshiza i-pesticides.
Izigidi ezininzi zeebhotile zokuthintela isifo se-encephalitis nazo zithenjisiwe ngurhulumente, eziza kunceda ekulungiseleleni iiarhente zempilo zonyaka olandelayo.
Izicwangciso zokuhanjiswa kwezitofu kwiindawo ezazichaphazeleke kakhulu kulo nyaka zacothiswa ngenxa yokunqongophala kwemali kunye nokubekwa phambili ngokubaluleka kwezinye izifo.
Ukuba khona kwesifo kulenkathi kwaqala ukubikwa ekupheleni kukaJulayi.
Lesi sifo sitholakala ezingulubeni, esidlulela ebantwini ngominyane.

Lolu bhubhane lushukumise uhulumeni waseNdiya ukuba athathe izinyathelo ezinjengokuthumela ababamba izingulube ezindaweni ezithinteke kakhulu, ukusakaza izigidi zamakhethini womiyane kanye nokufutha imithi ebulala izinambuzane.
Izigidi ezimbalwa zamabhodlela womjovo wesifo sobuchopho zithenjiswe uhulumeni, azosiza ukulungiselela izinhlangano zezempilo unyaka ozayo.
Izinhlelo zemijovo okumelwe ithunyelwe ezindaweni ezithinteke kakhulu ngokomlando kulonyaka zilibazisiwe ngenxa yokungabi nemali nokungathathwa njengokubalulekile uma kuqhathaniswa nezinye izifo.
Abantu bokuqala ukutheleleka kwalesi sifo kulesi sikhathi sonyaka babikwa ngasekupheleni kwenyanga kaKhala.
Lesi sifo sithwalwa yizingulube, bese sithuthela kubantu ngomiyane.

Ukuqubuka kwesifo kuye kwabangela ukuthi uhulumeni waseNdiya athathe izinyathelo ezinjengokuthunyelwa kwababambisi bezingulube ezindaweni ezithinteke kakhulu, ukusabalalisa izinkulungwane zamakhethini omiyane nokushisa ama-pesticides.
Izigidi zamabhodlela amaningi okuvimbela isifo se-encephalitis nawo athenjisiwe nguhulumeni, ozosiza ekulungiseleleni ama-ejensi ezempilo ngonyaka olandelayo.
Izinhlelo zokugoma zemithi yokugoma ezindaweni ezithinteke kakhulu kulo nyaka zihlukaniswa ngenxa yokushoda kwemali nokubekwa phambili kwezinye izifo.
Abantu ukosulelwa lesi sifo ngenkathi yokuqala kule nyanga yekhala ngasekuphelni esibekiwe.
Lesi sifo bathwalwa ziihagu, bese sathuthela abantu ngeengcongconi.

Ukugqbhuka kwesifo esibangela ukuba athuthe uhulumeni - njengezinyathelo zokulawula ukuthekelisa futhi athathe izinyathelo zokwababambisi indian beehagu abathintekayo izindawo zinkulu, futhi ukusabalala eengcongconi ikhethi izinkulungwane sishaye zinambuzane.
Amabhodlela amaningi ukuze avimbele izigidi zezifo-isifo sokusha kobuchopho zithenjisiwe nguhulumeni, okuyinto kuzosiza agency ekulungiseleleni impilo ngonyaka ozayo.
In the izilungiselelo indawo sitofu kokuhanjisa zacothisa ezazichaphazeleeke ngenxa yokuntula imali kulo nyaka futhi angase abeke ukubaluleka kwezinye izifo.
Abantu bokuqala ukosulelwa lesi sifo kulesi sikhathi sonyaka babikwa ngasekuphelni kwenyanga kaKhala.
Lesi sifo sithwalwa yizingulube, size ngemuva kwalokho sifudukele ebantwini singena ngamangcosana.

Ukugqbhuka kwesifo kuye kwabangela ukuthi uhulumeni wase-India athathe izinyathelo ezifana nokuthunyelwa kwababambisi bezingulube ezindaweni ezithintekile kakhulu, esakaza izinkulungwane zamakhethini omiyane kanye nokushitsha i-pesticides.
Izigidi eziningi zamabhodlela okuvimbela isifo se-encephalitis nazo zithenjisiwe nguhulumeni, ezizosiza ekulungiseleleni ama-encephalitis ezempilo yonyaka olandelayo.
Amasu okusatshalaliswa kwezitofu ezindaweni ezazithinteke kakhulu kulo nyaka zacothiswa ngenxa yokuntuleka kwemali nokubekwa phambili ngokubaluleka kwezinye izifo.
Abantu bokuqala ukutheleleka ngalesi sikhathi sonyaka babikwa kuphelni kwenyanga yeKhala.
Lesi sifo sithwalwa izingulube, bese sifudukele kubantu ngomiyane.

Lesi sifo sidluliselwa izingulube, bese zidlulela kubantu bese zibathelele ngomiyane.

Izigidi zamabhodlela amabhodlela okuvimbela i-encephalitis nawo athenjisiwe nguhulumeni, ozosiza ukulungisa ama-ejensi ezempilo kulo nyaka ozayo.

Xa umlo uphelile emva kokuba owonzakeleyo ethunyelwe esibhedlele, malunga ne-40 yamanye amabanjwa aseleyo ahlala eyadini akwala ukubuyela kwizisele zawo.
Abaxolelanisi bazama ukuyilungisa imeko, kodwa izidingo zamabanjwa azicacanga.
Phakathi kwentsimbi ye-10: 00-11: 00 pm MDT, umlilo uqalwe ngamabanjwa eyadini.
Kungekudala, amagosa afakelwe izixhobo zoqhushululu angena eyadini aza avalela amabanjwa irhasi yenyembezi.
Kuthe isiba ngu-11:35 pm, abacimi-mlilo babe bede bakwazi ukuwucima umlilo.
Lapho impi inqamukangemva kokuba abalimele bathunyelwe esibhedlele, iziboshwa ezicishe zibe ngu-40 ezisele zihlale egcekeni futhi zenqaba ukubuyela ezitokisini zazo.
Abaxoxisanyao bazama ukulungisa isimo, kodwa izikhalazo zeziboshwa azicacile.
Phakathi kuka-10:00-11:00 pm MDT, umlilo waqalwa iziboshwa egcekeni.
Ngokushesha, izikhulu ezihlome ngempahla yokuzivikela kwababhikishayo zangena egcekeni zavimbezela iziboshwa ngesisi esikhipha unyembezi.

Lapho umlo uphela ngemuva kokuthi abalimele bethunyelwe esibhedlela, cishe ezinye iziboshwa ezingama-40 ezazisele egcekeni zigcwele ukubuyela ezisele zazo.
Abalamuli bazama ukulungisa isimo, kepha izidingo zeziboshwa bezingacaci.

Ngokushesha, izikhulu zifakwe imishini yokushisa zingena egcekeni zizovalela iziboshwa igesi lezinyembezi.
Ngo-11: 35 ebusuku, izicishamlilo zikwazi ukucisha umlilo.

Abaxolelani bazama ukulungisa icala, kodwa iziboshwa zidinga i-azicacanga.

Phakathi kwensimbi ye-10: 00-11: 00 pm MDT, umlilo uqalwe yiziboshwa eyadini.
Ngokushesha, izikhulu zifakelwe izikhali zokuqhulula zingena eyadini azovalela iziboshwa irasi yenzembezi.
Kuthe isiba ngu-11:35 pm, abacimi-mlilo babe baze bakwazi ukuwucima umlilo.
Lapho impi iphela ngemuva kokuthi abalimele bethunyelwe esibhedlela, cishe ezinye iziboshwa ezingama-40 ezazisele egcekeni zenqaba ukubuyela ezitokisini zazo.
Abalamuli bazamile ukulungisa lesi simo, kepha izidingo zeziboshwa bezingacaci.
Phakathi kuka-10: 00-11: 00 pm MDT, umlilo uqalwe yiziboshwa egcekeni.
Ngokushesha, abaphangi abahlomile bahlasela igceke futhi bavalela iziboshwa ngesisi esikhalisa unyembezi.
Ngo-11: 35 ebusuku, izicishamlilo zikwazile ukucisha lo mlilo.
"Ngoku sinempunku enenyanga ezine engenaswekile eyayifudula ineswekile," wongeze ngelitshoyo.

Ugqirha Ehud Ur, unjingalwazi wezonyango eYunivesithi yasee-Dalhousie e-Halifax, e-Nova Scotia ekwangusihlali wesebe lezophononongo kunye nesayensi kwi-Canadian Diabetes Association, ulumkise ngokuba uphando lusaqala.
Njengezinye iingcali, uyathandabuza ukuba ingaba isifo seswekile siyanyangeka na, esazi ukuba ezi zinto azinanto kwenza nabantu esele benesifo seswekile sohlobo 1.
"Manje sinamagundane anezinyanga ezingu-4 angenawo ushukela ayenoshukela," wanezela.

UDkt. Ehud Ur, uprofesa wezokwelapha eNyuvesi yaseDalhousie eHalifax, eNova Scotia kanye nosihlalo womnyango wezokwelapha nowesayensi weCanadian Diabetes Association uxwayise ngokuthi ucwaningo lusanda kuqala.
Njengezinye izazi, unokungabaza ngokuthi isifo sikashukela singalashwa, ephawula ukuthi lokhu okutholakele akubathinti abantu abanoHlobo ike some other experts, he lukashukela.
"Manje sinegundane elingenashukela elinezinyanga ezine ebelinoshukela," engeza.
UDkt Ehud Ur, ongusolwazi lwezokwelapha eDalhousie University eHalifax, eNova Scotia ongusihlali womnyango wezocwaningo nesayensi eCanadian Diabetes Association, uxwayise ngokuthi ucwaningo lusaqala.
Njengabachwepheshe abaningi, uyangabaza ukuthi isifo sikashukela siyelashwa, azi ukuthi azinalutho yini ukwenza nabantu asebevele benesifo sikashukela sohlobo 1.
"Futhi manje lezi enenyanga engenaswekile eyayifudula sinempunku iswekile," ngelitshoyo wanezela.

R Ehud doctor, uprofesa waseyunivesithi yaseyasee wezonyango - Dalhousie E Halifax, e-Scotia kanye nomnyango Var in the nesayeni kwangusihlali lezophononongo-Canadian Diabetes Association, waxwayisa usaqala ucwaningo.
Professionals njengoba ngezinye izikhathi, isifo kanye siyanyangeka iswekile uyathandabuza uma ikhona, wayazi ukuthi laba bantu benze izinto azinanto nge uhlobo 1 futhi iswekile lesi sifo.
"Manje sinempunku enenyanga ezine engenashukela eyayifudumele inoshukela," wengeze ngelishoyo.

"Manje sinegundane elingenashukela elinezinyanga ezine ubudala elinoshukela", engeza.

Kuba iintsiba zedinosaur zingena kumila okukwakhekileyo, eluthiwa yirachis, kodwa zinazo ezinye iimpawu zeentsiba — ibarbs nebarbules — abaphandi baqikelele intoyokuba irachis yakhekhe kunezinye iintsiba ezi.

Ubume beentsiba bubonisa ukuba zazingasetyenziswa kubhabho kodwa endaweni yokulawula ubushushu okanye ukubonisa. Abaphandi bacebise ukuba, nangona lo ingumsila wedayinaso encinci, isampulu ibonisa iintsiba zabantu abadala hayi intshontsho phantsi.

Ngenxa yokuthi izimpaphe zama-dinosaur aziso isiqu esikhule kahle, osibizwa ngokuthi i-rachis, kodwa zinezinye izici zezimpaphe — izindlendla kanye nama-barbule — abacwaningi baphethe ngokuthi i-rachis cishe bekungukwakheka kokuziphendukela kunalezinye izici.

Ukwakheka kwezimpaphe kusikisela ukuthi bezingasetshenziselwa ukundiza kodwa kunalokho ukulawula ukushisa kanye nokuzibonakalisa. Abacwaningi basikisela ukuthi, nakuba lona kungumsila we-dinosaur encane, isampula liveza izimpaphe zendala futhi hhayi isihluphe somntwanyana.

. Ososayensi bathi lesi silwane sasinsundu nge-chestnut ngaphezulu nombala ophansi noma i-carotenoid.

"Ziyakukwenza inzame zokunciphisa I-carbon dioxide ngokwe unit ye-GDP eqaphelekayo ngo 2020 ukusuka kwizinga lika 2005," utshilo u-Hu.
Akakhange abeke nani ekuza kunqunyulwa kulo, esithi luya kwenziwa ngokusekelwe kumphumo wezoqoqosho lwaseTshayina.
U-Hu ukhuthaze amazwe asaphuhlayo "ukunqandaindlela endala wokungcolisa kuqala nokucoca kamva."
Wongeze wathi "akufuneki, nokuba, bacelwe ukuba bathathe uxanduva oludlula kwinqanaba labo lokukhula, uxanduva kunye namandla abo."
"Sizophumelela ukunciphisa inani lomoya ogcolile ngesikali se-GDP ngezinga eliphawulekayo ngo-2020 ukusuka esilinganisweni sango-2005," kusho u-Hu.
Akazange alibeke inani lezanhlukaniselwano, ethi zizokwenziwa ngokomphumela womnotho waseChina.
UHu ukhuthaze amazwe athuthukayo "ukugwema indlela yakudala yokugcolisa kuqala bese uhlanza kamuva."
Wanezela ukuthi “akumelwe, nokho, bacelwe bathathe ukuzibophezela okungaphezu kwesigaba sabo sentuthuko, imithwalo yemfanelo kanye namakhono.”
"Bazokwenza imizamo yokwehlisa i-carbon dioxide ngokuvumelana nenani eliphelele le-GDP ngo-2020 kusuka ngo-2005," kusho uHu.
Akakaze abeke nani ekuzonqunywa kulo, ethi kuzokwenziwa ngokusekelwe kumphumela wezomnotho waseChina.
U-Hu ukhuthaze amazwe asathuthuka ukuthi "ayeke indlela endala yokungcolisa kuqala nokuhlanza kamuva."
Ubuye wengeza wathi "akufanele, nokho, bacelwe ukuthi bathathe imithwalo yemfanelo engaphezu kwezinga labo lokukhula, imithwalo yemfanelo namandla."
"Ziyakukwenza of the imizamo ukunciphisa carbon dioxide njengoba by unit of gdp by 2020 inani eqaphelekayo kusukela 2005 ukusika," uthe Of The Web.
It ngeke ngikubeke kunqunyula, wathi kuyothiwa isekelwe kwezomnotho lwaseTshayina umumo.
A-asaphuhlayo ukugqugquzela Laboratory international " njengoba elidala inhlamba lemifanekiso kanye kuqala ukunqandaindla kamuva."
Wanezela: "nokho, kumelwe sicele ukuba baqikelele ukukhula kwabo ezingeni, nomthwalo wemfanelo wamandla abo."
"Ziyakwenza imizamo yokunciphisa I-carbon dioxide ngokusho kwe-GDP unit eqaphelekayo ngo 2020 kusukela izinga lika 2005," kusho u-Hu.
Akakhange abeke nani ekuzanqunywa kulo, ethi luzokwenziwa ngokusekelwe kumphumela wezomnotho waseChina.
U-Hu ukhuthaze amazwe asaphuhlayo "ukunqanda indlela endala yokungcolisa kuqala nokuhlanza kamuva."
Wengeze wathi "akufanele, ngisho noma, bacelwe ukuba bathathe isibopho esidlula ezingeni labo lokukhula, isibopho namandla abo."
"Bazokwenza imizamo yokwehlisa ukukhishwa kwe-carbon dioxide ngokwe-GDP unit eqaphelekayo ngo-2020 kusuka ngo-2005", kusho uHu.
Akazange aqambe ukusikwa, wathi kuzosuselwa kumthelela wezomnotho waseChina.

Akazange abeke nani okuzonqunywa kulo, ethi kuzokwenziwa ngokusekelwe emphumeleni wezomnotho waseChina.

Wengeze wathi "akudingeki, ngisho, bacelwe ukuba bathathe umthwalo odlula esigabeni sabo sokukhula, umthwalo namandla abo."
"Bazokwenza imizamo yokwehlisa ukukhishwa kwe-carbon dioxide wuphiko olubalulekile lwe-GDP ngonyaka ka-2020 kusuka ngo-2005," kusho uHu.
Akazange aqambe ukusikwa, wathi kuzosuselwa kumthelela wezomnotho waseChina.
U-Hu unxuse amazwe asathuthuka ukuthi "ayeke indlela endala yokungcolisa kuqala bese ehlanza kamuva."

Akukho zithuthi zongezelelweyo zibekwayo kwaye oololiwe abangaphantsi komhlaba abayi kuma eWembley, kwaye iindawo zokupaka iimoto kunye neendawo zokupaka nokukhwela azifumaneki emhlabeni.
Ukoyikela ukungabikho kwemoto zokuhamba abantu kwenze koyikiselwa ukuba lo mdlalo ungangabinababukeli abaxhasa iqela.
Azikho izinto zokuthutha ezibekwayo futhi izitimela ezihamba phezulu ngeke zime eWembli, futhi ukupaka izimoto kanye nezindawo zokupaka nokugibela azitholakali enkundleni.
Ukwesaba kokungabi khona kwezinto zokuthutha kwenze ukuthi kube nokwenzeka ukuthi umdlalo uphoqelelwe ukudlalwa ngasese ngaphandle kwabathandi beqembu.
Azikho izimoto ezengeziwe ezibekwayo futhi izitimela ezingaphansi komhlaba ngeke zibe seWembley, futhi izindawo zokupaka izimoto nezindawo zokupaka izimoto azitholakali emhlabeni.
Ukwesaba ukungabi khona kwezimoto zokuhamba kwabantu kwenze kwasatshalaliswa ukuthi lo mdlalo ungangabi nezibukeli ezisekela iqembu.
Akukho ezokuthutha wesitimela kanye zongezelweyo zibekwayo the eWembley kufanele ngaphansi komhlaba, futhi yokupaka ngemoto yokupaka kanye umqansa awatholakali emhlabeni.

Ocelots ziyathanda ukutya izilwanyana ezincinci. Ziza kubamba iinkawu, iinyoka, iimpuku neentaka ukuba zinako. Phantse zonke izilwanyana ezizingelwa zii-ocelot zincinci kakhulu kunokuba zinjalo.
Ososayensi bacinga ukuba ii-ocelots zilandela yaye zifumane izilwanyana( ixhoba layo) enokuzitya ngokunukisa,irhogole apho bezihamba khona emhlabeni.
Zibona kakuhle ebumnyameni ngombono wasebusuku, kwaye zihamba ngokuzimela. Ii-Ocelots zizingela ixhoba lazo ngokudibanisa kunye neendawo ezizingqongileyo emva koko ziphose ixhoba lazo.

Amakati wasendle amakhulu waseMelika athanda ukudla izilwane ezincane. Azobamba izimfene, izinyoka, izilwane eziququdayo kanye nezinyoni uma angakwazi. Cishe zonke izilwane ezizingelwa yilawa makati zincane kakhulu kunawo.
Ososayensi bakholelwa ukuthi amakati amakhulu waseMelika alandelela futhi athola izilwane zokuzidla (izilwane ezizingelwayo) ngokunuka, efufuza lapho bezikhona phansi.

Ayakwazi ukubona kahle kakhulu ebumnyameni ngekhono lokubona ebusuku, abuye ahambe ngesinyenyela esikhulu, futhi. Ama-ocelot azingela izisulu zawo ngokuzifanisa nendawo akuyo bese agxumela izisulu zawo.
Ama-Ocelots athanda ukudla izilwane ezincane. Bazobamba izinkawu, izinyoka, amagundane nezinyoni uma bekwazi. Cishe zonke izilwane ezizingelwa ama-ocelot zincane kakhulu kunalokho okunjalo.
Ososayensi bacabanga ukuthi ama-ocelots ayalandela futhi athole izilwane (izisulu zayo) ezingazidla ngokuzihogela, zihogele lapho zihamba khona emhlabeni.
Babona kahle ebumnyameni ebusuku, futhi bazihambela ngokuzimela. Ama-Ocelots azingela isisulu sawo ngokuxhuma nendawo yawo bese ephonsa inyamazane yawo.
Ocelots kukhona izilwane ezincane ukudla ziyathanda. Bayoba ubambe iinkawu, iinyoka, amagundane nezinyoni ukuthi can. Cishe zonke abazingeli by izilwane - zingabantu futhi esingaphansi ocelot.
Ososayeni uma becabanga ocelots uthole ukulandela izilwane futhi (ithuluzi lakhe) enokuzitya ngesinukisa, irhogole hamba lapho kukhona emhlabeni.
In the ebumnyameni ebusuku futhi ubone kahle umbono, ukuhamba futhi ngokuzimela. Abazingeli Of The Ocelots leli thuluzi bese wengeza cast ezizingqongileyo idivayisi ukuthi ndawo.

Umongameli waseMelika uGeorge W. Bush uye wafika eSingapore ngentsasa yangoNovember 16, eqalisa utyelelo lwakhe lweveki lwase-Asia.
Wabuliswa ngowase Singapore's uSekela Nkulumbuso u Wong Kan Seng baxoxa imeko zoshishino nogrogriso kunye Nkulumbuso yase Singapore u Lee Hsien Loong.
Emva kweveki yelahleko kunyulo lwaphakathi enyakeni, uBush uxelele abaphulaphuli ngokwandiswa korhwebo e-Asia.
UMongameli waseMelika uJoji W. Hlathi ufike eSingapho ekuseni ngoNovemba 16, eqalisa uhambo lwakhe lweviki lokuvakashela i-Asia.
Wabingelelwa iPhini likaNdunankulu uWong Kan Seng futhi baxoxa ngezinkinga zezentengiselwano kanye nezokuvakasha kanye noNdunankulu waseSingapore uLee Hsien Loong.
Ngemva kweviki lokulahlekelwa okhethweni lwaphakathi nesikhathi, uBhush watshela izilaleli ngokukhulisa ezentengiselwano e-Asia.
UMongameli waseMelika uGeorge W. Bush wafika eSingapore ekuseni ngoNovemba 16, eqala ukuhambela kwakhe masonto onke e-Asia.
Uhlangatshezwe yiPhini likaNdunankulu waseSingapore uWong Kan Seng ukuxoxa ngezimo zebhizinisi nezokusongela uNdunankulu waseSingapore uLee Hsien Loong.
Ngemuva kwesonto elahlekile ekukhetheni kwaphakathi nonyaka, uBush utshele izethameli ngokunwetshwa kwezohwebo e-Asia.

Amapolisa aseMadhya Pradesh ayifumene ilaptop ebibiwe nefowuni.
Usekela Jikelele Wokuhlola D K Arya wathi, "Sibambe abantu abahlanu abadlwengule inenekazi lase Swiss saze sayifumana ifone yakhe nelaptop".
Abatyholwa babizwa ngoluhlobo ngu-Baba Kanjar, u-Bhutha Kanjar, u-Rampro Kanjar, u-Gaza Kanjar no-Vishnu Kanjar.
Intsumpa yamapolisa uChandra Shekhar Solanki uthe umtyholwa uvele enkundleni ezogqume ubuso.
Amaphoyisa waseMadhya Pradesh amukele ikhompyutha ephathwayo kanye nomakhalekhukhwini.

Ibali elivezwe kumdlalo weqonga waseFrance, nguCamille Saint-Saens, lelomzobi "obomi bakhe buchazelwa luthando lweziyobisi kunye neJapan."
Ngenxa yoko, abenzi bomdlalo batshaya intsangu kwiqonga, kwaye nethiyetha ngokwayo ikhuthaza abaphulaphuli ukuba bajoyine.

Ngenxa yalokho, abakhiqizi bomdlalo batshaya insangu esiteji, kanti nethiyetha uqobo ikhuthaza izethameli ukuba zijoyine.
Indaba umdlalo ukukhiqiza weqonga waseFrance, Yini nguCamille-Saens, sokuqhafaza " uthando lokuphila kwakhe futhi wachaza lweziyobisi neJapan."

UC Curtis Cooper, isazi sezibalo kunye noprofesa wesayensi yeekhompyuter kwiYunivesithi yaseCentral Missouri, ufumanise elona nani likhulu laziwayo ukuza kuthi ga ngoku nge-25 kaJanuwari.
Abantu abaliqela bayiqinisekisile le nto ifunyenweyo besebenzisa i-hardware ne-sofware ezahlukahlukeneyo ekuqaleni kukaFebuwari ibe yaziswe ngoLwesibini.

U-Curtis Cooper, usozibalo nophinde abe nguprofesa wesayensi yamakhompuyutha eNyuvesi yaseCentral Missouri, uthole inombolo enkulu kunazo zonke kuze kube manje ongakwazi ukuyidivayida ngayo ngokwayo ngoJanuwari 25.
Abantu abaningana baqinisekise okutholakele ngokusebenzisa imishini kanye nezinhlelo zokusebenza zamakhompyutha ngasekuqaleni kukaFebruwari futhi kumenyezelwe ngoLwesibili.
UC Curtis Cooper, isazi sezibalo kanye noprofesa wesayensi yamakhompyutha eNyuvesi yaseCentral Missouri, uthole isibalo esikhulu kunazo zonke esaziwa kuze kube manje ngomhlaka-25 Januwari.
Abantu abaningana bakuqinisekisile okutholakele besebenzisa i-hardware ne-software ehlukahlukene ekuqaleni kukaFebhuwari kumenyezelwe ngoLwesibili.

Abantu abaningana bathola ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kwalesi bayiqinisekisile - hardware and software kuchazwe ekuqaleni may and ngolwesibili kukaFebuwari emikhakheni ehlukahlukene.

Umbutho wesisa wezonyango uMangola, iMedecines Sans Frontieres kunye noMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi bathi sisifo esibi kakhulu esibhaliweyo kweli lizwe.
Isithethi se Medecines Sans Frontiere uRichard Veerman sithe: "iAngola ijongene nolona lwakhe lwalubi uqhambuko kwaye isimo sihleli sisibi kakhulu eAngola," utshilo.
Izinhlangano ezisiza abaswele zezokwelapha iMangola, iMedecines Sans Frontieres kanye neWorld Health Organisation zithi ukuqubuka okubi kunakho konke okurekhodiwe ezweni.
Umkhulumeli we-Medecines Sans Frontiere u-Richard Veerman uthe: “I-Angola izobhekana nobhubhane olukhulu futhi isimo siqhubeka sisibi e-Angola,” washo.
Inhlangano esiza abezokwelapha iMangola, iMedecines Sans Frontieres neWorld Health Organisation bathi yisifo esibi kunazo zonke esibhaliwe ezweni.
Okhulumela abakwaMedecines Sans Frontiere uRichard Veerman uthe: "I-Angola ibhekene nokuqubuka kwayo kakhulu futhi isimo sisalokhu sibi kakhulu e-Angola," esho.
Izonyango uMangola organisation in the eye, futhi iMedecines Sans Frontieres kanye world health organisation abe ebhaliwe isifo esibi kakhulu kuleli lizwe.
Medecines Sans Frontiere thina Veerman uRichard for the isikhulumi wathi:" the best of iAngola yakhe obhekene ekuqhambuka lwalubi futhi sihlala futhi eAngola kwemizwa emibi kakhulu, " esho.
Inhlangano yesisabelo sezokwelapha uMangola, iMedecines Sans Frontieres kanye noMbutho wezeMpilo yoMhlaba bathi kuyisifo esibi kakhulu esibhaliwe kuleliya lizwe.

Inhlangano esiza abantulayo iMangola, iMedecines Sans Frontieres kanye neWorld Health Organisation bathi yisifo esibi kakhulu esibhalwe ezweni.
Isikhulumi se-Medecines Sans Frontiere uRichard Veerman sithe: "I-Angola ibhekene nokuqubuka kwayo futhi isimo sisalokhu sibi kakhulu e-Angola", esho.
Inhlangano yesisa sezokwelapha uMangola, iMedecines Sans Frontieres kanye noMhlangano wezeMpilo woMhlaba bathi yisifo esibi kakhulu esibhalwe kuleliya lizwe.
Isikhulumi se Medecines Sans Frontiere uRichard Veerman sithe: "iAngola sibhekene nosona lwakhe lwalubi uqhamuke kanti isimo sihlezi sibi kakhulu e-Angola," esho.
Inhlangano esiza abantulayo iMangola, iMedecines Sans Frontieres kanye neWorld Health Organisation bathi yisifo esibhalwe phansi kunazo zonke ezweni.
