NgoMvulo, uSara Danius, unobhala osisigxina weKomiti yeNobel yoNcwadi kwiSweden Academy, uxele esidlangalaleni ngexesha lenkqubo kanomathotholo kwiSveriges Radio eSweden ikomiti, engakwazanga ukumfumana ngqo uBob Dylan ngokuthe ngqo ngokuphumelela i-2016 Nobel Prize kuLwazi, iinzame zayo zokufikelela kuye.
UDanius uthe, "Ngalo mzuzu asenzi nto. Ndinxebelelene ndathumela i-imeyile koyemtu ophangela kufuphi naye ndafumana iimpendulo ezinobuhlobo kakhulu. Okwangoku, oku kwanele."

NgoMsombuluko, uSara Danius, unobhala wesikhathi sonke weKomiti yeNobel yeZincwadi kuyi-Akhademi yase-Sweden, umemezele obala phakathi nohlelo lomsakazo eMsakazweni we-Sveriges e-Sweden ukuthi ikomiti, njengoba lingakwazi ukufinyelela uBob Dylan ngokuqondile ngokuwina Umklomelo weNobel weZincwadi, liyeke imizamo yokumfinyelela.

UDanius wathi, “Okwamanje asenzi lutho. Sengishayele ucingo ngaphinde ngathumela ama-imeyile kwabasondelene naye kakhulu asebenzisana nabo futhi ngathola izimpendulo ezinobungane. Okwamanje, lokho ngokuqinisekile kwanele.”

NgoMsombuluko, uSara Danius, unobhala waphakade weNobel Literary Committee eSweden Academy, wenze isitatimende esidlangalaleni ngesikhathi sohlelo lomsakazo eqenjini laseSweden eSveriges Radio, elingakwazanga ukuthola uBob Dylan ngokunqoba i-2016 Nobel Prize in Information, ngemizamo yokumfinyelela.
UDanius uthe, "Okwamanje asenzi lutho. Ngixhumene ngathumela i-imeyili yomuntu opheka eduze kwakhe ngathola izimpendulo ezinobungane kakhulu. Okwamanje, lokhu kwanele."

Ngomsombuluko, sarah Danius, unobhala unomphela wekomiti kwiSweden yeNobel yoNcwadi watch ngokwanele khanacademy videos, public radio x Radio kwiSveriges sweden ngesikhathi ikomiti, bob dylan engakwazanga wathola ngqo ngqo umklomelo ngo-2016 ngenxa yolwazi, imizamo yayo ukufinyelela kuye.
UDanius wathi, " its ngaleso sikhathi. Ndinxebelene I thumela i-imeyili ngithola eduze kwakhe koyemtu ophangela impendulo friendly kakhulu. Okwamanje, lokhu futhi lokhu."

NgoMsombuluko, uSara Danius, unobhala oyisipesheli weKomidi leNobel leNcwadi eSweden Academy, utshele esidlangalaleni ngesikhathi uhlelo lukamsakazo kuSveriges Radio eSweden ikomidi, engakwazanga ukumthola ngqo uBob Dylan ngokuqondile ngokuwina i-2016 Nobel Prize kuLwazi, imizamo yayo yokufinyelela
UDanius uthe, "Ngalo mzuzu asenzi lutho.Nginxebelelene ngathumela i-imeyili koyemtu ophangela eduze kwakhe ngathola izimpendulo ezinobungane kakhulu.Okwamanje, lokhu kwanele."

NgoMsombuluko, uSara Danius, unobhala waphakade weNobel Committee eSweden Academy, uxele esidlangalaleni ngesikhathi sohlelo lomsakazo eSveriges Radio, elingakwazanga ukuthola uBob Dylan ngokunqoba i-2016 Nobel Prize in Information, ngemizamo yokufinyelela.
UDanius uthe, "Okwamanje asenzi lutho. Ngithinte ngathumela i-imeyili kozakwethu ngathola izimpendulo ezinobungani. Okwamanje, lokhu kwanele".

NgoMsombuluko, uSara Danius, unobhala oyisigatshana seKomidi leNobel YoMkhandlu kwiSweden Academy, utshele esidlangalaleni ngesikhathi senqubo kanomsakazo kwiSveriges Radio eSweden ikomiti, engakwazanga ukumthola ngqo uBob Dylan ngokuqondile ngokuwina i-2016 Nobel Prize kuLwazi, imizamo yayo yokufinyelela kuye.
UDanius uthe, "Ngalesi sikhathi asenzi lutho. Ngixhumene ngathumela i-imeyili komuntu ophangela eduze naye ngathola izimpendulo ezinobungane kakhulu. Okwamanje, lokhu kwanele."

NgoMsombuluko, uSara Danius, unobhala waphakade weNobel Literary Committee eSweden Academy, wenze isitatimende esidlangalaleni ngesikhathi sohlelo lomsakazo eqenjini laseSweden eSveriges Radio, elehlulekile ukuthola uBob Dylan ngokunqoba i-2016 Nobel Prize in Information, ngemizamo yokumfinyelela.
“Okwamanje akukho esikwenzayo,” kusho mina.
Ukuba ubukhe wayibukela imuvi ethi National Treasure, unokucinga ukuba imephu yobuncwane yayibhalwe ngasemva kweSibhengezo Senkululeko.
Nangona kunjalo, ayiyonyani leyo. Nangona kukho into ebhaliweyo ngasemva koxwebhu, asiyomephu yobutyebi.
Emva kwiSibhengezo Sokukhululeka kubhalwe la mazwi "ISibhengezo Sokuqala Sokukhululeka sange-4 kaJulayi 1776". Lo mbhalo usemazantsi olo xwebhu, ubhalwe ujonge ezantsi.

Ngelixa kungekho mntu waziyo ukuba ngubani oyibhalileyo, kuyaziwa ukuba kwasekuqaleni kobomi bayo, uxwebhu olukhulu lwesikhumba (lilinganisa i-29¾ i-intshi nge-24½ i-intshi) lwalusongwa ukuze lugcinwe.
Ngoku, kusenokwenzeka intoyoba uphawu belufakwe njenge lebheli.
Uma wake wayibuka imovie i-National Treasure, ungafunga ukuthi ibalazwe lomcebo lalibhalwe ngemuva kweSimemezelo Sokuzimela.
Noma kunjalo, lokho akulona iqiniso. Noma kunokuthile okubhalwe ngemuva kwencwadi, akuyona imephu eyigugu.
Okubhalwe ngemuva eNcazelweni Yokuzimela bekungamazwi “ENcazelo Yokuqala Yokuzimela yangomhlaka-4 Julayi 1776”. Umbhalo ovela ekugcineni kwencwadi, obheke phansi.

Yize kungekho owaziyo ngokuqinisekile ukuthi ngubani oyibhalile, kuyaziwa ukuthi ekuqaleni kokuphila kwayo, idokhumenti yesikhumba (inobukhulu obungamayintshi angu-29¾ ngamayintshi angu-24½) yayisongwa ukuze igcinwe.
Ngakho-ke, cishe umcabango wafakwa njengophawu kalula.
Uma uke wabukela i-movie iNational Treasure, ungacabanga ukuthi imephu yengcebo ibhalwe ngemuva kweSimemezelo Sokuzimela.
Kodwa-ke, lokho akulona iqiniso. Yize kukhona okubhalwe ngemuva kwedokhumenti, akuyona imephu yomcebo.
Ngemuva kwesimemezelo senkululeko kubhalwe lawo mazwi "Isimemezelo Sokuqala Sokukhululeka SikaJulayi 4, 1776". Umbhalo waphansi ungaphansi kombhalo, kubhalwe phansi.

Ngenkathi kungekho owaziyo ukuthi ngubani oyibhalile, kuyaziwa ukuthi kwasekuqaleni kokuphila kwayo, idokhumenti enkulu yesikhumba (elinganisa ama-intshi angama-293⁄4 ngama-intshi angama-241⁄2) yasongwa ukuze igcinwe.
Manje, kungenzeka ukuthi uphawu lumakwe njengelebula.
Ukuba khona Kwengcebo kazwelonke uyibukela imuvi ukusho, kwalotshwa ukuthi ungase ucabange ngenkululeko esimemezelweni esithi yobuncwane map background.
Nokho, ingabe amanga. Background nakuba kukhona incwadi ebhaliwe, asiyomephu ingcebo.
Emva kwalesi simemezelo ngokubhala amazwi Sokukhululaeka "Declaration Of The lokuqala kiss Sokukhululeka - 4 July 1776". Lona umbhalo document on phansi, bheka phansi ukuze kulotshiwe.

Futhi akukho muntu owaziyo ngubani oyibhalileyo isikhathi, uma uyaziwa ekuqaleni kokuphila kwakhe, okuningi zesikhumba document (okuyinto ilingana 29¾ amasentimitha by 24½ amasentimitha) egcinwe lwalusongwa.
Manje, lokhu may intoyoba mark abel efakwe.
Uma ubuke wayibuka imuvi ethi National Treasure, ungacabanga ukuthi imephu yamagugu yayibhalwe ngemuva kweSimemezelo Senkululeko.
Kodwa-ke, akulona iqiniso lelo. Nakuba kukhona okubhaliwe ngemuva kwedokhumenti, akusiyo imephu yengcebo.
Ngemuva kweSimemezelo Sokukhululeka kubhalwe la mazwi "Isimemezelo Sokuqala Sokukhululeka sange-4 July 1776". Lo mbhalo useningizimu yedokhumenti, ubhalwe ubheke phansi.

Ngenkathi kungekho muntu owaziyo ukuthi ngubani oyibhalile, kuyaziwa ukuthi kwasekuqaleni kokuphila kwalo, idokhumenti enkulu yesikhumba (lilinganisa i-293/4 intshi ngo-241/2 intshi) lwalusongwa ukuze lugcinwe.
Manje, kungenzeka intoyoba uphawu belufakwe njenge lebheli.
Uma wake wabukela i-movie iNational Treasure, ungacabanga ukuthi imephu yomcebo ibhalwe ngemuva kweSibhengezo Senkululeko.
Noma kunjalo, lokho akulona iqiniso. Noma kukhona okubhalwe ngemuva kwedokhumenti, akuyona imephu yomcebo.
Ngemuva kwesimemezelo sokukhululeka kubhalwe la mazwi "Isimemezelo Sokuqala sokukhululeka sange-4 Julayi 1776". Lo mbhalo ungaphansi kombhalo, ubhalwe phansi.

Ngehora kungekho owaziyo ukuthi ngubani oyibhalileyo, kuyaziwa ukuthi kusukela ekuqaleni kokuphila kwalo, idokhumenti enkulu yesikhumba (elilinganisa ama-intshi angu-29 ¾ ngamasentimitha angu-24 ½) isongwa ukuze ligcinwe.
Manje, kungenzeka ukuthi uphawu lumakwe njengelebula.
Uma ubuke wayibukela imuvi ethi National Treasure, ungase ucabange ukuthi imephu yengcebo yayibhalwe ngemuva kweSimemezelo Senkululeko.
Noma kunjalo, akuyona iqiniso. Nakuba kukhona okubhaliwe ngemuva kwedokhumenti, akusiyo imephu yengcebo.
Ngemuva kweSimemezelo Sokukhululeka kubhalwe la mazwi "Isimemezelo Sokuqala Sokukhululeka sange-4 sikaJulayi 1776". Lo mbhalo usemazansi lo mbhalo, ubhalwe ubheke phansi.

Ngenkathi kungekho muntu owazi ukuthi ubani oyibhalile, kuyaziwa ukuthi kwasekuqaleni kokuphila kwayo, idokhumenti enkulu yesikhumba (linganisa i-29¾ i-intshi nge-24½ i-intshi) lwalusongwa ukuze lugcinwe.
Manje, kusengenzeka intoyoba uphawu belufakwe njengebheli.
Uma wake wabukela i-movie iNational Treasure, ungacabanga ukuthi imephu yomcebo ibhalwe ngemuva kweSimemezelo Sokuzimela.
Nokho, lokho akulona iqiniso. Yize kukhona okubhalwe ngemuva kwedokhumenti, akuyona imephu yomcebo.
Ngemuva kwesimemezelo senkululeko kubhalwe amagama athi "Isimemezelo Sokuqala Sokukhululeka SikaJulayi 4, 1776". Umbhalo waphansi ungaphansi kombhalo, emibhalweni yaphansi.

Yize kungekho owaziyo ukuthi yabhalwa ngubani, kuyaziwa ukuthi kusukela ekuqaleni kokutholakala kwayo, idokodo elikhulu lesikhumba (elilinganisa ama-intshi angu-29¾ ngamasentimitha angu-24½) lagoqwa ukuze ligcinwe liphephile.
Manje, kungenzeka ukuthi uphawu ngabe lumakwe njengelebula.
I-USA Gymnastics iyayixhasa ileta evela kwiKomiti yeOlimpiki eUnited States, yaye iyayamkela imfuneko yokuba intsapho yezeOlimpiki kufuneka ikhuthaze iimeko zokhuseleko kubo bonke abadlali bethu.

Siyavumelana nengxelo ye-USOC yokuba umdla weembaleki zethu kunye neeklabhu, kunye nemidlalo yabo, inokuncediswa ngcono ngokuqhubela phambili notshintsho olunentsingiselo kumbutho wethu, endaweni yokumiselwa ngokusesikweni.

I-USA Gymnastics iyaluxhasa uphando oluzimeleyo oluza kubhenca ukuba ukuxhatshazwa okukhulu ngohlobo oluchazwe ngamaxhoba kaLarry Nassar kuye kwaqhubeka njani kangangexesha elide yaye iza kwamkela naluphi utshintsho olufanelekileyo.

I-USA Gymnastics kunye ne-USOC banenjongo efanayo-yokwenza umdlalo wejiminastiki, nabanye, bakhuseleke kangangoko kunokwenzeka ukuba iimbaleki zilandele amaphupha azo kwindawo ekhuselekileyo, efanelekileyo nexhotyisiweyo.

Ukuzivocavoca Kokuqinisa Imisipha Namathambo kwaseMelika kusekela incwadi yeKomiti lama-Olimpiki laseMelika futhi kwamukela isidingo esiphelele sokuba umndeni wama-Olimpiki ukhathaze indawo ephephile yabadlali bethu bonke.

Sivumelana nokushiwo yi-USOC ukuthi izithakazelo zabadlali kanye namaqembu, kanye nemidlalo yabo, zingakhonzwa kangcono ngokuyaphambili ngoshintsho olunenjengo phakathi kwenhlangano yethu, kunokuthathelwa izitifiketi.

I-USA Gymnastics isekela uphenyo oluzimele olungaveza ukukhanya endleleni ukuhlukumeza kobukhulu obuchazwe ngesibindi yilabo abasinde kuLarry Nassar obekungenzeka kungabonwa ngayo isikhathi eside kangaka futhi yamukela noma iziphi izinguquko ezidingekayo nezifanele.

Ezokuzivivinya komzimba zaseMelika kanye ne-USOC zinomgomo ofanayao — ukwenza umdlalo wezokuzivivinya komzimba, kanye neminye, iphephe ngangokunokwenzeka ukuba abadlali balandele amaphupho wabo endaweni ephephile, enhle kanye nenika amandla.
I-USA Gymnastics iyayisekela incwadi evela eKomidini Lama-Olympic lase-United States, futhi iyamukele isidingo sokuthi umndeni wakwa-Olympic ukhuthaze izimo zokuphepha kubo bonke abadlali bethu.

Siyavumelana nombiko we-USOC wokuthi izintshisekelo zabasubathi namakilabhu ethu, kanye nemidlalo yabo, kungasizakala kangcono ngokuqhubekela phambili ushintsho olunenhlangano enhlanganweni yethu, esikhundleni sokumiswa ngokusemthethweni.

USA Gymnastics futhi yeolimpiki united States encwadini evela ekomitini, yezeOlimpiki wamukela imindeni kanye nesidingo sokuphepha kumele kube icala ukukhuthaza bonke abadlali bethu.

Inzululwazi zizama ukuqonda ukuba amazwe adelwe njani, ingakumbi Ihlabathi ladalwa njani, kuba oonomgca badibana Nehlabathi kude kudala.

I-Manchu Pichu inezakhiwo ezintathu ezibalulekileyo, ezibizwa i-Intihuanta, iTempile yeLanga, futhi negumbi leeFestile Ezintathu.
Uninzi lwezakhiwo ezisecaleni kwekhompleksi ziye zakhiwa ngenjongo yokunika abakhenkethi uluvo olungcono ngendlela ababevela ngayo kwasekuqaleni.
Ngo-1976, amashumi amathathu eepesenti zeMachu Picchu zazibuyisiwe kwaye ukubuyiselwa kuyaqhubeka kude kube namhlanje.
IMachu Picchu yenziwa izakhiwo ezintathu eziyinhloko, okungukuthi i-Intihuatana, i-Temple of the Sun, kanye ne-Room of the Three Windows.
Izakhiwo eziningi onqenqemeni lwendawo yokuhlala zakhiwe kabusha ukuzi zinikeze izivakashi umqondo ongcono wendlela ezazibukeka ngayo ekuqaleni.
Ngo-1976, amaphesenti angamashumi amathathu weMachu Picchu ayebuyiselwe esimweni sasekuqaleni futhi ukubuyiselwa kusaqhubeka kuze kube namuhla.
IManchu Pichu inezakhiwo ezintathu ezibalulekile, ezibizwa nge-Intihuanta, iThempeli leLanga, negumbi lamafasitela amathathu.
Iningi lezakhiwo eziseceleni kwekhomishini lakhiwa ngenhloso yokunikeza izivakashi umbono ongcono ngendlela ababevela ngayo kwasekuqaleni.

Ababhubhileyo nguNicholas Alden, 25, kunye noZachary Cuddeback, 21. UCuddeback wayekade eqhuba.
U-Edgar Verguilla wafumana amanxeba kwingalo nomhlathi ngelixa uKristofer Schneider washiyeka edinga utyando lokubumbha ubuso bakhe.

Isixhobo sikaUka sayeka ukusebenza ngoxa wayesijongise kwintloko yendoda yesihlanu. USchneider unentlungu eqhubekayo, akaboni ngeliso elinye, akanayo inxalenye yokakayi kwaye unobuso obenziwe nge-titanium.
USchneider unikele ubungqina ngelinki yevidiyo ekwiUSAF ekummandla wakokwabo.
Ukufa kukaNicholas Alden, ona-25, kanye noZachary Cuddeback, ona-21. UCuddeback wayengumshayeli.
U-Edga Veguilla wathola amanxeba wasengalweni nasemhlathini kuyilapho u-Kristoffer Schneider wasala edinga ukuhlizwa kokwakha kabusha ebusweni.

Isikhali sika-Uka sahluleka lapho wayekhombe indoda yesihlanu ekhanda. U-Schneider wayenobuhlungu obungapheli, ukungaboni esweni elilodwa, ingxenye yogebhezi engekho kanye nobuso obakhiwe kabusha nge-titanium.
U-Schneider wanikeza ubufakazi ngevidiyo kusuka esikhungweni se-USAF ezweni lakubo.
Abashonile nguNicholas Alden, 25, noZachary Cuddeback, 21. UCuddeback ubeshayela.
U-Edgar Verguilla uthole amanxeba engalweni nasemhlathini ngenkathi uKristofer Schneider ashiyeka edinga ucwaningo lokubumbela ubuso bakhe.

Isikhali sika-Uka sayeka ukusebenza ngesikhathi asikhomba ekhanda lendoda yesihlanu. USchneider unobuhlungu obungapheli, akaboni ngeso elilodwa, akanayo ingxenye yekhilikithi nobuso obenziwe nge-titanium.
USchneider ufakaze ngesixhumanisi sevidiyo se-USAF endaweni yabo.
Ibhabhubhileyo nguNicholas insimu Yase-Edene, eneminyaka engu-25, Nomhlambi wokugona kukanozachary, oneminyaka engu-21. UCuddeback wayekade ukushayela.

USchneider ukunikeza ubufakazi babo by video ink ekwiUSAF ngaphakathi endaweni.

U-Edgar Verguilla wathola amanxeba engalo nomhlathi ngenkathi uKristofer Schneider washiyeka edinga udlando lokubumbha ubuso bakhe.

Umswakamo osezandleni zakho uzohlangana nongqimba olungaphandle, okuzoba nomuzwa oxakayo futhi kwenze uhlobo lwegobongo.
Shukumisa impuphu yomile bese kuthi, ngezandla ezihlanzekile, uyikhame ube mncane.
Umswakama osezandleni zakho uzocasulwa yisikhumba sangaphandle, esizozwakala singajwayelekile futhi senze uqweqwe.
Yomileyo lemigubo move bese, ngezandla ahlanzekile, ligaqa yami uyikhame.
Kuyakuhluhluzwa izikhumba zakho umswakama ezandleni, njengoba in a esiyakuvakala ongaziwa ukwenza uqweqwe.
Shukumisa lempuphu yomile kanye bese-ke, ngezandla ezihlanzekileyo, uyikhame ibe ligaqa.
Umswakama ezandleni zakho kuyakuhlutshezwa yisikhumba sangaphandle, esizozwakala ngokungajwayelekile kuze kwenze uqweqwe.
Faka indwangu yomile bese kuthi, ngezandla ezihlanzekile, uyikhame ibe yisigaxa.
Ukufuma ezandleni zakho kuyakuhlutshezwa isikhumba sangaphandle, esizozizwa singajwayelekile futhi senze uqweqwe.
Shukumisa lemigubho yomile bese-ke, ngezandla ezihlanzekile, uyikhame ibe yigaqa.
Umswakama ezandleni zakho kuyahlutshwa yisikhumba sangaphandle, esiyakuzwakala ngokungajwayelekile futhi kwenze uqweqwe.
Faka impuphu eyomile bese kuthi, ngezandla ezihlanzekile, uyikhame uyenze isigaxa.
Umswakama ezandleni zakho uzocasulwa isikhumba sangaphandle, esizozizwa singajwayelekile futhi senze uqweqwe.
Umthetho osetyenziswa kakubi nogxekwa kakhulu wesithathum sisikhokhelo esilula sokwenza ukutshintshatshintsha ngoxa sigcana ulungelelwano kumfanekiso.
Ithi eyona ndawo isebenzayo kwesisihloko siphambili kukudibana kwemigca eyahlula umfanekiso ube ngowesithathu ngokuthe nkqo nangokuthe tye (jonga umzekelo).
Lomthetho wezingxenye ezintathu esetshenziswa kabi kakhulu nonganakwa ngokuvamile isiqondiso esilula sokwenza ubuhle ube ugcina izinga lokuhleleka esithombeni.
Ithi indawo ephumelela kakhulu ngesihloko esikhulu ilapho imigqa ihlangana khona ukuze ihlukanise isithombe kathathu ngokuqondile nangokuvundlile (bheka isibonelo).
Umthetho ongasetshenziswanga kahle futhi ogxekwe kakhulu wesithathum uyinkomba elula yokwenza izinguquko ngenkathi ugcina ibhalansi esithombeni.
Ithi ingxenye ephumelela kunazo zonke yesihloko inhlanganisela yemigqa ehlukanisa isithombe sibe ngowesithathu ngokuqondile nangokuvundlile (bona isibonelo).
Umthetho ezintathu uma esetshenziswa ukuqondisa nogxekwa lula kakhulu ukwenza uma oda it sigcana ukutshatshtsha image.
Isihloko main okuyinto indawo engcono ukujoyina kuyinto esebenzayo eyahlula imigqa in the image wesithathu ukuba zibheka futhi nendawo (bheka isibonelo).
Umthetho osetshenziswa kabi nogxekwa kakhulu wesithathum uyisikhokhelo esilula sokwenza ukushintsha kuyilapho sigcana ulungelelwano esithombeni.
Ithi okungcono kakhulu endaweni esebenzayo kulesisihloko esiyinhloko ukuhlangana kwemigqa ehlukaniseisithombe ube ngowesithathu ngokuqondile nangobuqotho (bheka isibonelo).
Umthetho osetshenziswa kabi nogxekwa kakhulu wesithathum uyinkomba elula yokwenza izinguquko ngenkathi ugcina ibhalansi esithombeni.
Indawo ephumelela kakhulu yesihloko inhlanganisela yemigqa ehlukanisa isithombe sibe izilinganiso ezintathu zibheke phezulu (bheka isibonelo).
Umthetho osetshenziswa kabi nogxekwa kakhulu wesithathu kuyisiqondiso esilula sokwenza ukushintsha ngenkathi sigcana uhulumende esithombeni.
Ithi okuyindawo esebenzayo kulesi sihloko sisemqoka ukuhlangana kwemigqa ehlukanisa isithombe sibe ngowesithathu ngokuqondile nangokuqondile (bheka isibonelo).
Umthetho ongasetshenziswanga kahle futhi ogxekwe kabanzi wesithathu uyinkomba elula yokwenza izinguquko ngenkathi ugcina ibhalansi esithombeni.
Ithi ingxenye ephumelela kakhulu yesihloko inhlanganisela yemigqa ehlukanisa isithombe sibe mpo futhi ime mpo (bheka isibonelo).
Izixeko zaseHarappa naseMohenjo-daro zazinandlu yangasese egungxulwayo phantse kuyo yonke indlu, ethiwe ngca kwi sistimu yesurisi ephucukileyo.
Iintsalela zobuxhakaxhaka bokuhambisa ilindle ziye zafunyanwa kwizindlu zesixeko sase Minoan of Crete nase Santorini e Greece.

Zazikhona izindlu zangasese kweyamandulo i Egypt, Persia neChina. Ku khanyiso lwama Roman , izindlu zangasese zaziye ngamanye amathuba zibe yinxalenye yendawo zokuhlamba zikawonke wonke apho amadoda namabhinqa babekunye bexubene.
Amadolobha waseHarappa kanye naseMohenjo-daro ayenedlu yangasese eshaywayo cishe kuzo zonke izindlu, ehlanganiswe nendlela eyinkimbinkimbi yokuthutha indle.
Insalela yamapayipi athutha indle itholakele ezindlini zamadolobha wase-Minoan waseKhrithi nase-Santorini eGrisi.

Zazikhona izindlu zangasese eGibhithe, ePheresiya, kanye naseShayina yamandulo. Empucukweni yaseRoma, izindlu zangasese kwesinye isikhathi kwakuyingxenye yezindlu zokugezela zomphakathi lapho abasilisa nabesifazana babehlangana ndawonye.
Amadolobha aseHarappa naseMohenjo-daro ayenendlu yangasese egudlile cishe kuzo zonke izindlu, ethiwe ngqo ohlelweni lwebhizinisi oluthuthukisiwe.
Izinsalela zokuhlanza indle zitholakale ezindlini ezisemadolobheni aseMinoan aseCrete naseSantorini eGrisi.

Kwakunezindlu zangasese eGibhithe lasendulo, ePersia naseChina. Ngokukhanya kwamaRoma, izindlu zangasese kwesinye isikhathi zaziyingxenye yokugeza komphakathi lapho abesilisa nabesifazane babehlangana khona.
Nasemohenjo cities zaseharappa-yangasese ezishaywayo exhunywe a kamasipala zazinandlu sars cishe yonke indlu, kungcono yesurisi utshani ohlelweni.
Esele konyaka ukuthuthela endlini in the zobuxhakaxhaka indle kwedolobha Lasekrethe Minoan futhi base e Base Santorini Greece.

Ayikho yezindlu kweyamandulo yangasese ukubethela okhiye, Ephilippines nechina. Roman of ukukhanya kimi, ngezinye izikhathi ezindlini zangasese ukuba yingxenye amathuba zaziye for the ukugeza umphakathi wendawo kamasipala lapho amadoda nabesifazane ababephethe bexubene.
Amadolobha aseHarappa naseMohenjo-daro ayenandlu yangasese ebhidliziwe cishe kuyo yonke indlu, ethiwe utshani e sistimu jesurisi ethuthukile.
Izinsalela zobuxhakaxhaka bokuhambisa ilindle ziye zatholwa ezindlini zedolobha lase Minoan of Crete nase Santorini e Greece.

Zazikhona izindlu zangasese zasendulo e-Egypt, Persia ne-China. Kukhanyiswa amaRoman , izindlu zangasese zaziye ngezinye izingqinamba zibe yingxenye yendawo yokugeza yomphakathi lapho amadoda nabesifazane babekanye bexubene.
Amadolobha aseHarappa naseMohenjo-daro ayenamathoyilethi agudlile cishe kuzo zonke izindlu, axhumene nohlelo lwamanzi Oluthuthukisiwe.
Ibhalansi yezindawo zokuhlanza indle itholakale ezindlini ezisemadolobheni aseMinoan aseCrete naseSantorini eGrisi.

Izindlu zangasese eGibhithe lasendulo, ePersia naseChina. Ngokukhanya kwamaRoma, izindlu zangasese kwesinye isikhathi zaziyingxenye yokugeza komphakathi lapho abesilisa nabesifazane babehlangana khona.
Imizi yaseHarappa naseMohenjo-daro yayinandlu yangasese egxutshwe cishe kuyo yonke indlu, ethiwe utshani ku sistimu yesurisi ethuthukile.
Izinsalela zobuxhaka bokuhambisa ilindle ziye zatholwa ezindlini zedolobha lase Minoan of Crete nase Santorini e Greece.

Zikhona izindlu zangasese zasendulo i- Egypt, Persia neChina. Kukhanyiso lama Roman , izindlu zangasese zaziye ngezinye izikhathi zibe yingxenye yendawo yokugeza yomphakathi wonke lapho amadoda nabesifazane bebekuhlanganyela.
Amadolobha aseHarappa naseMohenjo-daro ayenamathoyilethi agudlile cishe kuzo zonke izindlu, axhumene ngqo nohlelo lwamanzi olungcono.
Izinsalela zezindawo zokuhlanza indle zitholakale ezindlini ezisemadolobheni aseMinoan aseCrete naseSantorini eGrisi.

Kwakunezindlu zangasese eGibhithe lasendulo, ePersia naseChina. Ngokukhanya kwamaRoma, izindlu zangasese kwesinye isikhathi zaziyingxenye yokugeza komphakathi lapho abesilisa nabesifazane babehlangana khona.
Ukhanyiselo sisithethe esinye ekwabelwana ngaso liqela labantu abaninzi abahlala baphinde basebenzisane eluntwini.

Igama elithi impucuko livela kwi-Latin civilis, elithetha eyase-Latin, ehlangene ne-Latin civis, ethetha ummi, kunye ne-civitas, esithetha isixeko okanye isixeko-ilizwe, kwaye ngandlela thile ichaza ubungakanani boluntu.
Izixeko zedolophu ziziphambili zeentlanga. Inkcubeko yempucuko ichaza ukugqithiswa kolwazi kwizizukulwana ngezizukulwana, umgama oshiyekileyo wenkcubeko kunye nokusasazwa okufanelekileyo.
Iinkcubeko ezincinci zihlala zilahleka ngaphandle kokushiya ubungqina obufanelekileyo bembali ibe ziyaselela ukuba zijongwe njengencubeko yale mihla.
Umphakathi wesintu isiko elilodwa elihlanganyelwa iqembu elikhulu labantu abahla futhi basebenze ndawonye, umphakathi.

Igama elithi civilization lisuka egameni lesiLatin elithi civilis, okusho impucuko, elihlobene nelesiLatin elithi civis, elisho isakhamuzi, kanye nelithi civitas, elisho idolobha noma isifundazwe, futhi lokho ngenye indlela kubuye kuchaze ubukhulu bomphakathi.
Izifundazwe zandulela izizwe. Isiko lomphakathi lisho ukudlulisela ulwaze ezizukulwaneni eziningana, umkhondo ongokwesiko ohlala ukhona kanye nokusakazwa okuhle kokwaziswa.
Amasiko amancane ngokuvamile ayanyamalala ngaphandle kokushiya ubufakazi obungokomlando futhi ayahluleka ukuqashelwa njengemiphakathi yangempela.
Ukukhanyiswa kuyisiko elilodwa okwabelwana ngalo yiqembu labantu abahlala futhi basebenzisane nomphakathi.

Igama impucuko livela ku-Latin civilis, okusho isiLatin, esihlobene ne-Latin civis, okusho isakhamuzi, kanye ne-civitas, okusho idolobha noma idolobha-izwe, futhi ngandlela thile lichaza ubukhulu bomphakathi.
Amadolobha ayizinhlanga eziyinhloko zabezizwe. Isiko lamasiko lichaza ukudluliswa kolwazi ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane, ibanga lamasiko elisele nokusatshalaliswa okufanele.
Amasiko amancane avame ukulahleka ngaphandle kokushiya ubufakazi obufanele bomlando futhi awubalulekile ukuthi ubhekwa njengesiko lesimanje.
The light izitha omunye iqembu labantu ababehlanganyela izikhathi eziningi bahlala futhi basebenze ndawonye emiphakathini.

Leligama livela e-mpucuko-wheel yesilatini, okusho i-eyase-Latin, kuhlangene ne-civis yesilatini, okusho isakhamuzi, nama-civitas, okusho idolobha noma izwe ledolobha, futhi kuchaza indlela umphakathi othile onobukhulu ngayo.
Imizi emikhulu yasemadolobheni yabezizwe. Yemucuko ungubani yamasiko ukudluliselwa kwamazwe omhlaba kolwazi isizukulwane esizukulwaneni, kanye nebanga ukusakaza oshiyekileyo ukwabiwa kwamasiko.
Ziyakwazi isiko elincane ngaphandle ubufakazi elahlekile bukhoma kokushiya obufanelekileyo wokubuka umlando uma lokhu ziyasela njengencubeko izinsuku zami.
Ukukhanya yisisho esisodwa ekwabelwana ngaso yiqembu labantu abaningi abahlala baphinde basebenzisane esintwini.

Igama elithi impucuko livela ku-Latin civilis, okusho eyase-Latin, ehlangene ne-Latin civis, okusho isakhamuzi, ne-civitas, esisho idolobha noma idolobha-izwe, futhi ngandlela thile lichaza usayizi womphakathi.
Amadolobha asemqoka ezizwe. Isiko lempucuko lichaza ukudluliswa kolwazi ngezizukulwane ngezizukulwane, ibanga elishiyelana ngamasiko nokusakaza okufanele.
Amasiko amancane avame ukulahleka ngaphandle kokushiya ubufakazi obufanele bomlando kube uyaphuza ukuba kuhlonzwe njengencubeko yalezi zinsuku.
Ukukhanyiselwa kungumkhuba owodwa okwabelwana ngawo ngeqembu labantu abahlala futhi basebenze ndawonye emphakathini.

Igama impucuko livela ku-Latin civilis, okusho isiLatin, esihlangene ne-Latin Civis, ekhuluma isakhamuzi, ne-civitas, okusho idolobha noma idolobha-izwe, futhi ngandlela thile lichaza ubukhulu bomphakathi.
Amadolobha ayizinsika zesizwe. Amasiko empucuko achaza ukudluliswa kolwazi kusuka esizukulwaneni kuya kwesinye, ibanga lamasiko elisele nokusatshalaliswa okufanele.
Amasiko amancane avame ukulahleka ngaphandle kokushiya ubufakazi obufanele bomlando futhi awubalulekile kangako ukuthi ungabhekwa njengesiko lesimanje.
Ukukhanya kuyisiko esisodwa okwabelwana ngaso yiqembu labantu abanengi abahlala baphinde basebenzisane emphakathini.

Igama elithi impucuko livela ku-Latin civilis, okusho eyase-Latin, ehlangene ne-Latin civis, ekhuluma isakhamuzi, ne-civitas, esho umuzi noma idolobha-izwe, futhi ngendlela ethile echaza ubukhulu bomphakathi.
Imizi yedolobha iyinhloko yezizwe. Isiko lempucuko lichaza ukwedlula ulwazi ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane, ibanga elishiyekayo lamasiko nokusabalalisa okufanele.
Amasiko amancane njalo alahleka ngaphandle kokushiya ubufakazi obufanele bomlando kube kuyaselela ukuthi kubhekwe njengencubeko yalezi zinsuku.
Ukukhanyiselwa isiko elilodwa elihlanganyelwe yiqembu labantu abahlala futhi basebenze ndawonye emphakathini.

Igama impucuko livela ku-Latin civilis, okusho isiLatin, esihlobene ne-Latin civis, okusho isakhamuzi, kanye ne-civitas, okusho idolobha noma idolobha-izwe, futhi ngandlela thile lichaza ubukhulu besibalo sabantu.
Amadolobha ayinsika yezizwe. Isiko lamasiko lichaza ukudluliswa kolwazi kusuka esizukulwaneni kuya kwesinye, ibanga lamasiko elisele kanye nokusatshalaliswa okufanele.
Amasiko amancane avame ukulahleka ngaphandle kokushiya ubufakazi obufanele bomlando futhi awubalulekile kangako ukuthi ungabhekwa njengesiko lesimanje.
Iingonyama zezona kati zihlala kunye kumaqela amakhulu abizwa ngokuba libubu..
Iqela leengonyama lenziwa yinkunzi endala enye ukuya kutsho kwezintathu ezihlobeneyo, kunye neemazi nabantwana bazo abanokufikelela kumashumi amathathu.
Amabhinqa adla ngokuzalana, belusapho olukhulu loodade nabantwana babo abangamantombazana.

Iintsapho zeengonyama ziyafana neentsapho zeezinja zasendle okanye izinja nje, izilwanyane ezifana ukufa neengonyama (kodwa hayi ezinye ikati zasendle) esimilweni, futhi zibubungozi obukhulu ezizizinglweni zazo.
Amabhubesi angamakati anobudlelwane kakhulu, aphila ngamaqembu amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi umhlambi.
Imihlambi yakhiwa iduna elilodwa noma amathathu ahlobene, ngokufanayo nezinsikazi ezintathu kanye namawundlu.
Abesifazane ngokuvamile bahlobene, okuwumndeni omkhulu wodadewabo noma amadodakazi.

Ivuyo lamabhubesi liziphatha njengomhlambi wamanketshane, izilwane ezifana namabhubesi ngokumangalisayo (kodwa hhayi amanye amakati amakhulu) ngokuziphatha, kanye futhi nokuba yingozi ezilwaneni ezizizingelayo.
Amabhubesi amabhongo amakhulu ahlala emaqenjini amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi isigubhu.
Iqembu lamabhubesi lenziwa yinkunzi endala eyodwa kuya kwezintathu ezihlobene, nezinsikazi nezingane zazo zingafinyelela kumashumi amathathu.
Abesifazane ngokuvamile babe nomfowabo, nomndeni omkhulu nodadewabo nabantwana babo abangamantombazane.
Imindeni yamabhubesi iyafana nemindeni yezinja zasendle noma izinja nje, izilwane ezinjengokufa namabhubesi (kodwa hhayi amanye amakati asendle) zinempilo, futhi ziyingozi kakhulu ekuzingeleni kwazo.
Iningi lawa Bukhoma Iingonyama kate and b amaqembu amakhulu futhi bakubiza..
Elinye iqembu lenziwa leengonyama ezihlobeneyo elidala okuyinto ezintathu eboniswe, futhi licuketse ukuthi lezi zingane zingase ukufinyelela futhi amathathu.
Ubuhlobo abesifazane futhi ngokuvamile, umndeni odade nezingane zabo, agcwele amantombazane ezinkulu.

Ezifana imindeni noma imindeni zeengonyama izinja nje izilwane yasendle, ezifana neengonyama ukufa izilwanyane (kodwa hhayi ezinye kate wild) esisimilweni, kanye nezingozi ezizizinglweni umthelela esiphezulu.
Izingonyama zezona kati zihlala ndawonye emaqenjini amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi libubu..
Iqembu lezingonyama lenziwa yinkunzi endala eyodwa kuya kwezintathu ezihlobene, kanye nezinsikazi nezingane zazo ezingafinyelela emashumini amathathu.
Abesifazane bavame ukuzalana, bewumndeni omkhulu kadade nezingane zabo ezingamantombazane.

Imindeni yezingonyama iyafana nemindeni yezinja zasendle noma izinja nje, izilwanyane ezifana nokufa nezingonyama (kodwa hhayi ezinye ikati zasendle) esimilweni, futhi zibungozi obukhulu ezizinglweni zazo.
Amabhubesi amakati amakhulu ahlala emaqenjini amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi izinyathi.
Iqembu lamabhubesi lakhiwa owesilisa oyedwa kuya kwezintathu ezindala, futhi kufika kwabesifazane abangamashumi amathathu.
Abesifazane adla ngokuzalana, belumndeni omkhulu wodadewabo nezingane zabo ezingamantombazane.
Umndeni wezingonyama uyafana nemindeni yezinja zasendle noma izinja nje, izilwane ezinjengokufa namabhubesi (kodwa hhayi amanye amakati asendle) ngesimilo, futhi ziyingozi kakhulu ekuzingeleni kwazo.
Izibongo zezona kati zihlala ndawonye emaqenjini amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi libubu..
Iqembu lezibongo lenziwa yinkunzi endala eyodwa kuze kube sezintathu ezihlobene, nezinsikazi nezingane zazo ezingafinyelela kumashumi amathathu.
Abesifazane bavame ukuzalana, bewumndeni omkhulu odade nezingane zabo ezingamantombazane.
Imindeni yezingonyama iyafana nemindeni yezinja zasendle noma izinja nje, izilwane ezifana ukufa nezingonyama (kodwa hhayi ezinye ikati zasendle) esimilweni, futhi ziyingozi enkulu ezizinglweni zazo.
Amabhubesi amakati amakhulu ahlala emaqenjini amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi izinyathi.
Iqembu lamabhubesi lakhiwa owesilisa oyedwa kuya kwezintathu ezindala, futhi kufika kwabesifazane abangamashumi amathathu kanye nenzalo yabo.
Abesifazane ngokuvamile bahlobene, nomndeni omkhulu wodadewabo namadodakazi abo.
Imindeni yamabhubesi iyafana nemindeni yezinja zasendle noma izinja nje, izilwane ezinjengokufa namabhubesi (kodwa hhayi amanye amakati asendle) ngesimilo, futhi ziyingozi kakhulu ekuzingeleni kwazo.
I-NHK ichaze ukuba i-Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant eseNiigata prefecture isebenza kakuhle.
I-Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ayichazanga miphumela ebangelwe yinyikima nokuba Inombolo-1 neye-2 ye-reactors eShika nuclearpower plant ziye zavalwa.
Kuchazwe ukuba amakhaya ayi 9400 kwingingqi awanamanzi nali 100 awanambane.
Ezinye iindlela zonakalisiwe, inkonzo kaloliwe iphazamisekile kwiindawo ezichaphazelekayo, kwaye iNoto Airport eIshikawa prefecture ihleli ivaliwe.
I-NHK ibike nokuthi isifunda sesikhungo samandla wenuzi iKashiwazaki Karawa eNiigata besisebenza ngokuvamile.
IHokuriku Electric Power Co. ayibikanga ukuthinteka okuvela ekuzamazameni komhlaba nokuthi isiphehli Nombolo 1 no-2 esikhungweni sayo samandla enuzi zivaliwe.
Kubikwe ukuthi amakhaya angaba ngu-9400 endaweni awanawo amanzi futhi cishe angu-100 awanawo ugesi.
Eminye imigwaqo ibe nomonakalo, izinkonzo zesitimela ziphazamisekile ezindaweni ezithintekile, futhi neSikhumulo Sezindiza saseNoto sasesifundazweni sase-Ishikawa sisavaliwe.
I-NHK ichaze isakhiwo samandla aseKashiwazaki Kariwa esifundeni saseNiigata sisebenza kahle.
IHokuriku Electric Power Co. ayikwazanga imiphumela yokuzamazama komhlaba nokuthi inombolo 1 neyesi-2 seziphenduli zesitshalo se-Shika nuclearpower zivaliwe.
Kuchazwe ukuthi amakhaya ayi-9400 esifundeni ayinamanzi kanti ayi-100 ayinambane.
Eminye imigwaqo yonakele, inkonzo yezitimela iphazamisekile ezindaweni ezithintekile, kanti iNoto Airport esifundeni i-Ishikawa isavaliwe.
THE NHK wachaza ukuthi Kashiwazaki amandla enuzi plant in the prefecture Brian eseNiigata ukusebenza kahle.
I Hokuriku Amandla Kagesi Co. imiphumela Ayichazanga Inombolo yinyikima kungakhathaliseki okubangelwa - 1 no-2 of the reactors nuclearpower plant babe zavala eShika.

Zonakalisiwe enye indlela, siqeqesha ezindaweni ezithintekile service, ivaliwe Esikhumulweni sezindiza wahlala eishikawa prefecture.

I-Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ayichazanga imiphumela ebangelwe yinyikima ngisho Nenombolo-1 neye-2 ye-reactors eShika nuclearpower plant ziye zavalwa.

I-Hokuriku Electric Power Co. Ayizange icacise ngemiphumela yokuzamazama komhlaba nokuthi Inombolo ye-1 ne-2 yama-reactors eShika nuclearpower avaliwe.
Uchazwe ukuthi amakhaya ayi-9400 esifundeni awanamanzi nali angu-100 awanamazambane.
Ezinye izindlela zonakalisiwe, inkonzo yezitimela iphazamisekile ezindaweni ezithintekile, kanti neNoto Airport e-Ishikawa isavaliwe.
I-NHK ichaze ukuthi i-Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant eseNiigata prefecture isebenza kahle.
I-Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ayichazanga imiphumela ebangelwe yizama ngisho noma Inombolo-1 ne-2 ye-reactors eShika nuclearpower plant iye yavalwa.
Kushiwo ukuthi amakhaya ayi 9400 esifundeni awanamanzi nali 100 awanagesi.
Ezinye izindlela zonakalisiwe, isevisi yesitimela iphazamisekile ezindaweni ezithintekayo, futhi iNoto Airport eIshikawa prefecture ihlezi ivaliwe.
I-NHK ichaze isizinda samandla enuzi saseKashiwazaki Kariwa esifundeni saseNiigata njengesisebenza kahle.
IHokuriku Electric Power Co. awuzange ucacise ngemiphumela yokuzamazama komhlaba nokuthi izinombolo ezi-1 nezingu-2 esikhungweni seShika nuclearpower zivaliwe.
Kubikwa ukuthi yimizi engama-9400 kule ndawo engenawo amanzi kanti eyikhulu ayinayo ugesi.
Eminye imigwaqo yonakele, inkonzo yezitimela iphazamisekile ezindaweni ezithintekile, kanti neNoto Airport esifundeni i-Ishikawa isavaliwe.

Xa iqelanyana lezinto eziphilayo( igcuntswana) lisohlulwa kwisininzi elivela kuso( unto enjengokuba kuthuthelwe ngakwintaba okanye kumlambo, okanye kuyiwe kwisiqithi esitsha ukuze bangakwazi ukubuyela umva ngokulula) liyakuthanda ukuzifumana likwintlalo eyohlukileyo kunaleyo belikuyo ngaphambili.

Le ndawo intsha inezixhobo ezahlukeneyo nokhuphiswano olwahlukileyo,ngoko ke abemi abatsha bayakudinga izinto ezintsha okanye ukuqhelana ukuze sikwazi ukukhuphisana ngokomeleleyo kunezidingo ebesinazo ekuqaleni
Abemi boqobo abatshintshanga konke konke, basadinga uhlengahlengiso olufanayo nolwangaphambili.
Ixesha elingaphezulu, njengoko abantu abatsha beqala ukuziqhelanisa nentlalo entsha, baqala kancinci ukuye befana njengabanye abantu.
Ekugqibeleni, emva kwamawaka okanye kwanezigidi zeminyaka, aba bantu babini baya kujongeka bahluke kangangokuba abanakubizwa ngokuba ziindidi ezifanayo.
Siyibiza lenkqubo ngokuba yi speciation, ethetha nje ukuba ukudaleka kohlobo ulutsha lwendalo . ISpeciation yimiphumela engenakunqanwa ekwayinto ebalulekileyo yotshintsho.

Lapho iqembu elincane lezinto eziphilayo (inani elincane) lihlukana eqenjini elikhulu elisuka kulo (cishe lapho liya ngaphesheya kokhahlamba lwentaba noma umfula, noma uma liya esiqhingini esisha kangangokuba lingakwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) ngokuvamile lizozithola endaweni ehlukile kunaleyo ebezikuyo ngaphambili.

Le ndawo entsha inezinsizakusebenza ezihlukile nabancintisani abahlukene, ngakho-ke umphakathi omusha uzodinga izici ezihlukile noma ukuzivumelanisa nezimo ukuze ube ngabancintisani abaqinile kunalokho ababekudinga ngaphambilini.
Izidalwa ezazikhona zasekuqaleni azikashintshi, zisadinga indlela yokuphila efana neyangaphambili.
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, njengoba iqembu elisha liqala ukujwayela indawo yalo entsha, liqala ukuya libukeka lingafani neqembu elinye.
Ekugcineni, ngemva kweminyaka eyizinkulungwane noma ngisho eyizigidi, amaqembu amabili azobukeka ehlukile kangangokuba angeke abizwe ngokuthi uhlobo olulodwa.
Sibiza lokhu kwenza ngokuthi ukwakheka, okushe nje ukwakhekha kwezinhlobo ezintsha. Lokhu kwakheka umphumela ongakwemeki kanye nengxenye ebaluleke kakhulu yokuziphendukela kwemvelo.

Lapho iqembu elincane lezinto eziphilayo (idlanzana) lihlukaniswa neningi lazo (njengokufudukela entabeni noma emfuleni, noma ukuthuthela esiqhingini esisha ukuze zikwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) zithanda ukuzithola zisemphakathini ohlukile kune ngaphambi.

Le ndawo entsha inemishini ehlukahlukene nemincintiswano ehlukene, ngakho izakhamizi ezintsha zidinga izinto ezintsha noma ukujwayela ukuze sikwazi ukuncintisana ngokuqinile kunezidingo ezinazo ekuqaleni
Izakhamizi zokuqala azishintshanga nhlobo, zisadinga ukulungiswa okufanayo nokwangaphambili.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, njengoba abantu abasha beqala ukujwayela umphakathi omusha, kancane kancane baqala ukufana njengabanye abantu.
Ekugcineni, ngemuva kwezinkulungwane noma ngisho nezigidi zeminyaka, laba bantu ababili bazobukeka behluke kangangokuthi ngeke babizwe ngezigaba ezifanayo.
Le nqubo siyibiza ngokuthi i-speciation, okusho nje ukuthi kudalwa uhlobo olusha lwemvelo. Ukucaciswa kungumphumela ongenakugwenywa futhi obaluleke kakhulu ushintsho.

Uma iqelanyana yezinto eziphilayo (igcuntswana) kusukela lisohlula a lot of them( ngisho njengoba umfula noma ezintabeni thuthelwe into, noma ukuthi abakwazanga ukubuyela esiqhingini kuyiwe kalula ukudala emuva entsha) ngenxa eyohlukileyo social eyohlukileyo belikuyo ukuthola naphambili.

Le ndawo entsha futhi ezahlukene amathuluzi ezahlukene kanye nokuncintisana, ukuze izakhamuzi izinto ezintsha noma ezintsha ukuqhelana bayakudinga ukuncintisana more nokuthi singabantwana ekuqaleni kwalesi izidingo ngokomelelo
Zonke izakhamuzi abatshintshanga original, nolwangaphambili izinguquko ezifanayo kungase kudingeke.
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, njengoba abantu abasha kanye umkhuba omusha social of the wokuqala, kufanele uqale injengabanye encane abantu kuye.
Ekugcineni, ngemva kweminyaka eyinkulungwane noma eyisigidi futhi, ukuze kube abantu ababili abahlukahlukene ukuthi bayobizwa ukuba babheke izigaba ezifanayo.
Speciation inqubo For Siyibiza, ekhuluma ngendlela endala kanye entsha ukudala nje ukuthi . Imibuzo evame ukubuzwa

Lapho iqembu lezinto eziphilayo( igcuntswana) lisohlulwa esiningi elivela kuso( unto enjengoba kuthuthelwe ngasentabeni noma emfuleni, noma kuyiwe esiqhingini esisha ukuze bangakwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) liyakuthanda ukuzithola liyinhlalo ehlukile kunaleyo belikuyo ngaphambilini.

Le ndawo intsha inezinsiza ezahlukene nokuncintisana okuhlukile,ngakho-ke izakhamuzi ezintsha ziyakudinga izinto ezintsha noma ukujwayela ukuze sikwazi ukuncintisana ngokuqinile kunezidingo ebesinazo ekuqaleni
Izakhamuzi zoqobo azishintshanga nhlobo, zisadinga ukulungiswa okufanayo nolwangaphambili.
Isikhathi esingaphezulu, njengoba abantu abasha beqala ukuzijwayela inhlalakahle entsha, baqala kancane ukuyefana njengabanye abantu.
Ekugcineni, ngemva kwezinkulungwane noma ngisho nezigidi zeminyaka, laba bantu ababili bazobukeka behluke kangangokuthi abanakubizwa ngokuthi bayizigaba ezifanayo.
Siyibiza le nqubo ngokuthi i-speciation, okusho ukuthi ukudaleka kohlobo intsha yemvelo . I-Speciation yimiphumela engenakunqanwa ekwakuyinto ebalulekile yoshintsho.

Lapho iqembu elincane lezinto eziphilayo (idlanzana) lihlukaniswa neningi lazo (njengokufudukela entabeni noma emfuleni, noma ukuthuthela esiqhingini esisha ukuze zikwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) zithanda ukuzithola zisemphakathini ohlukile kune ngaphambili.
Le ndawo entsha inemishini ehlukene nemincintiswano ehlukene, ngakho izakhamuzi ezintsha zidinga izinto ezintsha noma ukujwayela ukuze sikwazi ukuncintisana ngokuqinile kunangaphambili.
Abemi boqobo abashintshanga nhlobo, basadinga izinguquko ezifanayo nolwangaphambili.
Isikhathi esingaphezulu, njengoba abantu abasha beqala ukujwayela indawo entsha, kancane kancane sifana njengabanye abantu.
Ekugcineni, ngemva kwezinkulungwane noma ngisho izigidi zeminyaka, laba bantu ababili bazobukeka behluke kangangokuthi ngeke babizwe ngokufana.
Le nqubo siyibiza ngokuthi i-speciation, okusho nje ukuthi kudalwa uhlobo olusha lwemvelo. I-peciation iyimiphumela engenakugwenywa futhi ebalulekile ekuguqulweni.

Lapho iqembu lendodana yezinto eziphilayo( igcuntswana) lisohlukaniswa esiningi esivela kuso( into enjengokuthi kuthuthelwe intaba noma emfuleni, noma kuyiwe esiqhingini esisha ukuze ingakwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) liyakuthanda ukuzithola lisemphakathini ohlukile kunaleyo ebelikuyo ngaphambili.

Le ndawo entsha inamathuluzi ahlukahlukene umncintiswano ohlukile, ngakho-ke izakhamuzi ezintsha ziyakudinga izinto ezintsha noma ukujwayela ukuze sikwazi ukuncintisana ngokuqinile kunezidingo ebesinazo ekuqaleni
Izakhamuzi zoqobo azishintshanga nhlobo, basadinga ukulungiswa okufanayo nokwangaphambili.
Isikhathi esingaphezulu, njengoba abantu abasha beqala ukuzijwayela nenhlalo entsha, baqala kancane ukuyefana njengabanye abantu.
Ekugcineni, ngemuva kwezinkulungwane noma ngisho nezigigaba zeminyaka, laba bantu ababili bazobukeka behluke kangangokuthi abangeke babizwe ngezigaba ezifanayo.
Siyibiza lenqubo ngokuba yi speciation, okusho nje ukuthi ukudaleka kohlobo intsha yemvelo . ISpeciation yimiphumela engabizi kakhulu yokushintshashintsha.

Lapho iqembu elincane lezinto eziphilayo (idlanzana) lihlukaniswa neningi lazo (njengokufudukela entabeni noma emfuleni, noma ukuthuthela esiqhingini esisha ukuze zikwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) zithanda ukuzithola zisemphakathini ohlukile kune ngaphambi.
Le ndawo entsha inemishini ehlukene nemincintiswano ehlukene, ngakho izakhamizi ezintsha zidinga izinto ezintsha noma ukujwayela ukuze sikwazi ukuqhudelana ngokuqinile kunangaphambili.
Izakhamizi zokuqala azikashintshi nakancane, zisadinga izinguquko ezifanayo njengakuqala.
Ngokuya ngokuya, njengoba abantu abasha beqala ukujwayela indawo entsha, kancane kancane bafana naso sonke isintu.
Ekugcineni, ngemuva kwezinkulungwane noma ngisho izigidi zeminyaka, laba bantu ababili bazobukeka behluke kakhulu kangangokuthi ngeke babizwe ngokufana.
Le nqubo siyibiza ngokuthi i-speciation, okusho nje ukuthi kudalwa uhlobo olusha lwemvelo. Ukucaciswa kungumphumela ongenakugwenywa futhi obaluleke kakhulu ekuguqulweni.
Ngalendlela iParis yaziwa njenge komkhulu lesinxibo sehombo yelizwe lesimanjemanje, i-Constantinople wayecingelwa njenge komkhulu lesinxibo sehombo ye-Yuropu yakudala.
Udumo lwaso ngokuba yi-epicenter yobuntofontofo yaqala malunga ne-400 A.D. kwaye lwaqhubeka de kwabetha malunga ne-1100 A.D.
Izinga layo lehla ngelixa lenkulungwane ye-12 ikakhulu libangelwa kukuba abahambi babuyela umva nezipho ezifana nesilika, izipaysi ezazixatyiswe ngaphezu kokunikezwa yomakethe ye Byzantine.
Kwakungelo xesha kanye apho kwahanjiswa khona isihloko seFashoni Capital ukusuka eConstantinople ukuya eParis.
Ngendlela iParis eyaziwa ngayo njengenhlokodolobha yezwe lamanje, iConstantinople yayibhekwa njengenhlokodolobha yezikhonzi zaseYurophu.
Yaziwa ngokuba yindawo yalapho kwaqala khona izinto zikanokusho cishe ngo-400 A.D. futhi yahlala cishe kwaze kaba u-1100 A.D.

Isimo sayo sawohloka phakathi nekhulu leminyaka leshumi nambili ngokuyinhloko ngenxa yokuthi Abalweli Benkolo babebuye bephethe izipho ezinjengosilika nezinongo ezaziyigugu kunalezo imakethe yaseByzantium eyayinazo.
Kwakungalesi sikhathi lapho ukudluliselwa kwesiqu seNhlokodolobha yeMfashini kusuka eKhonstantinopheli kuya ePherisi kwenziwa.
Ngale ndlela iParis yaziwa njengenhlokodolobha yesitayela somhlaba wesimanje, iConstantinople yacatshangwa njengenhlokodolobha yesitayela saseYurophu yasendulo.
Ukuthandwa kwayo njengesikhungo sokunethezeka kwaqala cishe ngo-400 AD futhi yaqhubeka kuze kwashaya cishe ngo-1100 A.D.
Ukuthandwa kwayo kwehlile phakathi nekhulu le-12 ikakhulukazi kubangelwa ukuthi abahambi babuyela emuva nezipho ezinjengosilika, izipaysi ezazibaluleke kunokunikezwa kwemakethe yaseByzantine.
Kwakuyisikhathi eside lapho isihloko seFashion Capital sasatshalaliswa sisuka eConstantinople sisuka eParis.
Indlela yezwe eyaziwa ngokuthi great sehombo iParis lesimanjemanje izingubo, izingubo Constantinople omkhulu wayecingelwa sehombo Of The Europe of old.
Ngenxa yodumo lwalo ngale ndawo kwakuyi-yobuntofontofo yokuqala engaba ngu-400 A. D. futhi bathi bayaqhubeka kuze kube cishe ngo-1100 A. D.
Isikhathi its ukuza phansi ezingeni leminyaka-ngokuyinhloko okubangelwa abantu 12 ukuthi emuva ukubuya isipho, ezifana, Ngoba Wasebyzantium futhi inikeza ngaphezu izipaysi ezazixatyisele yomakethe.
Kuyinto ukuthi isikhathi waphinda lapho ukulethwa capita eConstantinople bathanda ukufunda ezinye izitatimende mayelana nesihloko eParis.
Ngalendlela i-Paris yaziwa njengekomkhulu lesigqoko se-tattoo yezwe lesimanje manje, i-Constantinople wayecatshangelwa njengekomkhulu lesigqoko sehlombo se-Yuropu yakudala.
Udumo lwaso ngokuba yi-epicenter yobuntofontofo yaqala cishe ngo-400 A.D. futhi lwaqhubeka kuze kwashaya cishe u-1100 A.D.
Izinga layo lehla ngenkathi yekhulu le-12 ikakhulu libangelwa wukuthi abahambi babuyela emuva nezipho ezifana nesilika, izipayisi ezazixakwe ngaphezu kokunikezwa yomakethe ye Byzantine.
Kwakungaleso sikhathi kanye lapho kwahanjiswa khona isihloko seFashoni Capital kusukela eConstantinople kuya eParis.
Ngale ndlela iParis yaziwa njengenhloko-dolobha yesitayela somhlaba wanamuhla, iConstantinople yathathwa njengenhlokodolobha yemvunulo yaseYurophu yakudala.
Udumo lwaso ngokuthi i-epicenter yobuntofontofo yaqala cishe ngo-400 A.D. Futhi lwaqhubeka yaze yashaya cishe ngo 1100 A.D ".

Kwakungalesi sikhathi lapho isihloko seFashion Capital sasatshalaliswa sisuka eConstantinople saya eParis.

"Uyathandeka ibe ucula kamandi," utshilo ngokombhalo wengqungquthela yeendaba.
"Ibichukumiseka qho intliziyo yam xa siprekthiza le nto, ngokusuka emazantsi entliziyo yam."
"Muhle kakhulu futhi ucula kahle kakhulu, futhi," washo kuya ngamakhophi okukhulunyiwe wenkomfa yabezindaba.
"Ngangithinteka ekujuleni kwenhliziyo yami, njalo lapho silungiselela lokhu."
"Uyathandeka ucula kamandi," esho esitatimendeni esithangamini sabezindaba.
"Inhliziyo yami ibithinteka njalo uma sithanda lokhu, ngokusuka phansi kwenhliziyo yami."

i-U.N. futhi ithembha ukugqibezela imali yokunceda amazwe achaphazelwe yi-global warming ukuncedisa abachaphazelweyo.
Imali inokuya kwizindlu ezinokukhusela umkhukula, ulawulo lwamanzi olungcono, kunye nokwahluka kwezityalo.

Ezinye izindaba okuzoxoxwa ngazo emhlanganweni eBali zihlanganisa ukuvikela amahlathi womhlaba asele, nokwabelana ngezobuchwepheshe ukusiza amazwe athuthukayo ukuba akhule ngezindlela ezingangcolisi kakhulu.

USenator okhoyo nenenekazi lokuqala laseArgentina uCristina Fernandez de Kirchner ubhengeze ukuzigqatsa kwakhe kubupresidanti izolo emalanga eLa Plata, isixeko esikwiikhilomitha eziyi-50 (iimayile eziyi-31) ukusuka eBuenos Aires.

UNksk. Kirchner ubhengeze injongo yakhe yokuba ngumongameli e-Argentina Theatre, indawo enye awayeyisebenzisa ukuqala iphulo lakhe le-2005 kwiNdlu yeeNgwevu njengelungu legqiza lephondo laseBuenos Aires.

Ilungu lesigele lamanje kanye noNkosikazi kaMongameli wase-Argentina uCristina Fernandez de Kirchner umemezele ukungenela kwakhe ukhetho lokuba umongameli izolo ntambama eLa Plata, idolobha elingamakhilomitha angu-50 (amamayela angu-31) kusuka eBuenos Aires.

UNkk. Kirchner umemezelo inhloso yakhe yokukhankasela ukuba umongameli eThiyetheni yase-Ajenthina, indawo efanayo ayisebenzisele ukuqala umkhankaso wakhe wokuba ilunga leSigele njengelunga lamanxusa esifunda sase-Buenos Aires.

USenator wamanje nowesifazane wokuqala wase-Argentina uCristina Fernandez de Kirchner umemezele ukuthi uzongenela ukhetho lobumengameli izolo ngasempumalanga yeLa Plata, idolobha elingamakhilomitha angama-50 (31 miles) ukusuka eBuenos Aires.

UNkk. UKirchner umemezele inhloso yakhe yokuba ngumongameli e-Argentina Theatre, okuyiyona ndawo abeyisebenzisa ukuqala umkhankaso wakhe we-2005 eSenate njengelungu lesigungu sesifundazwe saseBuenos Aires.

The Imidwebo atholakalayo bese ukhetha Lokuqala USenator laseArgentina ukuzigqatsa de kirchner uCristina kupresidanti amemezele ilanga Izolo Plata, on the city to ha-50 (miles / ha-31) kusukela eBuenos Aires.

Iqela Lemfundo lase-Iraq likhuphe ingxelo yalo ngo-12.00 GMT namhlanje.
Ilumkisa ngokuba akukho mntu onokuqiniseka ukuba nantoni na eyenziwayo ngoku eIraq iza kwazi ukuphelisa ukulwa kwamahlelo, ubudlobongela obandayo, ukukweyela ebugxwayibeni.
Ingxelo iqala ngesicelo sokuba kuthethwe phandle nokuba kuvanwe eMerika malunga ngepolisi yoMbindi Mpuma.
Lengxelo ibalileke kakhulu ngandlela zonke zepolisi ekhoyo yabongameleyo e Iraq kwaye inyanzelisa utshintsho olukhawulezileyo.

Okokuqala kula78 yeengcebiso yinto yokuba ingxaxheba entsha yoonoozakuzaku funeke uqalisiwe pambhi kokuba kuphele lonyaka ukwenzela ukukhusela izwe nomhlaba weIraq ekuphazamisekeni ngodlame futhi nokulungisa iintetho zoonoozakuzaku namazwe asondeleyo.
IQembu Locwaningo lase-Iraq lethule umbiko walo ngo-12,00 GMT namuhla.
Iyaxwayisa Akekho ongaqinisekisa ukuthi nanoma iyiphi inkambo e-Iraq okwamanje izoqeda impi yamahlelo, ubudlova obukhulayo, noma ukuthambekela ebuxakalaleni.
UMbiko uvula ngesicelo senkulumo-mpikiswano evulekile kanye nokwenziwa kokuvumelana eMelika ngesimiso saseNingizimu ePhakathi.
Umbiko ugxeka kakhulu cishe zonke izici zesimiso samanje sesiGungu sase-Iraq futhi ucela ukuba kube noshintsho olusheshayo lwenkambo.

Okokuqala phakathi kokutusa kwayo okungu-78 ukuthi isinyathelo sokuxhumana kumelwe sithathe ngaphambi kokuphela kwalonyaka ukuvikela imingcele yase-Iraq ekungeneleni konya kanye nasekumiseni kabusha ubuhlobo bokuxhumana nomakhelwane bayo.
Iqembu Lezemfundo lase-Iraq likhiphe umbiko walo ngo-12.00 GMT namuhla.
Ixwayisa ngokuthi akekho umuntu ongaqiniseka ukuthi noma yini eyenziwe manje e-Iraq izokwazi ukuqeda ukulwa kwamahlelo, ubudlova obandayo, ukuyela ebugqilini.
Umbiko uqala ngesicelo sokuba kuvinjelwe e-United States ngenqubomgomo yaseMpumalanga Ephakathi.
Lo mbiko ubaluleke kakhulu kuzo zonke izici zenqubomgomo etholakalayo yabongamele e-Iraq futhi uphoqelela ushintsho olusheshayo.

Okokuqala kulezi zincomo ezingama-78 yikuthi kwakufanele kuqalwe umkhankaso omusha wezwe ngaphambi kokuphela kwalo nyaka ukuze kuvikelwe i-Iraq nezwe ekuphazamisekeni ngodlame nokulungisa izinkulumo zokuzilibazisa namazwe aseduze.
Imfundo phansi iqembu-umbiko umsindo walo juicer lebanon - 12,00 per namuhla.
Uma akekho uxwayisa unokuziniseka lutho futhi wenza ukuba eIraq ukwazi manje ukuqeda impi amahlelo, obandayo ubudlobongela, ukukweyela ebugxwayibeni.
Lokho kusho umbiko iqala nge isicelo ucwaningo e-united states mayelana ngabe kuvanwe yoMbindi east policy.
Singakanani umbiko we-ibalileke yabongameleyo wonke amabutho atholakalayo kanye nezinguquko inqubomgomo at a speedy service Lebanon.

Umbiko uqala ngesicelo sokuthi kukhulunywe phandle ngisho kuvanwe eMelika mayelana nepolisi eMpumalanga.
Lo mbiko ubalile ke kakhulu ngandlela zonke zepolisi ekhona yabo eyengamele e-Iraq futhi iphoqelela ushintsho olusheshayo.

Umbiko uqala ngesicelo sokuphawula komphakathi e-United States mayelana ne-Middle East.

Ngaphezu kwalokho, i-78 yezeluleko iyiqiniso lokuthi kumele kwethulwe umkhankaso omusha wezwe ngaphambi kokuphela kwalo nyaka ukuze kuvikelwe i-Iraq nezwe engcupheni yodlame kanye nokulamula ubudlelwano namazwe angomakhelwane.
Iqembu Lemfundo lase-Iraq likhiphe isitatimende salo ngo 12.00 GMT namuhla.
Ixwayisa ngokuthi akekho ongaqiniseka ukuthi noma yini eyenziwayo manje e-Iraq izokwazi ukuqeda ukulwa kwamahlelo, ubudlova obandayo, ukukweyela ebuxwayibeni.
Umbiko uqala ngesicelo sokuba kuthethwe phandle ngisho kuvanwe eMerika mayelana ngepholisi yoMkhandlu eMpumalanga.
Lo mbiko ubalileke kakhulu ngendlela zonke zepholisi ekhona yabongamele e Iraq futhi uphoqa izinguquko ezisheshayo.

Okokuqala kula78 lezeluleko yinto yokuthi iqhaza elisha lezonoozokufaneleka liqalisiwe pambi kokuba kuphele lonyaka ukuze livikele izwe nomhlaba weIraq ekuphazamisekeni ngodlame futhi ulungise izinkulumo zoonozokuza namazwe asondelene.
I-Iraqi Education Group ikhiphe umbiko wayo ngo-12.00 GMT namuhla.
Ixwayisa ngokuthi akekho umuntu ongaqiniseka ukuthi noma yini eyenziwayo manje e-Iraq izokwazi ukuqeda izingxabano zamahlelo, idlame udlame futhi luwele enkingeni.
Umbiko uqala ngesicelo sokuphawula komphakathi kanye nesivumelwano esenziwe e-United States ngenqubomgomo yase-Middle East.
Lo mbiko ubaluleke kakhulu kuzo zonke izici zenqubomgomo yamanje kamongameli e-Iraq futhi ufuna ushintsho olusheshayo.

Esokuqala kulezi zincomo ezingama-78 ngukuthi kumele kwethulwe umkhankaso omusha wezwe ngaphambi kokuphela kwalo nyaka ukuze kuvikelwe i-Iraq nezwe engcupheni yodlame kanye nokulamula ubudlelwano bokusebenzisana namazwe angomakhelwane.
Esona Sakhiwo sePhiramidi sase-Giza siso sodwa esisamileyo kwizimanga ezisixhenxe.
Eyakhiwa ngamaJiphutha ngesentyhuri yesithathu, iPiramidi eNkulu yenye yezona zinto zinkulu zakhiwa ngembeko kuFaro ofileyo.

I Giza Plateau, okanye i"Giza Necropolis" Kwisithili sase Jiphutha selabafileyo sinee pyramidi ezinintsi (apho eyona pyramidi enkulu ikwayeyona ibanzi), amangcwaba amanintsi, iitempile ezinintsi, kunye ne Sphinx enkulu.
Iphiramidi enkulu yenzelwe ukuhlonipha uFaro Khufu, kwaye uninzi lweepiramidi ezincinci, amangcwaba kunye neetempile zakhiwa ukuhlonipha abafazi bakaKhufu kunye namalungu osapho.
I-Great Pyramid yase-Giza iyokuphela kwizimangaliso eziyisikhombisa esamile nanamuhla.
Yakhiwe ngabaseGibhithe ngekhulu lesithathu leminyaka BCE, iPhiramidi eliKhulu ngelinye lezakhiwo zamaphiramidi ezakhelwe ukuhlonipha uFaro oshonile.

IThafa Eliphakeme laseGiza, noma “iGiza Necropolis” eSigodini sabaFile saseGibhithe linemibhoshongo emingxa-ntathu eminingana (leyo umbhoshongo omkhulu kuyiwo omkhulu kakhulu), amathuna amaningana amancane, amathempeli amaningana, kanye ne-Sphinx enkulu.

Umbhoshongo omkhulu ongunxa-ntathu wakhelwe ukuhlonipha uFaro uKhufu, futhi neminye imibhoshongo engunxa-ntathu emincanyana, amathuna, kanye namathempeli akhelwe ukuhlonipha inkosikazi kaKhufu kanye namalungu omndeni.
IPhiramidi langempela laseGiza yiso sodwa esinqunyiweyo kwezimangaliso eziyisikhombisa.
Lakhiwa abaseGibhithe ngekhulu lesithathu, iPhiramidi Elikhulu lalingelinye elikhulu kunawo wonke elakhiwa uFaro ofileyo.

IGiza Plateau, noma i-"Giza Necropolis" esifundeni saseGibhithe sabaphansi sinamaphiramidi amaningi (lapho iphiramidi enkulu kunazo zonke iningi), amathuna amaningi, amathempeli amaningi, neGreat Sphinx.
Iphiramidi enkulu yakhelwe ukuhlonipha uFaro Khufu, futhi iningi lamapiramidi amancane, amathuna namathempeli lakhiwa ukuhlonipha abesifazane bakaKhufu namalungu omndeni.
Lesi Sakhiwo mbhoshongo base - futhi single esisamileyo kwizimanga eziyisikhombisa ye.
Okwesithathu Eyakhiwa ngamajiphtha ngesentyhuri, ingenye yezinto ezinkulu iPiramidi omunye wakha behlonipha ufaro omkhulu kanye nendoda cdead.

Wena Kanye Ithafa, noma" ingabe Necropolis " District four jiphtha selabafileyo pyramidi base public (lapho omkhulu ububanzi kwayeyona pyramidi), emathuneni omphakathi, amalungu amathempeli omphakathi, kanye Sphinx omkhulu.
The mbhoshongo omkhulu kafaro Khufu senzelwe ukuhlonipha, futhi lweepiramidi eziningi ezincane, futhi wakha ethempelini amathuna bakaKhufu ukuhlonipha abesifazane kanye namalungu omndeni.
Esona Sakhiwo sePhiramidi sase-Giza yiso sodwa esisamile ngezimangaliso eziyisikhombisa.
Eyakhiwa ngamaJiphutha ngesentubeuri yesithathu, iPiramidi eNkulu ingenye yezinto ezinkulu zakhiwa udumo kuFaro ofileyo.

I Giza Plateau, noma i"Giza Necropolis" Esifundeni sase Jiphutha sendawo yabafileyo sinama pyramidi ezinsikazi (lapho best pyramidi enkulu ifuthi iyona ebanzi), amathuna amaninsi, amathempeli ezinsini, futhi Sphinx enkulu.
Iphiramidi enkulu yenzelwe ukuhlonipha uFaro Khufu, kanti iningi lama-piramidi amancane, amathuna namathempeli akhiwa ukuhlonipha abesifazane bakaKhufu namalungu omndeni.
Lesi sakhiwo sasePhiramidi sase-Giza ukuphela kwalo kwezimangaliso zalo eziyisikhombisa.
Lakhiwa abaseGibhithe ngekhulu lesithathu leminyaka, iPiramidi Elikhulu lalingelinye elikhulu kunawo wonke lokuhlonipha uFaro ongasekho.

I-Giza Plateau, noma i-"Giza necropolis" esifundeni saseGibhithe sabafileyo sinama-pyramid amaningi (lapho i-piramidi enkulu kunazo zonke), amathuna amaningi, amathempeli amaningi, kanye ne-Sphinx enkulu.
Iphiramidi elikhulu laklanyelwe ukuhlonipha uFaro Khufu, futhi iningi lamaphiramididi amancane, amathuna namathempeli lakhiwa ukuhlonipha amakhosikazi kaKhufu namalungu omndeni.
Esona Sakhiwo sePhiramidi sase-Giza yiso sodwa esisamile ngezimangaliso eziyisikhombisa.
Eyakhiwa ngamaJiphutha ngenyhuri yesithathu, iPiramidi eNkulu ingenye yezinto ezinkulu zakhiwa ngomdumo kuFaro ofile.

I Giza Plateau, noma i"Giza Necropolis" Esifundweni sase-Jiphutha selabafileyo sinama pyramidi amaningi (apho okuyiyona pyramidi enkulu futhi ebanzi kakhulu), amathuna amaninsi, amathempeli amaningi, kanye ne Sphinx enkulu.
Iphiramidi enkulu yenzelwe ukuhlonipha uFaro Khufu, futhi iningi lamaphiramidi amancane, amathuna namathempeli lakhiwa ukuhlonipha abesifazane bakaKhufu namalungu omndeni.
IPhiramidi langempela laseGiza ukuphela kwalo kwezimangaliso zalo eziyisikhombisa.
Lakhiwa abaseGibhithe ngekhulu lesithathu leminyaka, iPhiramidi Elikhulu lalingelinye elikhulu kunawo wonke lokuhlonipha uFaro ongasekho.

IGiza Plateau, noma i- "Giza Necropolis" esifundeni saseGibhithe sabaphansi sinamaphiramidi amaningi (lapho iphiramidi enkulu kunazo zonke inkulu kakhulu), amathuna amaningi, amathempeli amaningi, neGreat Sphinx.
Kwakhiwa umbhoshongo omkhulu wokuhlonipha uFaro Khufu, futhi kwakhiwa amapiramidi amancane amancane, amathuna namathempeli okuhlonipha amakhosikazi kaKhufu namalungu omndeni.
Malunga nemizuzu emi-3 kulontshwe, ikhamera esebhodini ibonise iziqwenga ezininzi zokugqobhoza amagwebu kude netanki lamafutha.
Nangona kunjalo, ayicingelwa ukuba ibangele monakalo kwisithuthi.
Umphathi we-NASA oyintloko kwinkqubo ye-shuttle uN.Wayne Hale Jr. uthe amagwebu awile "emva kwexesha esinexhala lalo."
Cishe emizuzwini emithathu ngaphambi kokuqalisa, ikhamera esemkhumbini yaveza izingcezu eziningi zogwebu olufudumazayo luphuma ethangini lamafutha.
Nokho, akucatshangwa ukuthi zenze noma imuphi umonakalo enqoleni.
Isikhulu sohlelo lwemikhumbi-mkhathi luka-NASA u-N. Wayne Hale Jr. uthe igwebu lase liwile "ngemuva kwesikhathi esikhathazekile ngazo."
Cishe emizuzwini emithathu kuqhume, ikhamera ebhodini ikhombise izingcezu eziningi zokugobhoza amagwebu kude netanki likaphethiloli.
Kodwa-ke, akucatshangwa ukuthi kungadala umonakalo emotweni.
Umphathi oyinhloko ohlelweni lwezokuthutha iNASA uNayne Hale Jr. uthe amagwebu awele "emva kwesikhashana esikhathazekile ngakho."
Imizuzu mayelana next 3 kulontshwe, ibhodi ikhamera a show eziningi izingcezu ethangini kuze uphethiloli zokugqobhoza amagwebu.
Nokho, uma umonakalo owabangela ayicingelwa emotweni.
Manager-chief futhi BASE uhlelo n shuttle.Wayne J Bhala. kungani amagwebu kini " emva kwesikhathi isinexhala."
Mayelana nemizuzu emi-3 kulontshwe, ikhamera esebhodini ibonise izingcezu eziningi zokugqokisa amagwebu kude nethangi lamafutha.
Kodwa-ke, akucatshangelwa ukuthi ibangele monakalo esithunjini.
Umphathi we-NASA oyinhloko ohlelweni lwe-shuttle uN.Wayne Hale Jr. uthe amagwebu awile "ngemuva kwesikhathi esinexhala lalo."
Cishe emizuzwini emithathu kuqhume intshontshwe, ikhamera esebhodini ikhombise izingcezu eziningi zokugqobhoza amagwebu kude nethangi likaphethiloli.
Noma kunjalo, akucatshangwa ukuthi kungadala umonakalo emotweni.
Umphathi we-NASA oyinhloko ohlelweni lwezokuthutha uN.Wayne Hale Jr. Uthe amagwebu awile "ngemuva kwesikhashana bakhathazekile".
Mayelana namaminithi angu-3 ekushweni, ikhamera esebhodini ibonise izingcezu eziningi zokubhoboza amagwebu kude nethangi lamafutha.
Noma kunjalo, akucatshangwa ukuthi ibangele monakalo esithuthini.
Umphathi we-NASA oyinhloko ohlelweni lwe-shuttle uN.Wayne Hale Jr. uthe izigwegwe ziwile "emva kwesikhathi esikhathazeka ngaso."
Cishe emizuzwini emithathu kuqhume ihlumela, ikhamera ebisemgodini ikhombise izingcezu ezimbalwa ze-foam ebhola kude nethangi kaphethiloli.
Kodwa-ke, akucatshangwa ukuthi kungadala umonakalo emotweni.

UMzantsi Afrika woyise i-All Blacks (New Zealand) kumdlalo wombutho wombhoxo weTri Nations eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium eRustenburg, eMzantsi Afrika.
Isikoro sokugqibela ibe luloyiso ngenqaku elinye, 21 ku 20, iphelisa imidlalo I All Black’15 streak iphumelela.
Kumabhoko-bhoko, kuphelisa ukutyiwa kangangemidlalo emihlanu elandelelanayo.
Yayingumdlalo wokugqibela we All Blacks, abasele beyiwinile indebe kwiveki ezimbini ezidlulileyo.
Umdlalo wokugqibela kolu luhlu uzakubanjelwa e-Ellis Park eRhawutini kwiveki ezayo, xa iSpringboks sidlala ne-Australia.
INingizimu Afrika ihlule ama-All Blacks (iNyuzilandi) emdlalweni we-ragbhi wenyunyoni we-Tri Nations eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium, eRustenburg, eNingizimu Afrika.
Imiphumela yokugcina bekuwukuphumelela kwephuzu elilodwa, u-21 ku-20, okwaqeda ukuwina njalo kwama-All Blacks kwemidlalo engu-15.
KumaBhokobhoko, lokhu kunqamule ukungaphumeleli emidlalweni emihlanu elandelanayo.
Bekuwumdlalo wokugcina wama-All Blacks, asephumelele kakade indebe emavikini ambalwa adlule.
Umdlalo wokugcina womqhudelwano uzokwenzeka e-Ellis Park eGoli ngeviki elizayo, lapho ama-Springbok edlala ne-Australia.
INingizimu Afrika inqobe i-All Blacks (New Zealand) emdlalweni wenhlangano yombhoxo weTri Nations eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium eRustenburg, eNingizimu Afrika.
Isikoro sokugcina sibe ukunqoba ngephuzu elilodwa, ama-21 kwangu-20, kuphele imidlalo i-All Black’15 streak iwina.
Ehlathini, kuqeda ukudla imidlalo emihlanu elandelanayo.
Kwakungumdlalo wokugcina we-All Blacks, abasele beyiwinile indebe emasontweni amabili edlule.
Umdlalo wokugcina walolu hlu uzobanjelwa e-Ellis Park eRhawutini ngesonto elizayo, lapho amaBhokobhoko edlala ne-Australia.
Iningizimu Afrika uwoyise Bonke Abansundu (Enew Zealand) emdlalweni wezizwe zombhoxo Zenhlangano eRoyal eRustenburg weTri Bafokeng Stadium, eningizimu Afrika.
Owokugcina esihlokweni kungase kube inkambiso luloyiso, 20 kuya 21, ophela Yonke Imidlalo Black ' winning streak 15.
Kumabhoko-box, ukuqeda umdlalo nge ezinhlanu kuya elandelanayo ukutyiwa.
Yebo Last Yayingumdlalo Bonke Abansundu, ngubani kakade beyiwinile ngesonto in the cup izinyanga ezimbili ezedlule.
Lolu hlu uzakubanjelwa in the game last At Bell Park egoli ngesonto elizayo, lapho sidlala iSpringboks And Australia.

Ngeli xesha kwimbali yase-Yurophu, Inkonzo yamaRoma Katoliae, eyade yanemali namandla, yajongwa ngeliso lesikrokro.
Ukuya kwiminyaka engaphezu kwamawaka inkolo yobu Kristu yahlanganisa amazwe aseYurophu nangona ehlukene ngeelwini nezithethe.
Ingamandla aphikisayo echaphazela ukusuka kwikumkani ukuya nakumxukuxela.
Enye yeendlela eziphambili zobuKristu kukuba ubutyebi kufuneka busetyenziselwe ukunciphisa ukubandezeleka kunye nentlupheko kwaye iimali zecawa zikho ngokukodwa ngenxa yeso sizathu.
Intloko yomthetho yecawa yayise-Roma iminyaka engapha kwewaka futhi noluxinzelelo lemali namandla yakrokrisa isininzi ukuba umgaqo siseko wakhe ebeqondile.
Phakathi nalenkathi yomlando waseYurophu, iSonto lamaKatolika, elalicebile futhi linamandla, lahlolisiswa.
Ngaphezu kweminyaka eyinkulungwane inkolo yobuKhristu yahlanganisa amazwe waseYurophu ndawonye ngaphezu kokuhluka kwezilimi namasiko.
Amandla waso akuyo yonke indawo athinta wonke umuntu kusukela enkosini kuya emuntwini ovamile.
Enye yemigomo eyinhloko yobuKristu ukuthi ingcebo kufanele isetshenziselwe ukudambisa ukuhlupheka nobuphofu nokuthi imali yebandla ilapho ngenxa yaleso sizathu.
Abaphathi abakhulu besonto babeseRoma iminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane futhi lokhu kuqoqana kwamandla nemali kwaholela abaningi ekusoleni ukuthi lomgomo wemfundiso uyafinyelelwa yini.
Ngalesi sikhathi emlandweni waseYurophu, iSevisi yamaRoma iKatoliae, eyade yanemali namandla, yabhekwa ngeso lesikrokro.
Sekuyizinkulungwane zeminyaka inkolo yobuKristu ihlanganise neYurophu naphezu kokwehluka kwezilwane namasiko.
Kungamandla aphikisayo asuka enkosini aye esihlalweni sobukhosi.
Enye yezindlela ezingcono kakhulu zobuKristu ukuthi ingcebo kufanele isetshenziselwe ukunciphisa ukuhlupheka nobuhlungu futhi izimali zesonto zikhona ikakhulukazi ngenxa yalesi sizathu.
Inhloko yesonto yayiseRoma iminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane futhi ngokucindezelwa kwemali namandla wasola iningi ukuthi umthethosisekelo wakhe uqinile.
Ngalesi sikhathi emlandweni Europe, amaroma amehlo Katoliae Services, futhi amandla yanemali eyade, lesikrokro yajongwa eye.
Izinkulungwane ezengeziwe eminyakeni kule nkolo Enkulu Kakristu namasiko ahlukene yahlanganisa ngeelwini nakuba amazwe aseyurophu.
Ehlaselwe amandla amakhosi aphikisayo nakumxukuxela.
Ingcebo eyinhloko ingenye yezindlela ezingcono kakhulu kumelwe kobukristu busetyenziselwe ubumpofu nokuhlupheka futhi ukunciphisa inani yeso kodwa ngenxa yesizathu esontweni lapho.
Yayise inhloko yesonto-Rome engapha iminyaka ingcindezi kanye imali eningi kanye namandla umthethosisekelo kuya yakrokrisa ebeqondile yakhe.
Ngalesi sikhathi emlandweni waseYurophu, Inkonzo YamaRoma Katoliae, eyade yanemali namandla, yahlongozwa ngeso lesikrokro.
Ukuya eminyakeni engaphezu kweyizinkulungwane zenkolo yobuKristu yahlanganisa amazwe aseYurophu naphezu ehlukene ngeelwini namasiko.
Ingamandla aphikisayo ethinta kusukela enkosini kuya nakumxuku.

Inhloko yomthetho wesonto yayise-Roma iminyaka engapha kwenkulungwane futhi ingcindezi yemali namandla yakrokrisa isiningi ukuthi isimiso sesisekelo sakhe ebe siqondile.
Ngalesi sikhathi emlandweni waseYurophu, iSonto lamaRoma iKatoliae, elake lacebile futhi linamandla, labhekwa ngokusola.

Kungamandla aphikisayo asuka enkosini aye esihlalweni sobukhosi.
Enye yezindlela ezibaluleke kakhulu zobuKristu ukuthi ingcebo kufanele isetshenziselwe ukudambisa ukuhlupheka nobuphofu nokuthi izimali zesonto ngokuyinhloko zenzelwe leso sizathu.
Inhloko yesonto yayiseRoma iminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane futhi ngokucindezelwa kwemali namandla wasola iningi ukuthi umthethosisekelo wakhe uqinisile.

Owoyikayo Ukumkani u Louis XVI, u Kumkanikazi u Marie Antoinette abantwana babo ababini (ominyaka iyi 11 uMarie Therese none mine ubudala u Louis-Charles) nodade bo Kumkani, uMadam Elizabeth, ngomhla we 6th October 1789 banyanzeliswa ukuba baphindlele emva e Paris besuka e Versailles sisiqhu sono Malike abangamanina.
Ngekhaleji, babuyela umva ukuya e Paris berangqwe sisiqhu sabantu bekhwaza behawula ngezoyikiso kwi Kumkani NeKumkanikazi.
Igquba labantu lanyanzela uKumkani noKumkanikazi ukuba bavule iifestile zenqwelomoya.
Ngaxesha lithile ilungu legquba lawangawangisa intloko yonogada wasebukhosini owabulawa eVersailles phambi koKumkanikazi owayesoyika

Inkosi uLouis XVI ethukile, iNdlovukazi uMarie Antoinette kanye nezingane zabo ezincane ezimbili (uMarie Therese oneminyaka engu-11 ubudala kanye noLouis-Charles eneminyaka emine ubudala) kanye nodadewabo weNkosi, iNkosazana u-Elizabeth, ngomhla ka-6 Okthoba 1789 baphoqelelwa ukubuyela eParis besuka eVersailles uquqaba lwabesifazane basemakethe.
Besenkalishini, babuyela emuva ePherisi bezungezwe uquqaba lwabantu oluklabalasa kanye nokumemeza izinsongo ngokumelene neNkosi kanye neNdlovukazi.
Isixuku sabantu siphoqelele iNkosi kanye neNdlovukazi ukuba bavule kakhulu amafasitela esithuthi sabo.
Kunesikhathi lapho ilungu loquqaba lalifuna ukunqathuzisa ikhanda lonogada wasebukhosini obulawe eVersailles phambi kweNdlovukazi ethukile.

Ukwesaba kweNkosi uLouis XVI, iNdlovukazi uMarie Antoinette nezingane zabo ezimbili (uMarie Therese oneminyaka engu-11 ubudala uLouis-Charles oneminyaka emine) kanye nodadewabo beNkosi, uMadam Elizabeth, ngomhlaka 6 Okthoba 1789 baphoqeleka ukubuyela eParis IVersailles ngemihlambi yezono zabesifazane abangamaMalike.
Ngekhaleji, babuyela eParis bezungezwe yisiqhingi sabantu ababememememememememememememeza besabisa iNkosi neNdlovukazi.
Inkunzi yabantu yanciphisa iNdlovukazi neNdlovukazi ukuvula amawindi endiza.
Ngesikhathi esithile ilungu lesigodo lalinikeza ikhanda likanogada wasebukhosini owabulawa eVersailles phambi kweNdlovukazi eyayisesaba

XVI Owoyikayo Uyinkosi, Indlovukazi Antoinette mario abe ezimbili zezingane zabo (lona bear-unyaka owodwa ubudala engu-11 ubudala babe umario usuku-Charles) nokuthi Kodade Inkosi, Elizabeth adam, ngomhlaka 6 okthoba 1789 emva banyanzelisa Kusukela Eparis Saseversailles baphindlele e e siqhu by the relief society of sin.
Ngekhaleji, kamuva wabuyela Eparis berangqwe siqhu e behawula ngoyikiso ekhala abantu Enkosini nasendlovukazi.
Inkosi nendlovukazi yabantu kugquba lanyanzela zenqwelomoya ukuvula iwindi.
Ngesikhathi esifanayo ikhanda kuyinto ethile lawangawangisa kugquba abulewe ngaphambi indlovukazi wasebukhosini yonogada eVersailles owayesoyika

Owesaba inkosi u Louis XVI, i Nkosi marie Antoinette izingane zabo ezimbili (oneminyaka engu 11 uMarie Therese none mine ubudala u Louis-Charles) nodadewabo ka Nkosi, uMadam Elizabeth, mhlaka 6th October 1789 baphoqeleka ukuba baphindlele emuva e Paris besuka e Versailles yisiqhuqhu sono Malike abangamanina
Ngekhaleji, babuyela emuva ukuya e Paris berangqwe yisiqhuqhu sabantu bekhwaza bexhawulana ngezoyikiso e Nkosini NeNkosi.
Igquba labantu laphoqa iNkosi neNkosi ukuthi bavule amawindi ezindizayo.
Ngesikhathi lithile ilungu legquba lawangawangisa ikhanda lonogada wasebukhosini owabulawa eVersailles phambi kweNkosi kazime owayesaba

Ukwesaba kweNkosi uLouis XVI, iNdlovukazi uMarie Antoinette nezingane zabo ezimbili (uMarie Therese oneminyaka engu-11 ubudala waseLouis-Charles oneminyaka emine) kanye nodadewabo beNkosi, uMadam Elizabeth, ngomhlaka 6 Okthoba 1789 baphoqeleka ukubuyela eParis eVersailles ngemuva kwezono zaseMalike.
Ngenqola, baphindela eParis bezungezwe yisixuku sabantu ababememeza futhi bememeza iNkosi neNdlovukazi.
Izingqwembe zabantu ziphoqe iSilo neNdlovukazi ukuthi zivule amawindi endiza.
Ngesinye isikhathi ilungu lesixuku lalinikina ikhanda lomqaphi wasebukhosini owabulawa eVersailles phambi kweNdlovukazi eyayesaba

Ngekhaleji, babuyela emuva ukuya e Paris berangqwe yisiqhu sabantu bekhwaza behaula ngezokwesaba ku Nkosi Nenkosi.
Iquba labantu laphoqa iNkosi noNkosikazi ukuba bavule amawindi ezindizayo.
Ngesikhathi ithile ilungu lequba lalingawangisa ikhanda lonogada wasebukhosini owabulawa eVersailles phambi kukaNkosikazi owayesesabayo

Ngenqola, baphindela eParis bezungezwe yisixuku sabantu ababememeza futhi bememeza besabisa iNkosi neNdlovukazi.

UFlute wabhala ukuba imizamo yabanye yokudimaza amabhinqa ukuba athethe phandle ngempilo yamabhinqa khange iphumelele.
Ufikelel kisigqibo emva kwezimvo eziyinqwaba nenkuthazo ayifumene kubafazi namadoda becenga besithi amayeza ocwangciso amele ajongwe njengayimfuneko kwezonyango.
UFluke ubhale ukuthi imizamo yabanye yokuvimba abesifazane ukuthi bakhulume ngempilo yabesifazane ayiphumelelanga.

Ufike kulesi siphetho ngenxa yokuphawula okuhle okuningi kanye nesikhuthazo athunyelwe sona kokubili abantu ngabanye besifazane kanye nabesilisa becela ukuthi imithi yokuvimbela inzalo ibhekwe njengesidingo sezokwelapha.
UFlute ubhale ukuthi imizamo yabanye yokudimaza abesifazane ukukhuluma ngempilo yabesifazane ayiphumelele.
Ufinyelele esinqumweni ngemuva kwezimvo eziyinqwaba nenkuthazo ayithole kwabesifazane nabesilisa becenga bethi imithi yokuhlela kufanele ibhekwe njengesidingo sezokwelapha.
Wabhala ukuthi ucwaningo UFlute yokudimaza abanye besifazane ukukhuluma ocwaningweni lwezempilo yamabhinqa akazange ukunqoba.
Emva isinqumo ukufinyelela imibono nesikhuthazo amadoda nabesifazane eziyinqwaba wathi ayifumene of the imithi kanye izinkolelo kufanele wabheka kwenyango njengayimfuneko ukuhlela.

Ufinyelele kisinqumo ngemuva kwezimvo eziyinqwaba nenkuthazo ayitholile kwabesifazane namadoda becenga bethi imithi yokuhlela kumele ihlonzwe njengayisidingo kwezokwelapha.
UFlute ubhale ukuthi imizamo yabanye yokuyekisa abesifazane ukukhuluma ngokukhululeka ngempilo yabesifazane.
Ufinyelele esiphethweni ngemuva kwezimvo eziningi kanye nokukhuthazwa kwabesifazane nabesilisa abathi izindlela zokuvimbela inzalo kufanele zibhekwe njengezidinga ukwelashwa.

Ufinyelelel kisinqumo ngemuva kwemibono eyinqwaba nenkuthazo ayithole kwabesifazane nabesilisa becenga bethi imithi yokuhlela kumele ijeziswe njengayisidingo kwezokwelapha.
UFlute ubhale ukuthi ayiphumelelanga imizamo yabanye yokuyekisa abesifazane ukukhuluma ngokukhululeka ngempilo yabesifazane.
Ufinyelele esiphethweni ngemuva kwezimvo eziningi kanye nokukhuthazwa kwabesifazane nabesilisa abathi izindlela zokuvimbela inzalo kufanele zibhekwe njengezidinga ukwelashwa.
Isimbo seGothic sifike kwithuba eliphakathi kwesentyhuri ye-10 ukuya kweye-11 kunye neye-14.
Ekuqaleni ilokhwe phenjelelwa kakhulu yinkcubeko yaseByzantine empuma.
Nangona kunjalo, ngenxa yamajelo onxibelelwano acothayo, izitayile entshona bezinokusalela ngasemva ngama-25 ukuya kuma-30 eminyaka.

malunga nasekupheleni kwelixa le Middle Age I western Europe yaqalisa ukuzenzela esayo isimbo.Olona phuhliso lukhulu yeloxesha ngenxa yecrusade abantu baqalisa ukusebenzisa amaqhosha ekuqhosheni impahla.
Isitayela sobuGothiki sakhula ngenkathi ephakathi kwamakhulu weminyaka wama-10 -11 nekhulu leminyaka lama-14.
Ekuqaleni ukwembatha kwakuthonywe kakhulu isiko laseByzantium empumalanga.
Noma kunjalo, ngenxa yokungabi khona kwezindlela zokuxhumana, izitayela zasentshonalanga zingasalela emuva ngeminyaka ewu-25 ukuya kwengu-30.

Ngasekupheleni kweNkathi Ephakathi intshonalanga Yurophu yaqala ukuthuthukisa isitayela sayo. Enye yentuthuko enkulu kakhulu yaleso sikhathi ngenxa yabalweli benkolo abantu baqala ukusebenzisa izinkinobho ukubopha izimpahla zokugqoka.
Isitayela seGothic sifike ekhulwini le-10 kuya kwele-11 nele-14.
Ekuqaleni ingubo yayithonywe kakhulu yisiko lase-Eastern Byzantine.
Kodwa-ke, ngenxa yokuxhumana okucacile, izitayela zasentshonalanga zingasalela ngemuva iminyaka engama-25 kuya kwengama-30.

Cishe ngasekupheleni kweNkathi Ephakathi iNtshonalanga Yurophu yaqala ukuzenzela isitayela sayo. Ukuthuthukiswa okukhulu kwaleso sikhathi ngenxa yecrusade abantu baqala ukusebenzisa izinkinobho ekuqhosheni izimpahla.
Safika ngesitayela senkathi ephakathi kwesegothic kwesentyhuri-kweye kuya ku-10-no-11 no-14.
Ekuqaleni empumalanga ziye eziphefumulelwe yinkcubeko yaseByzantine omkhulu ngokwayo.
Nokho, ngenxa inkululeko press yokuxhumana acothayo, west bezinokusala izitayile ngemuva by kuze 25 cent kuya eminyakeni 30.

ekupheleni Kwenkathi Ephakathi kulokhu mayelana western Europe futhi waqala ukwenza isitayela esayo.Ngenxa yokuthuthukiswa kwabantu basentshonalanga yekapa yeloxesha yecrusade baqala ukusebenzisa izinkinobho ezimpahleni zokuqhosheni.
Isitayela seGothic sifike esikhathini esiphakathi kwesentyhuri ye-10 kuya kweye-11 neye-14.
Ekuqaleni ilokwe phenjelelwa kakhulu yisiko laseByzantine empumalanga.
Kodwa-ke, ngenxa yeziteshi zokuxhumana ezicothayo, izitayela ezisentshonalanga zingasalela ngemuva ngamaphesenti angu-25 kuya kwangu-30 eminyaka.

mayelana nasekupheleni kwehora le Middle Age I western Europe yaqala ukuzenzela esabekayo isitayela.Lona intuthuko yesiteshi sesikhathi ngenxa ye-crusade abantu baqala ukusebenzisa izinkinobho ekuqhosheni impahla.

Kodwa-ke, ngenxa yokuxhumana okuhamba kancane, izitayela zasentshonalanga zingasalela emuva iminyaka engu-25 kuya kwengu-30.

Kwintetho ephambili yangoLwesine yeTokyo Game Show, uMongameli weNintendo uSatoru Iwata watyhila uyilo lolawulo lwenkampani entsha yeNintendo Revolution.
Efana ne-remote yomabonwakude, i-controlla isebenzisa ii-sensor ezimbhini ezibekwe kufuphi nomabonakude womntu ukuveza ukuma kwayo kwisithuba sobukhulu besithathu.
Oku kuyakuvumela abadlali ukuba balawule iintshukumo kunye nentshukumo kwimidlalo yevidiyo ngokuhambisa isixhobo emoyeni.
EsethulwenisangoLwesine esasingumongo se-Tokyo Game Show, umongameli we-Nintendo u-Satoru Iwata wadalula isakhiwo sesilawuli se-Nintendo Revolution sesilawuli esisha senkampani.
Isilawuli esifana ne-remote yethelevishini, sisebenzisa izinzwa ezimbili ezibekwe duzane nethelevishini ukwenza indawo yayo ibe nezingxenye ezintathu endaweni enezinhlangothi ezintathu.
Lokhu kuzovumela abadlali ukuba balawule izenzo nokunyakaza emdlalweni wevidiyo ngokunyakazisa isisetshenziswa emoyeni.
Enkulumweni yosuku lwangoLwesine iTokyo Game Show, uMongameli weNintendo uSatoru Iwata wethule umklamo wokuphathwa kwenkampani entsha yeNintendo Revolution.
Ngokufana ne-remote ithelevishini, i-controlla isebenzisa izinzwa ezimbili ezibekwe eduze kwethelevishini yomuntu ukuveza ukuma kwayo esikhaleni sesithathu sobukhulu.
Lokhu kuzovumela abadlali ukuthi balawule ukunyakaza nokunyakaza emidlalweni yevidiyo ngokuhambisa idivayisi emoyeni.
Igama ehola in the yangoLwesine Yetokyo Snap isethulo, Iwata wembulela umongameli design management wenintendo company uSatoru yeNintendo A Revolution entsha.
Like and yomabonwakue remote, d-controlla usebenzisa inzwa ibekwe eduze ithelevishini abantu ezimbhini me ukukhiqiza it futhi esikhaleni ezintathu esiphezulu.
Uma lokhu rule kuyakuvumela player action video game in the action kanye ithuluzi ezihambayo emoyeni.
Kwinkulumo eyinhloko yangoLwesine yeTokyo Game Show, uMongameli weNintendo uSatoru Iwata wembula umklamo wokuphathwa kwenkampani entsha yeNintendo Revolution.
Efana ne-remote yamathelevishini, i-controlla isebenzisa ama-sensor ezimbhini ezibekwe eduze nomabonakude womuntu ukuveza ukuma kwayo kungakapheli usayizi wesithathu.

Ngaphambi kweSimpsons uSimon wayesebenze kwimiboniso eliqela kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo.
Ngexesha lama-1980s wayesebenza kwimiboniso enje ngeTeksi, iiCheers, kunye neTracy Ullman Show.
Ngo-1989 wanceda ukwenza i-The Simpsons no-Brooks futhi no-Groening, futhi wayenoxanduva lokuqesha iqela lokuqala labhali bomdlalo.
Ngaphandle kokushiya umboniso ngo-1993 wagcina isihloko somvelisi olawulayo, kwaye waqhubeka nokufumana amashumi ezigidi zeedola rhoqo.

Ngaphezu kokuyeka uhlelo ngo-1993 ugcine isiqu somdidiyeli wohlelo, futhi waqhubeka nokuthola amashumi wezigidi zamadola isizini ngayinye wemivuzo.
