Umongameli waseMelika uGeorge W. Bush usamkele esi sibhengezo.
Isithethi sika Bush u Gordon Johndroe wachaza umnikelo wase North Korea"njengenyathelo elikhulu lokuphumelela okuqinisekisekisiweyo ukususwa kwe nuclear kwi Korean peninsula."
Umongameli waseMelika uGeorge W Bush wasamukela isimemezelo.
Umkhulumeli kaBush uGordon Johndroe ubize isithembiso seNyakatho Korea "ngesinyathelo esiyinhloko emgomweni wokususwa kwezikhali zenuzi okungafakazelwa enhlonhlweni yaseKorea."
UMengameli waseMelika uGeorge W. Bush usamukele lesi simemezelo.
Okhulumela uBush uGordon Johndroe uchaze umnikelo waseNyakatho Korea "njengesinyathelo esikhulu sokuphumelela okuqinisekisile ukususwa kwe-nuclear eKorea peninsula."
The free state umongameli america george W. samukela isimemezelo Ehlathini.
Isikhulumi sachaza Isihlahla Ugordon Johndroe sokunikela Ngesisekelo Senyakatho Korea"ukuze siwine njengengxenye enkulu ekucinisekisekisiweyo enhlonhlweni yasekorea ukususwa kwenuzi."
Umongameli waseMelika George W. Bush usamukele lesi simemezelo.
Isikhulumi sika Bush gordon Johndroe wachaza umnikelo waseNorth Korea"njengesinyathelo esikhulu sokuwina okuqinisekisiwe ukususwa kwe nuclear ku-Korean peninsula."
UMengameli waseMelika uGeorge W. Bush usamukele lesi simemezelo.
Isikhulumi sika Bush uGordon Johndroe uchaze umnikelo waseNorth Korea "njengesinyathelo esikhulu kakhulu sokuphumelela ukususwa kwenuzi enhlonhlweni yaseKorea".
Umengameli waseMelika uGeorge W. Bush usamukele lesi simemezelo.
Isikhulumi sika Bush u Gordon Johndroe wachaza umnikelo wase North Korea"njengesinyathelo esikhulu sokunqoba okuqinisekisiwe ukususwa kwe nuclear ku Korean peninsula."
UMengameli waseMelika uGeorge W. Bush usamukele lesi simemezelo.
Okhulumela uBush uGordon Johndroe uchaze umnikelo waseNyakatho Korea "njengesinyathelo esikhulu phambili ekutholeni ukususwa kwenuzi enhlonhlweni yaseKorea."
Iindleko zeenkcitho zokulwa kwe-impiriyalizim e-U.S xa kuthathwa iiPhilippines zahlawulelwa abantu bakwiiPhilippines uqobo.
Banyanzeleka ukuba babhatale irhafu kwiziphathamandla iUS colonial ukuhlangabezana nobukhulu benkcitho nengeniso yebhondi egameni likarulumente wasePhillipine kwiWall Street yebhanka zezindlu.
Kakade, ingeniso ebaxekileyo efumaneke ngokuxhaphaza abantu base Filipino yenza ingeniso ye imperialism yase U.S.
Izindleko zempi zobukhosi baseMelika lapho inqoba iPhilippines zakhokhelwa abantu basePhilippines ngokwabo.

Baphoqelelwa ukukhokhela intela umbuso wobukoloni waseMelika ukukhokha ingxenye enkulu yezindleko futhi inzalo yamabhondi yabekwa egameni likahulumeni wasePhilippines ngezindlu zasebhange zeWall Street.
Kusobala, izinzuzo ezinkulu ezitholwe ngokuxhaphazwa okungapheli kwabantu baseFilipino benza izinzuzo eziyisisekelo zobukhosi baseMelika.
Izindleko zokusetshenziswa kwe-imperialist e-U.S lapho abasePhilippines bebhekwa zakhokhelwa abantu basePhilippines ngokuvamile.

Baphoqeleka ukuthi bakhokhe intela kuziphathimandla zamakoloni zase-US ukuze kuhlangatshezwane nezindleko ezinkulu nemali engenayo yebhondi egameni likahulumeni wasePhillipine emabhange ezindlu eWall Street.
Yiqiniso, inzuzo ebabazekayo etholakala ngokuxhaphaza abasePhilippines yenza inzuzo ye-imperialism yase-U.S.
Ukulwa nezindleko-e impiriyalizim nande eyodwa ngekhulu ukuthatha S ukuba original bakwiiPhilippines iiPhilippines abantu.
Imibuso yamakoloni yaphoqeleka ukuba ikhokhe izintela futhi ihlangabezane nemali engenayo kanye nezindleko egameni le-wasePhillipine enkulu kwiWall yebhondi urulumente bank street house.
Yiqiniso, i-revenue base etholakalayo ngokuxhaphaza ebaxekileyo abantu Filipino ukudala imali nande eziyikhulu imperialismS.
Izindleko zezinkcitho zokulwa kwe-impiriyalizim e-U.S lapho kuthathwa amaPhilippines akhokhelwa abantu bakumaPhilippines uqobo.
Baphoqeleka ukuba bakhokhele intela ngeziphathamandla i-US colonial ukuhlangabezana nobukhulu benkcitho nemali yebhondi egameni likarulumente wasePhillipine kuWall Street yebhanka yezindlu.
Yiqiniso, engenayo ebaxekethile etholakale ngokuxhaphaza abantu base Filipino kwenza ingeniso ye imperialism yase-U.S.
Izindleko zokusetshenziswa kwama-imperialist e-U.S ngenkathi iPhilippines ithathwa yakhokhelwa ngabantu basePhilippines uqobo.
Baphoqeleka ukuthi bakhokhe izintela kubaphathi bamakoloni baseMelika ukuhlangabezana nezindleko ezinkulu kanye nemali engenayo yebhondi egameni likahulumeni wasePhilippines eWall Street.
Yiqiniso, inzuzo etholwe ngokuxhaphaza abasePhilippines yenza inzuzo ye-imperialism yase-U.S.
Izindleko zezinhlelo zokulwa kwe-impiriyalizim e-U.S uma kubhekwa amaPhilippines akhokhelwa abantu bakwaPhilippines uqobo.
Baphoqeleka ukuba babhadale intela ezifundeni iUS colonial ukuhlangabezana nobukhulu benhlangano nengeniso yebhondi egameni likahulumende wasePhillipine kuWall Street webhanka lezindlu.
Kakade, ingeniso ebaxekile etholakale ngokuhlukumeza abantu base Filipino yenza ingeniso ye imperialism yase U.S.
Izindleko zokusetshenziswa kwama-imperialist e-U.S ngenkathi iPhilippines ithathwa yakhokhelwa ngabantu basePhilippines uqobo.

Izityalo zenza ioksijini ephefumlwa ngabantu, kwaye zithatha ikharbon-dayoksayidi ekhutshwa ngabantu (oko kukuthi, baphefumlele ngaphandle).
Izityalo zikwazi ukwenza ukutya ngenxa yelanga zisebenzisa inkqubo eyi-photosynthesis. Zikwenza nomthunzi.
Sakha imizi yethu ngezityal futhi senza nempahla yethu ngezityalo. Isininzi sokutya esikutyayo zizityalo. Kungekho zityalo, izilwanyane azinokwazi ukuphila.
Izitshalo zenza i-oxygen leyo ephefumulwa abantu, futhi zithatha i-carbon-dioxide leyo ekhishwa abantu (okungukuthi, ukuphefumula ukhiphe umoya).
Izitshalo zenza ukudla kwazo nge-photosynthesis. Zibuye zenze nomthunzi.
Senza izindlu zethu ngezitshalo futhi senza nezingubo ngezitshalo. Ukudla okuningi esikudlayo izitshalo. Ngaphandle kwezitshalo, izilwane angeke ziqhubeke ziphila.
Izitshalo zenza umoya-mpilo ophefumulwe ngabantu, futhi zithatha ikharbon-dayoksayidi ekhishwa ngabantu (okungukuthi, baphefumulele ngaphandle).
Izitshalo zikwazi ukwenza ukudla ngelanga zisebenzisa i-photosynthesis. Zakha nomthunzi.
Sakha amadolobha ethu ngezitshalo futhi senza izimpahla zethu ngezitshalo. Iningi lokudla esikudlayo yizitshalo. Ngaphandle kwezitshalo, izilwane bezingeke zisinde.
The comments do oksijini izitshalo abantu, futhi uthathe ikharbon-dayoksayidi ekhishwe umuntu (okungukuthi, ngaphandle trust).
Angakwazi ukukwenza ngenxa yezilimo zokudla i-yelanga isebenzisa inqubo elandelayo-i-photosynthesis. Nomthunzi musa.
The prov and I nezimpahla zethu senza ngezitimela zethu zethu. Izitshalo eziningi zokutyayo sokutya. Ayikho izitshalo, izilwanyane bukhoma ukwazi.

Ngokweendaba zamva nje, ufundo ngamaqondo olwandle lubonise ukuba itsunami iyaqulunqeka. Ibekhona itsunami echaziweyo kufuphi ne Pago Pago ne Niue.

Akukho monakalo mkhulu okanye ukwenzakala okuxeliweyo eTonga, kodwa umbane ulahlekile okwethutyana, ekuthiwa oko kuthintele abasemagunyeni baseTonga ekufumaneni isilumkiso se-tsunami esikhutshwe yi-PTWC.
Izikolo ezilishumi elinesine eHawaii ezikumandla onxuse ulwandle ziye zavalwa ngoLwesithathu nangona izilumkiso bezirhoxisiwe.
Ngokwencwajana yezindaba yakamuva, amazinga omthamo olwandle aveze ukuthi i-tsunami yenzekile. Bekune-tsunami ebekhona erekhodwe eduze nePago Pago kanye neNiue.

Awukho umonakalo omkhulu noma ukulimala okubikiwe eTonga, kodwa ugesi ubungekho okwesikhashana, lokho okubikwa ukuthi kuvimebele iziphathimandla zaseTonga ekutholeni isexwayiso setsunami esikhishwe iPTWC.
Izikole eziyishumi nanye eHawaii ezisendaweni noma eziseduze nogu bezivaliwe ngoLwesithathu wonke nangaphezu kokususwa kwesixwayiso.
Ngokwemibiko yezindaba zakamuva, ucwaningo lwamazinga olwandle lukhombisile ukuthi ama-tsunami ayakhula. Kube khona itsunami ebikiwe ngasePago Pago naseNiue.
Akukho monakalo omkhulu noma ukulimala okubikiwe oThongathi, kodwa ugesi udukile okwesikhashana, okuthiwa uvimbele iziphathimandla zaseTonga ukuthola isexwayiso se-tsunami esikhishwe yi-PTWC.
Izikole eziyishumi nane eHawaii ezisogwini lolwandle zivaliwe ngoLwesithathu yize kuhoxiswe izexwayiso.
Just wezwa izindaba, ukufunda i degrees itsunami iyaqulunqeka of the sea. Lapho itsunami eduze Pago Pago Kanye Qatar futhi esibekiwe.
ETonga okuxeliweyo akukho umonakalo noma ukulimala, kodwa elahlekile ugesi isikhashana, njengoba wabiza iziphathimandla ukuvimbela ukuthola baseTonga isixwayiso-tsunami ekhishwe PTWC.
Izikole eziyishumi nane olwandle zinamandla onxuse eHawaii zavala bezirhoxisiwe ngolwesithathu naphezu kwezixwayiso.
Ngokwezindaba zakamuva nje, isifundo ngamazinga olwandle sibonise ukuthi i-tsunami iyaklanywa. Ibe khona i-tsunami eshiwo eduze kwe Pago Pago ne Niue.

Akukho monakalo mkhulu noma ukulimala okuxekethile eTonga, kodwa ugesi ulahlekile okwesikhashana, okuthiwa lokho kuthinte iziphathimandla zaseTonga ekutholeni isexwayiso se-tsunami esikhishwe yi-PTWC.
Izikole eziyishumi nane eHawaii ezikumandla onxuse ulwandle ziye zavalwa ngoLwesithathu nakuba izixwayiso bezihoxisiwe.
Ngokusho kwabezindaba zakamuva, ucwaningo lwamazinga olwandle lukhombisile ukuthi ama-tsunami ayakhula. I-itsunami ebikiwe ngasePago Pago naseNiue.
Akukho monakalo noma monakalo omkhulu obikiwe eTonga, kodwa ugesi ulahlekile okwesikhashana, okuthiwa uvimbele iziphathimandla zaseTonga ukuthi zithole isexwayiso se-tsunami ezikhishwe yi-PTWC.
Izikole eziyishumi nane eHawaii ezisogwini lolwandle zivaliwe ngoLwesithathu yize kuhoxisiwe izexwayiso.
Ngokwezindaba zamuva nje, ucwaningo lwamazinga olwandle lubonise ukuthi isunami liyasungulwa. Itholakala isunami elichaziwe eduze Pago ne Niue.

Izikole eziyishumi nane eHawaii ezikumandla onxuse ulwandle ziye zavalwa ngoLwesithathu yize izixwayiso bezihoxisiwe.
Ngokombiko wezindaba zakamuva, ucwaningo olusezingeni lolwandle lukhombisile ukuthi ama-tsunami ayakhula. Kube khona itsunami ebikiwe ngasePago Pago naseNiue.
Akukho monakalo noma monakalo omkhulu obikiwe oThongathi, kodwa ugesi ulahlekile okwesikhashana, okuthiwa uvimbele iziphathimandla zaseTonga ukuthi zithole isexwayiso se-tsunami esikhishwe yi-PTWC.
Izikole eziyi-14 ezizinze olwandle ezizinze eHawaii zivaliwe ngoLwesithathu yize kuhoxisiwe izexwayiso.
UMlawuli wezoTshutshiso loLuntu, u-Kier Starmer QC, wenze ingxelo ngale ntsasa evakalisa ukutshutshiswa kwabo bobabini uHuhne noPryce.
U-Huhne urhoxile kwaye oza kungena esikhundleni kwiKhabhinethi ngu-Ed Davey MP. Norman Lam MP kulindeleke ukuba athathe umsebenzi woMphathiswa Wezamashishini uDavey uyaphuma.
UHuhne noPryce bacwangciselwe ukuvela kwiNkundla kaMantyi yaseWestminster ngoFebruwari 16.
UMqondisi wezoKubekwa Kwamacala koMphakathi, uKier Starmer QC, unikeze isitatimende namuhla ekuseni ememezela ukubekwa kwecala kukaHuhne kanye noPryce bobabili.

UHuhne ushiye phansi futhi uzothathelwa isikhundla kuyiKhabhinethi ngu- -Ed Davey oyiLungu lePhalamende. U-Norman Lamb oyiLungu lePhalamende kulindelwe ukuthi athathe umsebenzi kaNgqongqoshe weBhizinisi oyekwa uDavey.
UHhne kanye noPryce bahlelelwe ukuvela eNkantolo kaMatshi yaseWestminster ngoFebruwari 16,
UMqondisi Wezokushushiswa Komphakathi, uKier Starmer QC, wenze isitatimende ekuseni ememezela ukushushiswa kwabo bobabili uHuhne noPryce.

Owayelipolisa oli-Filipino ugcine uthathe abahambi base-Hong Kong njengamabanjwa sakhe ngokuhlasela ibhasi yabo e-Manila, ikomkhulu le-Philippines
URolando Mendoza wadubula umpu wakhe iM16 kubakhenkethi.
Baliqela abathinjwa esele behlanguliwe kwaye ubuncinci bathandathu selebefile ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.
Ukubanjwa ngobhongwana izihlandlo ezithandathu, kuquka abantwana nabantu abadala, baye bakhululwa kwwangethuba, ngokunjalo nabafoti base Filipino.
Abafoti bathabatha indawo yenenekazi esele likhulile njengoko lalifuna ilondolo. UMendoza wadutyulwa.
Lowo owayeyiphoyisa lasePhilippines uthumbe izivakashi zaseHong Kong ngokuthumba ibhasi lazo eManila, inhlokodolobha yasePhilippines.
URolando Mandoza wadubula isibhamu sakhe se-M16 ezivakashini.
Izithunjwa ezimbalwa zikhululiwe futhi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi okungenani eziyisithupha zishonile kuze kube manje.
Izithunjwa eziyisithupha, kuhlanganise izingane kanye nabakhulile, zikhululwe masinya, kanjalo nangabathathi bezithombe basePhilippines.
Abathathi bezithombe kamuva bathatha indawo yesalukazi njengoba besidinga indlu yangasese. Umendoza wadutshulwa.
Ababengamaphoyisa asePhilippines bagcine bethatha izihambi zaseHong Kong njengeziboshwa ngokuhlasela ibhasi labo eManila, inhloko-dolobha yasePhilippines
URolando Mendoza udubule izivakashi ngesibhamu sakhe se-M16.
Izithunjwa eziningana sezisindisiwe kanti okungenani eziyisithupha zishonile kuze kube manje.
Kuboshwe abayisithupha, kufaka phakathi izingane nabantu abadala, ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, kanjalo nabathwebuli basePhilippines.
Abathwebuli bezithombe bathatha indawo yalesi salukazi ngesikhathi sifuna ilondolo. UMendoza wadutshulwa.
Owayelipolisa oil-gcina Filipino thatha ukuthi walk Of Hong kong futhi ahlasele ibhasi njengoba iziboshwa zakhe ukuba e-Ezine zabo, lokhu Omkhulu-Philippines
Ingalo yakhe shot kubakhethi URolando argentina / mendoza 16.
Eziningana ukuthunjwa futhi lapho okungenani eziyisithupha selebefile behlanguliwe us manje.
Wabamba isikhathi esiyisithupha ngobhongwana, kuhlanganise asebekhulile nezingane, bakhulula for the space, kanye base nabafoti Filipino.
Yenenekazi lapho zenzeke izithombe njengoba ufuna it ikhulile daak. Umkhiqizo amathegi.
Owayeliphoyisa oli-Filipino ugcine ethathe izihambi zase-Hong Kong njengalezi ziboshwa zakhe ngokuhlasela ibhasi labo e-Manila, inhloko-dolobha yasePhilippines
URolando Mendoza wadubula isibhamu sakhe i-M16 izivakashi.
Baliqembu bathunjwa esele behlanguliwe kanti okungenani abayisithupha sebefile ukuza kithina ga manje.
Ukuboshwa ngobhongwana izikhathi eziyisithupha, kuhlanganise izingane nabantu abadala, baye badedelwa ngesikhathi, kanjalo nabafoti base Filipino.
Abafoti bathathe indawo yenenekazi eselikhulile njengoba lalifuna ilondolo.UMendoza wadutshulwa.

Kuboshwe abayisithupha, okubandakanya izingane nabantu abadala, abasanda kudedelwa, kanjalo nabathwebuli bezithombe basePhilippines.
Abathwebuli bezithombe bathathe indawo yalesi salukazi ngesikhathi sifuna ukuwashwa. UMendoza wadutshulwa.
Owayeliphoyisa oli-Filipino ugcine uthathe izihambi zase-Hong Kong njengeziboshwa zakhe ngokuhlasela ibhasi labo eManila, ikomkhulu le-Philippines
URolando Mendoza wadubula isibhamu sakhe iM16 kubavakashi.
Baliqembu abathunjwa asebevele behlanguliwe kanti ubuncane bayisithupha asebefile ukuzathi ga manje.
Ukubanjwa ngobhongwa izikhathi eziyisithupha, kufaka phakathi izingane nabantu abadala, ziye zakhululwa ngethuba, kanjalo nabafoti base Filipino.
Abafoti bathatha indawo yenkosikazi esekhulile njengoba yayifuna ilondolo. UMendoza wadutshulwa.
Ababengamaphoyisa asePhilippines ekugcineni bathatha izihambi zaseHong Kong njengeziboshwa ngokuhlasela ibhasi labo eManila, inhloko-dolobha yasePhilippines
URolando Mendoza udubule izivakashi ngesibhamu sakhe se-M16.
Izithunjwa eziningana sezisindisiwe kanti okungenani eziyisithupha zishonile kuze kube manje.
Kuboshwe abayisithupha, okubandakanya izingane nabantu abadala, abasanda kudedelwa, kanjalo nabathwebuli bezithombe basePhilippines.
Abathwebuli bezithombe bathathe indawo yalesi salukazi ngesikhathi sifuna ukuwashwa. UMendoza wadutshulwa.
Umzekelo, owona mfanekiso uqhelekileyo wokufotwa komhlaba ngowama-35mm, owawungowona ubungakanani befilimu obubalaseleyo ekupheleni kwexesha lefilimu ye-analog.
Isenziwa nanamhlanje, kodwa ke okubalulekileyo kukuba iratio yayo yathatyathwa yi-digital camera image sensor format.
Intlobo ye-35 mm yazi, ithanda ubhida, 36 mm ukuxwesa ngo-24 mm ubude.
Ifomathi yale reyshiyo (ukwahlulahlula ngeshumi elinesibini ukuze ufumane ireyshiyo yenombolo epheleleyo elula) kuthiwa ngu-3:2.
Iifomathi ezininzi eziqhelekileyo (usapho lweefomathi ze-APS, umzekelo) zilingana okanye ziqikelela kufutshane lo mlinganiso.
Ngokwesibonelo, indlela evamile kakhulu yohlobo lwesithombe emhlabeni ingu-35mm, ewubukhulu obufanayo nobefilimu ekupheleni kwesiqephu senkathi yamafilimu.
Isenziwa nanamuhla, kodwa okubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi ubudlelwane bayo bobude nobukhulu buthathwe izimo zokuthungatha isithombe zekhamera yedijithali.
Ifomethi ka-35mm empeleni, ngodidayo ngokunye, ingu-36mm ububanzi kuphindwe ngo-24mm ubude.
Isilinganiso sobubanzi ebudeni salefomethi (ukudivayida ngeshumi nambili ukuze uthole isilinganiso senombolo ephelele elula) ngakho-ke kuthiwa singu-3:2.
Amafomethi amaningi avamile (iqoqo lamafomethi le-APS, ngokwesibonelo) ayalingana noma acishe alingane nalesi silinganiso sobubanzi ebudeni.
Isibonelo, isithombe esivame kakhulu sezithombe kwakungu-35mm, okwakungelona usayizi wefilimu omuhle kakhulu ekupheleni kwenkathi yefilimu ye-analog.
Nanamuhla ikhiqizwa, kepha okubalulekile ukuthi isilinganiso sayo sithathwe ifomethi yesithombe senzwa yekhamera yedijithali.
Izinhlobo ezingama-35 mm ziyazi, zithanda ubhida, ama-36 mm ewela ama-24 mm ubude.
Ifomethi yalesi silinganiso (ihlukaniswe ngamashumi amabili nambili ukuthola isilinganiso esilula senombolo ephelele) kuthiwa ingu-3: 2.
Amafomethi ajwayelekile kakhulu (umndeni wamafomethi we-APS, ngokwesibonelo) alingana noma alinganisela lesi silinganiso.
Ngokwesibonelo, lesi sithombe somhlaba wokufotwa iningi uqhelekileyo-35, ubukhulu movie ekupheleni kwesikhathi owawungowona royal ifilimu of the bag.
Nokho namuhla, kodwa okubaluleke kakhulu, iratio yayo sathathwa digital ikhamera image inzwa format.
Izinhlobo 35 mm bazi, uthando ubhida, ukuxwesa 36 mm by 24 mm ubude.
Lokhu format reyshiyo (in nambili ukwahlula ireyshiyo yenombolo full lula ukuthola) okuyinto 3: 2.
Takhiwo eziningi ezivamile (format kanye nomndeni-P, isibonelo) bayalingana noma inquma isici idemo.
Isibonelo, isici esivamile sokufotwa komhlaba mhla zingama-35mm, owawungowona usayizi wefilimu ovelele ekupheleni kwesikhathi sefilimu ye-analog.
Isenziwa nanamuhla, kodwa-ke okubalulekile ukuthi iratio yayo yathathwa yi-digital camera image sensor format.

UGqr. Tony Moll wafumanisa Isifo Sephepha Esingawevayo Amayeza (XDR-TB) kummandla oseMzantsi Afrika, KwaZulu-Natal.
Kwi Interview, wathi okutsha okukhethekileyo Kwaku "hlupha kakhulu kwaye kusothusa ngenxa yezinga lokufa eliphezulu."
Ezinye izigulana zisenokuba zisuleleke yontsholongwane esibhedlela, ucinga njalo u Dr. Moll, kwaye ababini kubo ibingabasebenzi basesibhedlela.
Ngexesha lonyaka omnye, umntu osulelekileyo wosulela abantu abasondeleyo abali-10 ukuya kwi-15.
Nangona, ipesenti yeXDR-TB kwiqela lonke Labantu abane tuberculosis lisabonakala lisezantsi; 6 000 yabantu abayi 330 000 abosulelekileyo ngethuba elithile eMzantsi Afrika.
UDkt. Tony Moll wathola Ixhwala Elimelene Nemithi Kakhulu (iXDR-TB) esindeni esiseNingizimu Afrika KwaZulu-Natal.
Uma kuxoxwa naye, uthe uhlobo olusha “luyakhathaza kakhulu futhi luyashaqisa ngenxa yezinga eliphezulu lokubulala.”
Ezinye iziguli zithole igciwane esibhedlela, kucabanga uDkt. Moll, futhi okungenani ababili bekuyizisebenzi zempilo zasesibhedlela.
Ngesikhathi sonyaka owodwa, umuntu othelelekile angathelela abantu asondelene nabo abangu-10 kuya ku-15.
Nokho, isibalo se XDR-TB eningini labantu abaphila nesifo sofuba kubukeka siphansi; u-6,000 wabantu abangu-330,000 abathintekayo nganoma yisiphi isikhathi eNingizimu Afrika.
UDkt. UTony Moll wathola i-XDR-TB esifundeni saseNingizimu Afrika saKwaZulu-Natali.
Kwi-Interview, wathi okusha okukhethekile kwe-casino "kuphazamisa kakhulu futhi kushaqise ngenxa yezinga eliphezulu lokufa."
Ezinye iziguli zingatheleleka ngaleli gciwane, kucabanga uDkt. Moll, kanti ababili babo kwakungabasebenzi basesimeni esibucayi.
Phakathi nonyaka owodwa, umuntu othelelekile uthelele abantu abaseduze abangu-10 kuya kwabangu-15.
Kodwa-ke, iphesenti le-XDR-TB eqenjini lonke labantu abane-tuberculosis lisabonakala liphansi; Abantu abangu-6 000 abangu-330 000 batheleleka ngesikhathi esithile eNingizimu Afrika.
Udkt Tony Moll ethola Isingawevayo Medicine tuberculosis (XDR-TB) eningizimu Afrika endaweni, KwaZulu-Natal.
In The Interview, wathi Lokhu okukhethekileyo entsha "hlupha yezinga lokufa futhi ngenxa okusezingeni kakhulu ziboshelwe ngokusebenzisa."
Isibhedlela kungaba yontsholongwane zisuleleke izigulane nezinye, futhi ngaleyo ndlela ucabange Udkt Moll, ababili babo esibhedlela ibingabasebenzi.
Ngenkathi eyodwa, abantu osulelekileyo abantu abasondeleyo ukutheleleka 10 kuya 15.
Nokho, amaphesenti esifo SOFUBA se-YEXDR TB eqenjini labantu abane abonakala kuwe; ngeke abosulelekileyo abantu abangu-330 000 6 000 eningizimu Afrika ngaleso sikhathi.

Phakathi nonyaka owodwa, umuntu osulelekile wokwesulela abantu abaseduze abali-10 kuya ku-15.

Lena ibizwa ngokuba yi pH ye khemikali. Ungayenza I indicator usebenzisa incindi yekhaphetshu elibomvu.
Incindi yekhaphetshu itshintsha umbala ngokuxhomekeke ukuba imuncu okanye ikrakra (alkaline) ikemikhali.
Umgangatho we pH uboniswa sisixa se Hydrogen (iH ku pH) ions kwikhemikhali evavanyiweyo.
Iion zeHydrogen ziiproton ezazinee-elektronon zazo ezazihluthiwe (kuba iiathom zeHydrogen zineproton enye kunye ne-elektroni enye).
Lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi i-pH yekhemikhali. Ungenza inkomba ngokusebenzisa umhluzi weklabishi ebomvu.
Ijusi yeklabishi ishintsha umbala kuye ngokuthi ikhemikhali ino-asidi noma i-alikhali engakanani.
Izinga le-pH likhonjwa inani lama-ion weHydrogen (i-H kuyi-pH) kuyikhemikhali elihlolwayo.
Ama-ion weHydrogen amaphrothoni lawo ekususwe ama-elektroni wawo kuwo (njengoba ama-athomu weHydrogen enziwa iphrothoni elilodwa kanye ne-elektroni elilodwa).
Lokhu kubizwa nge-pH yamakhemikhali. Ungenza indinganiso usebenzisa indandatho yekhaphetshu ebomvu.
Incindi yekhaphetshu ishintsha umbala kuye ngokuthi ikhemikhali elibabayo noma elibabayo (i-alkaline).
Izinga le-pH liklonyeliswa inani le-Hydrogen (H ku-pH) ions kumakhemikhali ahlolwe.
Ama-hydrogen iion angama-proton akhishwe ama-electron awo (ngoba ama-athomu e-Hydrogen ane-proton eyodwa ne-electron eyodwa).
Lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi i-pH of the khemikali. Ungasebenzisa yekhaphetshu inkomba umuzwa obomvu.
Shintsha umbala kuye ngokuthi umuzwa wokuthi yekhaphetshu ikrakra noma imuncu (al-alikhali) ikemikhali.
Lapho izinga show yebo thina Halogen by aph (aph day oh) anions evavanyeyo kwikhemikhali.
Ceo zeHydrogen kukhona amakhaya ziiproton-ukufuya ukuthi ezazihluthiwe elektronon (thomas zeHydrogen zineproton for the one kanye nezinye elektroni).
Lena ibizwa nangokuthi i-pH yamakhemikali. Ungayenza indicator usebenzisa incindi yekhaphetshu elibomvu.
Incindi yokhaphetshu ishintsha umbala kuye ngokuthi imuncu noma ikhukhumale (alkaline) ikemikhali.
Ikhwalithi ye pH iboniswa yisigaxa se Hydrogen (iH ku pH) ions kumakhemikhali ahlolwe.
Ama-hydrogen ama-proton ayenama-elektronon awo ayesuthiwe (ngoba ama-athomu e-Hydrogen ane-proton eyodwa ne-elektroni elilodwa).
Lena ibizwa nge-pH yamakhemikhali. Ungenza inkomba usebenzisa ijusi leklabishi elibomvu.
Izinkulungwane zamakhemikhali ziguqula umbala kuye ngokuthi i-asidi noma ibabayo (i-alkaline).
Ikhwalithi ye-pH ihlinzekwa yisidakamizwa se-hydrogen (H ku-PH) ions kumakhemikhali ahlolwe.
Ama-hydrogen ion angama-proton akhishwe ama-electron awo (ngoba ama-athomu e-Hydrogen aneproton eyodwa ne-electroni eyodwa).
Lena ibizwa ngokuthi i-pH ye khemikhali. Ungayenza I indicator usebenzisa incindi yekhapheshu elibomvu.
Incindi yekhaphetshu ishintsha umbala ngokuya ngokuthi imuncu noma imuncu (alkaline) ikemikhali.
Ikhwalithi ye- pH iboniswa yinani le-Hydrogen (iH ku pH) ions kumakhemikhali ahloliwe.
Ama-Hydrogen amaproton anama-elektronon awo ahlukaniswe (ngoba ama-Hydrogen aneproton eyodwa kanye ne-elektroni eyodwa).
Lokhu kubizwa nge-pH yamakhemikhali. Ungenza inkomba usebenzisa ijusi leklabishi elibomvu.
Ijusi leklabishi liguqula umbala kuye ngokuthi ikhemikhali eline-asidi noma elibabayo (i-alkaline).
Izinga le-pH linqunywa inani le-Hydrogen (H ku-pH) ions kumakhemikhali ahlolwe.
Ama-hydrogen ions angama-proton akhishwe ama-electron awo (ngoba ama-athomu e-Hydrogen ane-proton eyodwa ne-electron eyodwa).

Inkulumbuso uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela urhulumente 'Umthetho woMoya Ococekileyo' kwikomiti yamaqela onke ukuba iphonononge, phambi kokufundwa kwayo okwesibini, emva kwentlanganiso yemizuzu engama-25 yangoLwesibini kunye nenkokheli ye-NDP uJack Layton kwi-PMO.
ULayton ucele ukuba kubekho utshintsho kwi conservatives environmental bill kwintlanganiso no PM, ecela ukuba "ibhalwe ngocoselelo olugqibeleleyo" uxwebhu olungendalo lombutho oyiConservative.

Mhlanazana I Federal Government yangenelela ekuthabathethi kuyo ukuxhasa ngezimali isibhedlela I Mersey e Devonport,Tasmania, urhulumente ophetheyo kunye namalungi epalamemete efederali asigxeka esi senzo njengengozi ekhokhela ulonyulo eluzakubakho ngo Novemba.
Kodwa u-Nkulumbuso u-John Howard uthe isenzo senzelwe kuphela ukukhusela amaziko esibhedlele ekuthotyelweni ngurhulumente wase-Tasmania, ngokunika i-AUD engaphezulu kwe-$45 izigidi.

UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela 'Umthetho woMoya Ohlanzekile' ukuba uhlolwe ikomiti lamaqembu onke, ngaphambi kokuba ufundwe okwesibili, ngemva komhlangano wangoLwesibili wemizuzu engu-25 nomhloli weNDP uJack Layton kuyi-PMO.
U-Layton ucele kube nezinguquko endleleni yokukhipha irisidi yesikweletu phakathi nomhlangano nama-PM, ecela kube “nokubhalwa kabusha okuphelele” kwendlela yokukhipha irisidi yesikweletu.

Kusukela ngesikhathi Uhulumeni Wenhlangano Yamazwe ungenela ekuphatheni uxhaso lwesibhedlela i-Mersey eDevonport, eThasmaniya, uhulumeni wezwe kanye namanye amalungu kahulumeni wenhlangano yamazwe asola lesi senzo njengesandulela sokhetho lukahulumeni oluzokwenziwa ngoNovemba.
Kodwa uNdunankulu uJohn Howard uthe umthetho kwakungowokulondoloza izakhiwo zesibhedlela ukuba zingabekwa ezingeni eliphansi uhulumani waseTasmania, ngokunikeza izigidi engu-AUD$45.

UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela uhulumeni 'Umthetho Ohlanzekile Womoya' ekomidini lamaqembu amaningi ukuze abuyekeze, ngaphambi kokufundwa kwawo kwesibili, ngemuva komhlangano wangoLwesibili wemizuzu engu-25 nomholi we-NDP uJack Layton e-PMO.
ULayton ucele ushintsho kumthethosivivivivinywa wezemvelo emhlanganweni noNdunankulu, ecela ukuthi kubhalwe "ngokucophelela" idokhumenti engokwemvelo yenhlangano iConservative.
I-Federal Government yangenelela ukusekela isibhedlela saseMersey eDevonport, eTasmania, uhulumeni ophethe kanye namalungu ephalamende asola lesi senzo njengengozi eholela ukhetho ngoNovemba.
Kodwa uNdunankulu uJohn Howard uthe lesi sinyathelo kuhloswe ngaso ukuvikela izikhungo zesibhedlela ekulandeleni uhulumeni waseTasmania, enikeza i-AUD engaphezu kwezigidi ezingama- $ 45.

Undunankulu stephen harper uhulumeni wavuma ukuthumela' Umthetho ongokomoya ococekileyo ' committee ukubukeza yonke yamaqela, futhi wayifunda ngaphambi ngolwesibili, emva kwemizuzu umhlangano 25 kanye nabaholi layton yangoLwesibini-uJack IN the p-pmo.
ULayton buza uma kwakukhona bill izinguquko kwemvelo P kanye conservatives emhlanganweni, buza uma" ebhaliwe kahle ephelele " uhlobo inhlangano oyiConservative in the mbhalo.

Mhlanazana Uhulumeni ukusekela izibhedlela in engezimali ekuthabathethi yangenela D E Devonport Mersey, Tasmania, abalungile kanye nohulumeni kosuku asigxeka epalamemete efederali bayatshelwa yilo senzo futhi ingozi nge eluzakubako has in zonke November.

Kodwa Ngondunankulu Kajohn Howard wathi ukuziphatha kwesibhedlela kuphela ngezinhlangano zikahulumeni ukuze zisivikele ekuthotyelweni base-Tasmania, ngokunikeza imifanekiso engaphezu kuka-d 45 million.

UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela uhulumeni 'Umthetho woMoya Ohlanzekile' ekomidini lamaqembu wonke ukuthi libuyekeze, ngaphambi kokufundwa kwayo okwesibili, ngemuva komhlangano wemizuzu engu-25 yangoLwesibili nomholi we-NDP uJack Layton e-PMO.

ULayton ucele ukuba kube khona ushintsho kwi- conservatives environmental bill emhlanganweni no PM, ecela ukuba "ibhalwe ngocoselelo oluphelele" idokhumenti engeyona eyemvelo yenhlangano oyiConservative.

Mhlazana I Federal Government yangenelela ekuthatheni kuyo ukuxhasa ngezimali isibhedlela I Mersey e Devonport,Tasmania, uhulumeni ophethe namalungi epalamemete efederali asigxeka lesi senzo njengengozi ekhokhela umnyuziki ozoba khona ngo Novemba.
Kodwa-ke uNdunankulu u-John Howard uthe isenzo senzelwe kuphela ukuvikela izikhungo zesibhedlela ekuthonyeni nguhulumeni wase-Tasmania, ngokunikeza i-AUD engaphezulu kuka-$45 izigidi.

UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela uhulumeni 'Umthetho ohlanzekile Womoya' ekomidini lamaqembu amaningi ukuze abuyekeze, ngaphambi kokufundwa kwawo kwesibili, ngemuva komhlangano wangoLwesibili wemizuzu engu-25 nomholi we-NDP uJack Layton e-PMO.
ULayton ucele ushintsho kumthethosivivinywa wezemvelo emhlanganweni noNdunankulu, ecela ukuthi "ngokucophelela" idokhumende engokomthetho.

Abesifazane I-Federal Government yangenelela ekuthabathethi kuyo ukusekela ngezimali Isibhedlela I-Mersey e-Devonport, i-Tasmania, uhulumeni ophethe kanye namalungi epalamemete efederali asigxeka lesi senzo njengengozi ekhokhela ukhetho ngoNovemba.
Kodwa uNdunankulu uJohn Howard uthe lesi sinyathelo senzelwe ukuvikela izikhungo zesibhedlela ekulandelweni nguhulumeni waseTasmania, wanikeza i-AUD imali engaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-$45.

UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela uhulumeni 'Umthetho kaMoya Ohlanzekile' kwikomidi lamaqembu wonke ukuthi libuyekezwe, ngaphambi kokufundwa kwalo okwesibili, ngemuva komhlangano wemizuzu engama-25 wangoLwesibili nomholi we-NDP uJack Layton ku-PMO.
ULayton ucele ukuthi kube khona izinguquko kwi conservatives environmental bill emhlanganweni no PM, ecela ukuthi "ibhalwe ngokuhlela okuphelele" idokhumenti engemvelo yombutho oyiConservative.

Mhlanazana I Federal Government yangenelela ekuthabatheni kuyo ukusekela ngezimali isibhedlela I Mersey e Devonport,Tasmania, uhulumeni ophetheyo kanye namalungi epalamete efederali asigxeka lesi senzo njengengozi eholela ukhetho oluzoba khona ngo Novemba.
Kodwa uNdunankulu uJohn Howard uthe isenzo senzelwe kuphela ukuvikela izikhungo esibhedlela ekuthotshelweni nguhulumeni wase-Tasmania, ngokunikeza i-AUD engaphezulu kuka-$45 izigidi.

UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela uhulumeni 'Umthetho Ohlanzekile Womoya' ekomitini lamaqembu amaningi ukuze abuyekeze, ngaphambi kokufundwa kwawo kwesibili, ngemuva komhlangano wangoLwesibili wemizuzu engu-25 nomholi we-NDP uJack Layton e-PMO.
U-Layton ucele ushintsho kumthethosivivinywa wezemvelo olondolozayo emhlanganweni noNdunankulu, efuna ukuthi kubhalwe "ngokucophelela" idokhumende engavumi.

Ngasekuqaleni kosuku, uHulumeni Wombuso ungenelele emkhankasweni wokuxhasa isibhedlela iMersey eDevonport, eTasmania, lapho uhulumeni wesifundazwe kanye namalungu ephalamende asola lesi senzo njengosongo lokhetho ngoNovemba.
Kodwa uNdunankulu uJohn Howard uthe lesi sinyathelo senzelwe ukuvikela izakhiwo zesibhedlela ekulandelweni nguhulumeni waseTasmania, wanikeza i-AUD imali engaphezu kwezigidi ezingama- $ 45.
Olu phawu “i-up bow” lufana no-V luze lona “u-down bow” afane no-u ojonge ezantsi okanye isikwere isingaphelelanga kwicala langasezantsi.
Ukuphakama kuthetha ukuba kufuneka uqale kwincam kwaye utyhale isaphetha, kwaye ezantsi kuthetha ukuba kufuneka uqale kwisele (apho isandla sakho sibambe khona isaphetha) kwaye utsale isaphetha.
Itolo elimilele-phezulu lidla ngokwenza isandi esiphantsi, ngoxai itolo elimilele ezantsi lomelele kwaye linamandla.
Faka amanqaku akho ipensili ukhululekile, kodwa khumbula ukuba amanqaku okugoba aprintiweyo akhona ngenxa yesizathu somculo, ke kufanele ukuba ahlonitshwe.
Uphawu "lokukhothama umile" olubukeka njengo-V kanti "uphawu lokukhothama phansi" lubukeka njengesigaxa noma isikwele esishoda ngohlangothi lwaso olungaphansi.
Phezulu kusho ukuthi kumelwe uqale ekugcineni bese uphusha umcibisholo, kanti phansi kusho ukuthi kumelwe uqale exoxweni (okusho ukuthi lapho ubambe khona umcibisholo) bese ugobisa umcibisholo.
Umnsalo ophezulu ujwayele ukwenza umsindo opholile, kanti umnsalo ophansi wenza umsindo onamandla noqinile kakhudlwana.
Zizwe ukhululekile ukubhala izimpawu zakho ngepensela, kepha khumbula izimpawu eziphrintiwe ezehlayo zikhona ngesizathu esingokomculo, ngakho-ke kufanele zihlonishwe.
Uphawu oluthi “up bow” lufana no-V kanti “u-down bow” ufaniswa no-u obheke phansi noma isikwele singagcini ngasohlangothini lwaseningizimu.
Ukuphakama kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale esiqongweni bese udonsa umnsalo, futhi ezansi kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale esitokisini (lapho isandla sakho sibambe khona umnsalo) bese udonsa umnsalo.
Umcibisholo omile uvame ukwenza umsindo ophansi, kanti umcibisholo omile uqinile futhi unamandla.
Faka amanothi akho wepensela ekhululekile, kepha khumbula ukuthi amanothi agobolondo aphrintiwe akhona ngenxa yesizathu somculo, ngakho kufanele ahlonishwe.
Uhlamvu "d-p o" ufana v kanye "a-phansi o" like ebuka phansi noma ohlangothini isingaphelanga square.

Futhi ukuphakama kusho ukuthi imoto kumele waqala utyhale akazange aphule umnsalo wami, futhi phansi kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale ngo iseli (lapho ubamba isandla sakho waphula umnsalo wami futhi) futhi kukhishwe akazange aphule umnsalo wami.
Off the umcibisholo - up ngokuvamile senza labo ngaphansi umsindo, umcibisholo phansi ngoxai off unamandla futhi enamandla.
Faka ipensela izihloko zakho free, izihloko aprintiweyo okugoba kodwa futhi remember ukuthi ngenxa umculo, ukuze kufanele ahlonitshwe.
Lesi sici "i-up bow" sifana no-V luze lona "u-down bow" afane no-u obheke phansi noma isikwele isingaphelele ohlangothini lwangaseningizimu.
Ukuphakama kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale ku-ncam bese ukhipha umnsalo, futhi phansi kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale kusele (lapho isandla sakho sibambe khona umnsalo) bese udonsa umnsalo.
Itolo elimilele-phezulu lidla ngokwenza umsindo ophansi, kuyilapho itolo elimilele ezansi limelele futhi linamandla.
Faka izihloko zakho ipensili ukhululekile, kodwa khumbula ukuthi amaphuzu okugoba aphrintiwe akhona ngenxa yesizathu somculo, khona-ke kufanele ukuthi ahlonitshwe.
Lolu phawu "i-up bow" lufana no-V kanti "umnsalo phansi" uyi-down "afane no-u obheke eningizimu noma isikwele sisaphelelanga ngasohlangothini lwaseningizimu.
Ukuphakama kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale esiqongweni bese uphonsa umnsalo, futhi ezansi kusho ukuthi udinga ukuqala esitokisini (lapho isandla sakho sibambe khona umnsalo) bese udonsa umnsalo.
Umcibisholo omile uvame ukwenza umsindo ophansi, umcibisholo omile omile futhi unamandla.
Faka amanothi akho wepensela ukhululekile, kodwa khumbula ukuthi amanothi agqoka aphrintiwe akhona ngenxa yezizathu zomculo, ngakho kufanele ahlonishwe.
Lolu phawu “i-up bow” lufana no-V luze lona “u-down bow” afane no-u obheke eningizimu noma isikwele isingaphelele ngasohlangothini lwangaseningizimu.
Ukuphakama kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale kwincamu bese ushaya umnsalo, futhi ezansi kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale kusele (alapho isandla sakho sibambe khona umnsalo) bese udonsa umnsalo.
Umcibisholo olele-phezulu uvame ukwenza umsindo ophansi, kuyilapho umcibisholo emilele eningizimu uqine futhi unamandla.
Faka izihloko zakho ipensili ukhululekile, kodwa khumbula ukuthi amaphuzu okugoqela aphrintiwe akhona ngenxa yesizathu somculo, ke kumele ahlonishwe.
Uphawu oluthi “up bow” lumiswe njenge-V kanti “umnsalo phansi” uyi-enge e-U emise okwe-U, noma ivundlile.
Ukuphakama kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale esiqongweni bese uphusha umnsalo, futhi ezansi kusho ukuthi kufanele uqale esitokisini (lapho isandla sakho siphethe khona umnsalo) bese udonsa umnsalo.
Umcibisholo omile uvame ukwenza umsindo ophansi, kanti umcibisholo omile uqinile futhi unamandla.
Faka amanothi akho wepensela ngokukhululeka, kepha khumbula ukuthi amanothi agobekile aphrintiwe akhona ngenxa yezizathu zomculo, ngakho kufanele ahlonishwe.
UGiancarlo Fisichella waphulukana nokulawula imoto yakhe yaye waphuma kumdyarho kamsinya emva kokuba uqalile.
Umdlali weqela lakhe u Fernando Alonso wayekhokhele ebudeni bomdyarho, kodwa wayeka nje ukuba ipiy yakhe ime, mhlawumbe kungenxa yokuba ivili lalibotshwe kakubi.
UMichael Schumacher wayigqiba ireyisi yakhe kungakudalanga kakhulu emva ko Alonso, ngenxa yomonakalo wokuyekiswa namadabi amaninzi ngelixa lereyisi.
UGiancarlo Fisichella wangakwazi ukuqondisa imoto yakhe futhi waqeda umjaho ngokushesha ngomva kokuba uqale.

Abeqembu lakhe u-Fernando Alonso bebephuma phambili cishe kuwoo wonke umjaho, kodwa kuphele ngokushesha nje ngemva kokupaka endaweni yokulungisa imoto, kungenzeka kungenxa yesondo langaphambili elifakwe kabi.
UMichael Schumacher waqeda umjaho wakhe kungekudala ngemva kuka-Alonso, ngenxa yokulimala kwesimo esigcina imoto iphakeme emishikashikeni eminingi phakathi nomjaho.

UMichael Schumacher uqede abakhwabanisi bakhe kungekudala ngemuva kuka-Alonso, ngenxa yomonakalo wokumiswa nezimpi eziningi ngesikhathi selayisi.
I ulahlekelwe control futhi UGiancarlo Fisichella futhi aphume emotweni in waqala yakhe ngokushesha emva.

UMichael Schumacher wanquma ireyisi lakhe kungakudalanga kakhulu ngemva kuka Alonso, ngenxa yomonakalo wokuyekiswa nezimpi ezinengi ngenkathi zereyisi.
UGiancarlo Fisichella uhlulekile ukulawula imoto yakhe washiya umjaho ngemuva nje kokuba uqalile.
Uzakwabo uFernando Alonso ubekade ehola ngesikhathi somjaho, kepha uvele wamisa uphayi wakhe, mhlawumbe ngenxa yokuthi isondo beliminyene kakhulu.
UMichael Schumacher uqede ilayisi lakhe kungekudala ngemuva kuka-Alonso, ngenxa yomonakalo wokumiswa kanye nezimpi eziningi ngesikhathi selayisi.
Ngo-1884, uTesla wafudukela eMerika ukuyakuphangela kwiEdison Company eNew York City.
Ufike e-US eneesentie ezi-4 egameni lakhe, incwadi yemibongo, kunye neleta yengcebiso evela ku-Charles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe emsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili) ku-Thomas Edison.
Ngo-1884 uTesla wathuthela eMelika ukwamukela umsebenzi neNkampani ka-Edison eDolobheni lase-New York.
Ufike eMelika enamasenti angu-4 kuphela, incwadi yezinkondlo, kanye nencwadi yokutusa evela ku-Charles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe wasemsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili) iya kuThomas Edison.
Ngo-1884, uTesla wathuthela e-United States ukufuna i-Edison Company eNew York City.
Ufike e-US namasenti angu-4 egameni lakhe, incwadi yezinkondlo, kanye nencwadi yeseluleko evela kuCharles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe emsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili) kuThomas Edison.
Ngo-1884, wathuthela E-united states Kwiedison Company uTesla uyakukuphangela New York City.
Ngena kanye pennies, lezi L-4 egameni lakhe, incwadi yemibongo, yengcebiso ngencwadi Evela Charles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe umsebenzi wakhe wangaphambilini) Kuya Thomas Edison.
Ngo-1884, uTesla wathuthela eMelika ukuyakuphangela e-Edison Company eNew York City.
Ufike e-US enamasentie angu-4 egameni lakhe, incwadi yemibongo, kanye neleta yeseluleko esivela kuCharles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe emsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili) ku-Thomas Edison.
Ngo-1884, uTesla wathuthela e-United States e-Edison Company eNew York City.
Ufike e-US enesentie ezi-4 egameni lakhe, incwadi yezinkondlo, kanye nencwadi yezincomo evela kuCharles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe emsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili) kuThomas Edison.
Ngo-1884, uTesla wathuthela eMerika ukuyophangela e-Edison Company eNew York City.
Ufike e-US enamasentie angu-4 egameni lakhe, incwadi yezimbongo, kanye nencwadi yethiphu evela ku-Charles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe emsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili) ku-Thomas Edison.
Ngo-1884, uTesla wathuthela e-United States eyosebenzela i-Edison Company eNew York City.
Wafika e-US namasenti amane egameni lakhe, incwadi yezinkondlo, kanye nencwadi yezincomo evela kuCharles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe emsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili) eya kuThomas Edison.

Emizuzwini emihlanu izibonakalisile umoya waqala ukuvuthuza,emva komzuzu, umoya wabe sele ufikelela I 70km/h… kwaze kwalandela imvula, yabe irhabaxa inkulu kangangokuqa ikuqhwabe esikhumbeni okwenaliti, emva koko kweza isichotho samatye esiwa esibhakabhakeni, abantu besoyika futhi bekhwaza yaye bebaleka omnye phezu komnye.
Ndalahlekelwa ngudadewethu netshomi yake, endleleni yam kwaye kukho abantu ababini abakhubazekileyo bekwizitulo zamavili, abantu nje betsiba ngapha kwabo yake bebathyiliza," utshilo uArmand Versace.

Imizuzu emihlanu umbukiso uqalile umoya uqala ukungena, cishe ngemva komzuzu, umoya ufinyelela u-70km/h… bese imvula iyeza, kodwa enzima nenkulu kangangokuba ihlaba isikhumba sakho njengenaliti, bese isichotho sawa emkhathini, abantu bayaxhamazela futhi bayamemeza futhi bayagxobana.

Ngilahlekelwe ngudadewethu kanye nomngane wakhe, futhi endleleni ngilibangise lapho bekunabantu ababili abakhubazekile ababehlezi ezihlalweni ezinamasondo, abantu bebeqa ngaphezulu futhi bebasunduza,” kusho u-Armand Versace.

Ngemuva kwemizuzu emihlanu umoya waqala ukuvunguza, kwathi emva kwesikhashana, umoya wafinyelela ku-70km / h... kwase kuthi imvula, yayinzima kakhulu yayinzima isikhumba inaliti, kwase kwehla isichotho esibhakabhakeni, abantu besaba futhi bememeza futhi bebalekela omunye komunye.
Ngilahlekelwe ngudadewethu nomngani wakhe, ngisendleleni kwakukhona abantu ababili abakhubazekile abayizihlalo ezinamasondo, abantu bebevele babadiliza, kusho u-Arm Versace.

Umoya ngokwakhe ' re uya ukubona emihlanu ukuvuthuza waqala, futhi emva komzuzu, umoya likwazi ukufinyelela 70km/h bese ulandela lokhu... imvula, i-great yabe irhabaxa kangangokuqa esikhumbeni ukuqhwabe esetshenziswa, bese isiphepho kwafika samatye isuswe esibhakabhakeni, abantu begijima futhi bekhala futhi besaba omunye phezu komunye.
World ngudadewethu ukulahlekelwa umngane wami, endleleni lapho kanye nabantu bami ababili wheel bekwizitulo abakhubazekile, abantu nje weqa ngabo bebathyiliza emhlabeni, " kusho Versace uArmand.

Emizuzwini emihlanu izibonakalisile umoya waqala ukuvuthuza,emva komzuzu, umoya wabe usufinyelela I 70km/h... kwaze kwalandela imvula, yabe isishabaxa esikhulu kangangokuqa ikuqhwabe esikhumbeni okwenaliti, emva kwalokho kweza isichotho samatshe esiwa esibhakabhakeni, abantu besaba futhi bekhwaza futhi begijima omunye phezu komunye.
Ngalahlekelwa ngudadewethu neshomi yake, endleleni yami futhi kunabantu ababili abakhubazekile benezihlalo zamasondo, abantu nje beshayisana ngapha kwabo yake bebathyiliza," kusho u-Armand Versace.

Emizuzwini emihlanu kamuva umoya waqala ukuvunguza, kwathi emva kwesikhashana, umoya wafinyelela ku-70km/h.. Kwase kuthi imvula, yayinzima kakhulu yashaya isikhumba njengenaliti, kwase kwehla isichotho esibhakabhakeni, abantu besaba futhi bememeza futhi bebalekela omunye komunye.
Ngilahlekelwa ngudadewethu nomtshomi wakhe, endleleni yami futhi kukhona abantu ababili abakhubazekile abahamba ngezihlalo ezinamasondo, abantu bebevele bazigxumele, "kusho u-Arm Versace.

Emizuzwini emihlanu izibonakalisile umoya waqala ukuvuthuza,emva komzuzu, umoya wabe usufinyelela I 70km/h… futhi kwalandela imvula, yabe injoloba enkulu kangaka ikugqamisa esikhumbeni esingokomjovo, ngemva kwalokho kwafika isichotho samatshe esiwa esibhakabhakeni, abantu besaba futhi bekhwaza futhi bebalekela omunye phezu komunye.
Ngalahlekelwa udadewethu noshomi wake, endleleni yami futhi kukhona abantu ababili abakhubazekile besezihlalweni zamasondo, abantu nje beqa ngapha kwabo yake bebathyiliza," kusho u-Armand Versace.

Ngemuva kwemizuzu emihlanu umoya waqala ukuvunguza, kwathi emva kwesikhashana, umoya wafinyelela ku-70km / h… kwase kuba nemvula, futhi eyayinzima kakhulu yashaya isikhumba njengenaliti, kwase kwehla isichotho esibhakabhakeni, abantu besaba futhi bememeza futhi bebalekela omunye komunye.
Ngilahlekelwe ngudadewethu nomngani wakhe, lapho ngihamba khona bekukhona abantu ababili abakhubazekile abahamba ngezihlalo ezinamasondo, abantu bebevele bazigxumele babaphushe, ”kusho u-Arm Versace.

Nangona ukutya okuninzi kwabo kungaqheleka kuthi, Amaroma analo icala lezidlo ezikhwankqisayo izinto ezinjenge hagu yasendle, pikoko, imisundululu, nohlobo oluthile lwempuku ebizwa ngokuba yi dormouse

Omnye umahluko kukuba ngelixa abantu abahluphekileyo kunye nomntu obhinqileyo besitya ukutya kwabo behleli ezitulweni, amadoda azizityebi ayethanda ukuba nezidlo kunye apho azokuhlala khona emacaleni ngelixa besitya ukutya kwabo.
Isidlo sakudala samaRoma sasingenakuba nakutya kusuka eYuporhu eMerika okanye eAsia kwisentury zakudala.
Umzekelo, babengenawo umbhona, okanye iitumato, okanye iitapile, okanye icocoa, kwaye akukho namnye umRoma wamandulo owakha wangcamla iturkey.

Ngenkathi iningi lokukudla kwabo kungaba okujwayelekile kuthina, amaRoma eyenesabelo sabo sezinto zemikhosi ezingajwayelekile, kubandakanya izingulube zasendle, ipigogo, iminenke, nohlobo lwegundane olubizwa nge-dormouse

Omunye umehluko kwakuwukuthi nakuba abantu abampofu kanye nabesifazane babedla ukudla kwabo babe behlezi ezihlalweni, amadoda acebile ayethanda ukuba namadili ndawonye lapho ayehlala khona ngezinhlangothi kuyilapho edla ukudla kwawo.
Ukudla kwaseRoma yamandulo kwakungeke kuhlanganise ukudla okufike eYurophu kuvela eMelika noma kuvela e-Asia emakhulwini eminyaka alandelayo.
Ngokwesibonelo, babengenawo ummbila, noma otamatisi, noma amazambane, noma i-cocoa, futhi akekho umuntu waseRoma yamandulo oke wanambitha ikalikuni.

Yize ukudla okuningi kwabo kungajwayelekile kithi, amaRoma analo uhlangothi lwezingulube zasendle olufana nezingulube zasendle, amapikoko, izisundululu, nohlobo oluthile lwamagundane olubizwa ngokuthi i-dormouse

Omunye umehluko ukuthi ngenkathi abantu abampofu nabesifazane bedla ukudla kwabo behleli ezihlalweni, amadoda acebile ayethanda ukudla ndawonye lapho ayehlala khona ezinhlangothini ngenkathi edla ukudla kwabo.
Isidlo sakudala samaRoma sasingeke sibe nokudla okuvela eYurophu eMelika noma e-Asia ekhulwini lasendulo.

I-ASUS Eee PC, eyalonthswa ngaphambili kwihlabathi liphela ukonga iindleko kunye nokusebenza kwayo, yaba sisihloko esishushu kwinyanga ye-IT yaseTaipei ngo-2007.
Kodwa intengiso yabathengi kwikhompyuter yelaptop iya kwahluka kakhulu kwaye itshintshwe emva kokuba i-ASUS yanikezelwa kwi-2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award ngu-Executive Yuan weRiphabhlikhi yase China.
I-ASUS Eee PC, ngaphambili iqalise ukusebenza emhlabeni jikelele ngenxa yezizathu zokonga izindleko nezokusebenza, okwaba wundabamlonyeni ngonyaka ka-2007 ngenyanga yeTaipei IT.

Kepha abathengi bekhompyutha ye-laptop bazohluka kakhulu futhi baguquke ngemva kokuba i-ASUS iklomeliswe Eklomelweni Wokulondoloza wase-Taiwan ngo-2007 ilungu lesiGungu uYuan waseRiphabhulikini yaseShayina.
I-PC ye-ASUS Eee, eyayithuthukisiwe ngaphambili emhlabeni wonke ukonga izindleko nokusebenza kwayo, yaba yisihloko esishisayo ngenyanga ye-IT yaseTaipei ngo-2007.
Kodwa ukuthengiswa kwabathengi kukhompyutha ye-laptop kuzohluka kakhulu futhi kushintshwe ngemuva kokuthi i-ASUS inikezwe i-2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award yi-Executive Yuan yeRiphabhlikhi yaseChina.
ISISU PC, lapha ukusindisa umhlaba eyalonthswa naphambili emsebenzini kanye nezindleko kwalo, kwaba isihloko esishisayo yenyanga-BIT yaseTaipei ngo-2007.

Ukumaketha okuhluke kakhulu kodwa kwe-yelaptop kanye ne-consumer kwikhompyuter izoshintsha ngemva KOKUKHISHWA KWESISU uma kwenzeka i-corporate yomzimba-2007 I-Sustainable Yea Taiwan ' s Executive Yuan yaserepublic Of China.
I-ASUS Eee PC, eyalonthswa ngaphambilini emhlabeni jikelele ukonga izindleko nokusebenza kwayo, kwaba isihloko esishisayo enyangeni ye-IT yaseTaipei ngo-2007.

Kodwa ukukhangisa kwamakhasimende kwikhompyutha ye-laptop kuzohluka kakhulu futhi kushintshwe ngemuva kokuthi i-ASUS yanikezwa ku-2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award ngu-Executive Yuan weRiphabhlikhi yaseChina.

Kodwa ukuthengiswa kwabathengi kukhompyutha ephathekayo kuzohluka kakhulu futhi kuzoshintshwa ngemuva kokuthi i-ASUS inikezwe i-2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award yi-Executive Yuan yeRiphabhlikhi yaseChina.

Zombini i-cyanuric acid nemelamine zafunyanwa kwisampula zomchamo wezilwanyana ezife emveni kokutya ukutya kwezilwanyana okunethyefu.
Iikhompawundi ezimbini ziyadibana zenze izinto eziqaqambileyo anokuqanda umsebenzi wentso, batsho abaphandi bakule yunivesithi.
Abaphandi baqaphela iikristali ezenziwe kumchamo wekati ngokudibanisa i-melamine kunye ne-cyanuric acid.
Ukubumbeka kwezi kristali kufana noko kufunyanwa kumchamo wezilwanyane xa uthelekiswe ne-spectostrophy ye-infrared (FTIR).
Kokubili i-cynuric acid kanye ne-melamine zitholakele kumasampula omchamo ovela ezilwaneni ezifuywayo ezishne ngemva kokudla ukudla kwezilwane okungcolile.
Izakhi ezimbili ziyaxubana ukuze zenze amakristalu angavimba ukusebenza kwezinso, kwasho abacwabingi basenyuvesi.
Abacwaningi bathole ukuthi amakristalu enzeka emchamweni wekati ngokunezeleka kwe-milamine kanye ne-cyanuric acid.
Ukwakheka kwalamakristalu kufana nalokho okutholakale emchamweni wezilwane ezifuywayo ezithintekile uma uqhathaniswa nge-infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
Kokubili i-cyanuric acid ne-melamine kwatholakala kumasampula womchamo wezilwane owafa ngemuva kokudla ukudla kwezilwane okunomphongolo.
Lezi zinhlanganisela ezimbili ziyahlangana zenze izinto ezikhanyayo ezingavimbela umsebenzi wezinso, kusho abacwaningi baseyunivesithi.
Abaphenyi baqaphela amakristalu akhiwe emchameni wekati ngokuhlanganisa i-melamine ne-cyanuric acid.
Ukwakheka kwala makristalu kufana nokutholakala emchameni wezilwane uma kuqhathaniswa ne-infrared spectostrophy (FTIR).
Kokubili nemelamine cyanuric acid isampula etholwe emva kokudla isilwane ezifana nokudla zomchamo okunethyefu uyodla izithombo abasha.
Iziqaqambileyo Iikhompawundi zero izinto ezimbili lapha ziyadibana ukwenza umsebenzi wakho, futhi bathi yunivesithi kule uhlaka.
Bheka futhi benza uhlaka iikristali kate plus kumchamo we melamine kanye cyanuric acid.
I-kristali ubumbeko itholakala ekumchamo njengalezi lapho izilwanyane ziqhathaniswa ne-spectostrophy ye-infrared (FTIR).

I-Romanticism yayinento enkulu yokuchazwa kwenkcubeko, ethathwe kubabhali abanjengoGoethe, Fichte, noSchlegel.

Kwimeko yeRomaism, iJografi yabumba abantu, kwaye ngokuhamba kwexesha amasiko kunye nenkcubeko enxulumene naloo geografi yavela, kwaye nezi, ngokuhambelana nendawo yoluntu, zazingcono kunemithetho emiselweyo.
Ezothando zinomthelela omkhulu ezinkolelweni zokuziphatha zamasiko, okuthathelwa kubabhali abanjengoGoethe, uFichte, kanye noSchlegel.

Esizindeni seRomanticism, indawo ibumba abantu ngabanye, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi imikhuba nesiko ehlobene naleyo ndawo yavela, futhi lena, ivumelana nendawo yomphakathi, yayingcono kunemithetho emiswe ngokunganaki.
I-Romanticism yayinencazelo enkulu yamasiko, ethathwe kubalobi abanjengoGoethe, Fichte, noSchlegel.

Endabeni yamaRomaism, iJografi yabumba abantu, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kwavela amasiko namasiko ahlobene naleyo geography, futhi lokhu, ngokuhambisana nendawo yomphakathi, kwakungcono kunemithetho esungulwe.
The great yayinento yokuchaza Of Romanticism namasiko, umlobi ezintathu abajengogoethe, Fichte, noSchlegel.
Endabeni yeRomaism, yabumba ezindawo abantu, amasiko kanye namasiko futhi ngezikhathi eziphathelene ukuthi geografi uvele, futhi lezi, ngokuhambisana endaweni yomphakathi, imithetho ezizenzakalelayo.
I-Romanticism yayinento enkulu yokuchazwa kwamasiko, ethathwe kubabhali abanjengoGoethe, fichte, noSchlegel.

I-Romanticism yayinencazelo enkulu yamasiko, ethathwe kubalobi abanjengoGoethe, Fichte, noSchlegel.

Endabeni yobuRomaism, iJografi yabumba abantu, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi amasiko namasiko ahambisana naleyo geography, futhi lokhu, ngokuhambisana nomkhakha womphakathi, kwakungcono kunemithetho esunguliwe.

Esimweni seRomaism, iJografi yabumba abantu, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi amasiko namasiko ahlobene nalelo geografi yavela, futhi lezi, ngokuhambisana nendawo yomphakathi, zazingcono kunemithetho enqunyiwe.

Imuvi, ekudlala kuyo uRyan Gosling no-Emma Stone, iye yanconyelwa imbasa kuzo zonke iikhathegori eziyintloko.
UGosling kunye no-Stone batyunjwe ngengabadlali beqonga ababalaseleyo ngokulandelelana.

Amanye amagama atyunjiweyo abandakanya uMfanekiso oGqwesileyo, uMlawuli, iCinematografi, uyilo lweempahla, ukuhlelwa kwefilimu, Amanqaku oqobo, uyilo lweMveliso, ukuHlela kwesandi, ukuXuba isandi kunye nokuDlala ngokuQala.

IIngoma ezimbini zemuvi, iAudition (The Fools Who Dream) kunye neCity of Stars, zifumene ukunconywa ngeyona ngoma iphambili kweziyilwe ukususela ekuqaleni. iLionsgate studio ifumene uncomelo oluyi-26o - ngaphezulu kwayo nayiphi na enye studiyo.
Ifilimu, eno-Ryan Gosling noEmma Stone, ikhethelwe ukuwina kuzo zonke izigaba ezinkulu.
Ihansana kanye Netshe bakhethelwa ukuthola umklomelo Womdlali Nomdlalikazi Ohamba Phambili ngokulandelana.

Abanye abakhethiwe bahlanganisa neSithombe Esihle Kakhulu, Umqondisi Webhayisikobho, Umklami Wezimpahla, Umhleli-wefilimu, Umculo, Umklamo Womkhiqizo, Ukuhlelwa Komsindo, Ukuhlanganiswa Komsindo kanye Nombhalo weFilimu Wangempela.

Izingoma ezimbili ezivela kuyifilimu, Ukulalela (Iziphukuphuku Eziphuphayo) kanye neDolobha leziNkanyezi, zakhethwa ukuthi zithole umklomelo wengoma yangempela ehamba phambili. Isitshudiyo se-Lionsgate sikhethwe izikhathi ezingu-26 — ukudlula noma esiphi isitshudiyo.
Le ndoda, edlala kuyo uRyan Gosling no-Emma Stone, inikezwe umklomelo kuzo zonke izigaba eziyinhloko.
UGosling noStone baqokwe njengabadlali besiteji esihle ngokulandelana.

Abanye abaqokiwe bahlanganisa i-Best Image, uMqondisi, iCinematography, ukuklanywa kwezingubo, ukuhlelwa kwefilimu, ama-athikili wangempela, ukuklanywa komkhiqizo, ukuhlelwa komsindo, ukuxuba umsindo nokuqala.

Izingoma ezimbili zaleli klasi, i-Audition (The Fools Who Dream) neCity of Stars, zithole ukunconywa ngokuba yingoma ehamba phambili kunazo zonke ezake zaqanjwa. ILionsgate studio ithole izincomo ezingama-26o - ngaphezu kwanoma yisiphi esinye isudi.

Ngeli lixa iyeza elisalingwayo libonakala likucutha ukubulawa yiEbola,kude kube ngoku, akukho machiza abonakalise ekulungele ukunyanga usuleleko osele lukhona.
Elinye ichiza, iZMapp, belibonakala ngathi liyathembisa kuhlolo, kodwa uphononongo olusemthethweni lubonise ukuba beluneenzuzo ezimbalwa zokuthintela ukufa kunezo bezifunwa.
Kuvavanyo kwe PALM, ZMapp wasebenza njengesilawuli, into ethetha ukuthi ososayensi bayisebenzisa njenge siseko baze bayithelekisa nezinye ezintathu zamachiza.
Nakuba umjovo wokulinga ubonakala ukwazi ukunciphisa ukufa okubangelwa yi-Ebola, kuze kube manje, ayikho imithi eboniswe ngokucacile ukuthi ifanelekela ukulapha isifo esikhona.
I-cocktai eyodwa nje emzimbeni, ZMapp, ekuqaleni ibonakale ithembisa ensimini, kodwa ngokocwaningo kubonisa ukuthi inomthelela omncane kunalowo obucatshwangwa ekuvimbeleni ukufa.
Ekuhloleni kwe-PALM, i-ZMapp yasebenza njengesifaniso, okusho ukuthi ososayensi bayisebenzisa njengesiqalo sokuqhathanisa futhi baqhathanisa amanye amakhambi amathathu okwelapha nayo.
Ngenkathi umuthi wokuhlola ubonakala unciphisa ukubulawa kwe-Ebola, kuze kube manje, akukho mithi ekhonjisiwe ekwelapheni izidakamizwa ezikhona.
Omunye umuthi, iZMapp, ubonakale ethembisa ekuhloleni, kepha ucwaningo olusemthethweni lukhombisile ukuthi lunezinzuzo ezimbalwa zokuvimbela ukufa kunalezo ezidingekayo.
Ekuhlolweni kwe-PALM, i-ZMapp isebenza njengesilawuli, okusho ukuthi ososayensi bayisebenzisa njengesisekelo futhi bayiqhathanisa nezinye izidakamizwa ezintathu.
Kubonakala sengathi eza ngalesi sikhathi ukunciphisa elisalingwayo yiEbola wabulala, kuze kube manje, akukho remedy ukutheleleka usulungile ukunyanga umbono ukhona kakade.
Omunye remedy, iZMapp, thina liyathembisa ebonakalayo ukubuyekezwa, kodwa ukubuyekezwa sikhombisa ezimbalwa izinzuzo zomthetho ukuvimbela ukufa kwalabo kudingeka.
Testing A PALM, yena njengesilawuli ZMapp wasebenza, lokho umthethosisekelo kusho ukuthi bayithelekisa ososayeni bayisebenzisa nezinye imithi emithathu.
Ngalesi sikhathi umuthi osalingwayo ubonakala ucutha ukubulawa yi-Ebola,kuze kube manje, akukho mithi ekhombisile ekulungele ukwelapha usuleleko osele lukhona.
Elinye umuthi, iZMapp, belibonakala sengathi liyathembisa kunhlolokhono, kodwa ucwaningo olusemthethweni lukhombise ukuthi belunezinzuzo ezimbalwa zokuvimbela ukufa kunezo bezifunwa.
Ukuhlolwa kwe- PALM, ZMapp wasebenza njengesilawuli, okusho ukuthi ososayensi bayisebenzisa njengesizinda baze bayiqhathanisa namanye amakhemikhali amathathu.

Omunye umuthi, iZMapp, ubonakale ethembisa kuhlolo, kepha ucwaningo olusemthethweni lukhombisile ukuthi unezinzuzo ezimbalwa zokuvimbela ukufa kunalezo ezidingekayo.

Esinye isidakamizwa, iZMapp, belibukeka sengathi liyathembisa kuhlolo, kodwa ucwaningo olusemthethweni luveze ukuthi belunezinzuzo ezimbalwa zokuvimbela ukufa kunalezo bezifunwa.

Akukho silumkiso sikhutshiweyo, kwaye ngokwe-arhente yeJakarta geophysics , akukho silumkiso ngetsunami esiya kukhutshwa kuba inyikima ayihlangabezananga nemfuneko ye-6.5.
Ngaphandle kokuba kwakungekho sisongelo se-tsunami, abahlali baqala ukothuka kwaye baqala ukushiya amashishini kunye namakhaya abo.
Akukho isixwayiso sesiphepho esikhishiwe, futhi ngokusho kwesikhungo sezemvelo i-Jakarta, asikho isixwayiso sesiphepho esizokhishwa ngoba lokhu kuzamazama komhlaba akufinyelelanga ubukhulu buka-6.5.
Yize kwakungekho ukusabisa kwe-tsunami, kodwa abahlali baqala baba nokwethuka base beqala beshiya amakhaya abo nama bhizinisi abo.
Asikho isexwayiso esakhishwa, futhi ngokusho kweJakarta geophysics agency, akukho sixwayiso se-tsunami esizokhishwa ngoba ukuzamazama akuhlangabezananga nemfuneko engu-6.5.
Ngaphandle kokuthi kwakungekho usongo lwe-tsunami, izakhamizi zaqala ukwethuka futhi zaqala ukushiya amabhizinisi namakhaya azo.
Sikhushiwe akukho sixwayiso, futhi njengoba by-yejakarta geophysics agency, okuyinto kuyakuba ikhishwe akukho isixwayiso ngetsunami kwaba ayihlangabezananga kanye nesidingo 6.5.
Ngaphandle kwalapho kwakungekho nagoqo le-tsunami, bamangala futhi baqala izakhamuzi zaqala ukushiya imizi namabhizinisi azo.

Ukufika komhlaba kwe-D-Day kunye neemfazwe ezilandelayo zakhulula amantla eFrance, kodwa amazantsi ayengakhululekanga.
Yagwetywa ngama "Vichy" French. Aba yayingabantu baseFrance abenza uxolo Phakathi kwamaJamani ngo 1940 baze basebenza nabahlaseli endaweni yokubalwa.
Nge-15 ka-Agasti ngo-1940, izizwe Ezimanyeneyo zahlasela emzantsi we-France, kwiphulo elibizwa “Operation Dragoon.”
Kwiiveki nje ezimbini, amajoni aseMelika nawaseFransi ayesekhulule umzantsi Fransi ibe ayejonge eJamani.
Ukufika kwamabutho Ahlangene kanye nezimpi ezalandela zakhulula inyakatho yeFulansi, kodwa iningizimu yayingakakhululeki.
Yayibuswa amaFulentshi wase-“Vinchy”. Laba bekungabantu baseFulansi ababenze ukuthula neJalimane ngo-1940 futhi besebenzisana nabaphangi esikhundleni sokuthi balwe nabo.
Ngo-15 Agusti 1940, Izivunani zahlasela iningizimu France, futhi ukuhlasela kwabizwa “Umsebenzi Dragoon”.

Ukufika komhlaba we-D-Day nezimpi ezilandelayo kwakhulula inyakatho yeFrance, kepha iningizimu yayingenayo inkululeko.

Ngo-Agasti 15, 1940, iZizwe Ezihlangene zahlasela iFrance eseningizimu emkhankasweni obizwa nge-Operation Dragoon.

Zininzi iziphumo zokuhlala nezepolitiki njengosetyenziwa kwenkqubo ye-metric, utshintsho kwi-absolutism, ukuya kwi-republicanism ne-nationalism futhi nokholo lokuba ilizwe lelabantu balo hayi umphathi yedwa.
Kwaye emva kokuba umsebenzi weRevolution uvuleleke kubo bonke abafaki zicelo zokuvumela abona banamabhaso nabaphumeleleyo ukuba baphumelele.
Efanayo iya emkhosini kuba endaweni yemikhosi ukuba isekwe kwiklasi ngoku isekwe kwi-cailaber.
Uqhushululu lwaseFrance lukwakhuthaze nabanye abantu abaninzi abacinezelekileyo abasebenza kwamanye amazwe ukuba baqale ezabo iinguqu.

Kunemiphumela eminingi yezenhlalo neyezepolitiki efana nokusetshenziswa kohlelo lokulinganisa ngamamitha, ukusuka ekukholelweni ezimisweni eziphelele kuya ekusekeleni izimiso zoburiphabhuliki, ubuzwe kanye nenkolelo yokuthi izwe elabantu hhayi umbusi oyedwa.
Futhi ngemva kweNguquko izikhundla zazivulekele bonke abesilisa abafake izicelo okwavumela ukuthi abafuna ukuvelela kakhulu nokubahambela kahle baphumelele.
Lokhu kufana nalokhu okwenzeka kumabutho amasosha kunokuba babheke inhlanga yakho bona bakhetha ukubeka i-cailaber ukuze banike amasosha ama-ratings.
Ukuvukela kwaseFulansi kugqugquzele abanye abantu abasebenzayo abacindezelwe bakwamanye abazwe ukuthi baqale ukuvukela kwabo.

Kunemiphumela eminingi yokuhlala nezepolitiki njengokwenziwa kohlelo lwemethrikhi, izinguquko kwi-absolutism, ukuya kwi-republicanism ne-nationalism kanye nokholo lokuthi izwe lingabantu balo hhayi umphathi yedwa.
Futhi ngemuva kokuthi inqubo Yezinguquko ivulekele bonke abafakizicelo ukuvumela abawine imiklomelo engcono kakhulu ukuba baphumelele.
Efanayo iya ekamu ngoba esikhundleni samabutho ukuthi asungulwe ekilasini manje asungulwe ku-cailaber.
Izinga lokushushisa laseFrance likhuthaze nabanye abantu abaningi abacindezelekile abasebenza kwamanye amazwe ukuba baqale izinguquko zabo.
Imiphumela eminingi in njengosetyenziwa nezepolitiki of the metric, ushintsho kusuka absolutism, ukuze republicanism nobuzwe abantu kanye nezwe ukholo yedwa hhayi umphathi.
Futhi phela umsebenzi weRevolution uvuleleke ukufaka isicelo futhi uvumele ukuthi ukuba uchume nabaphumeleleyo amabhaso.
Esikhundleni sebawoti kuyakuba okufanayo ebuthweni manje esungulwe ukuthi kusekelwe ekilasini-cailaber.
LwaseFrance Uqhushululu ukugqugquzela umsebenzi abanye abantu abaningi kwamanye amazwe baqala abacinezelekileyo izinguquko zabo.

Ziningi imiphumela yokuhlala nezepolitiki njengosetshenzisiwe kohlelo lwe-metric, izinguquko ku-absolutism, kuya ku-republicanism ne-nationalism futhi nokholo lokuthi izwe lelabantu balo hhayi umphathi wodwa.
Futhi ngemuva kokuthi umsebenzi weRevolution uvuleleke kubo bonke abafaki bezicelo zokuvumela abona banemiklomelo nabanqobile ukuba baphumelele.
Efanayo iya empini ngoba esikhundleni semikhosi ukuthi isekwe ekilasini manje isekwe ku-cailaber.
Uqhushululu lwaseFrance lukwakhuthaze nabanye abantu abaningi abacindezelekile abasebenza kwamanye amazwe ukuba baqale ezabo izinguquko.

Iningi imiphumela yokuhlala nezepolitiki njengokufakwa kohlelo lwemethrikhi, izinguquko ku-absolutism, kuya ku-republicanism ne-nationalism kanye nokholo lokuthi izwe ngelabantu balo hhayi umphathi yedwa.
Futhi ngemva kokuba umsebenzi weRevolution uvulekele bonke abafakizicelo ukuvumela abawine imiklomelo emihle kakhulu ukuba baphumelele.
Fanayo iya embuthweni wezempi ngoba esikhundleni semikhosi ukuthi isekwe ekilasini manje isuselwa ku-cailaber.
Ukuvukela kwabantu baseFrance nakho kushukumise abantu abaningi ababecindezelwe ukuthi basebenzele ushintsho.

Ziningi imiphumela yokuhlala nezepolitiki njengosetshenziswa kohlelo lwe-metric, izinguquko ku-absolutism, kuya ku-republicanism ne-nationalism futhi nokukholwa ukuthi izwe labantu balo hhayi umphathi yedwa.
Futhi ngemva kokuba umsebenzi weRevolution uvuleleke kubo bonke abafaki izicelo zokuvumela abona banamaklomelo nabanqobile ukuba baphumelele.
Efanayo iya empini ngoba esikhundleni sezimpi ukuthi isethwe ekilasini manje isethwe kwi-cailaber.
Umqhudelwano waseFrance ukwakhuthaze nabanye abantu abaningi abacindezelekile abasebenza kwamanye amazwe ukuba baqale ezabo izinguquko.

Kunemiphumela eminingi kwezenhlalo nakwezombusazwe njengokufakwa kohlelo lwemethrikhi, ukudlulela ekubeni yi-absolutism, ekubuseni i-republicanism kanye nobuzwe kanye nenkolelo yokuthi izwe ngelabantu balo hhayi umbusi yedwa.
Futhi ngemuva kokuthi inqubo Yezinguquko ivulekele bonke abafakizicelo ukuvumela abawine imiklomelo emihle kakhulu ukuthi banqobe.
Okufanayo kuya emsebenzini wezempi ngoba esikhundleni senkonzo yezempi esungulwe ekilasini manje isuselwa ku-cailaber.
Ukuvukela kweFrance nakho kushukumise abantu abaningi ababecindezelwe ukuba basebenzele ushintsho.
Ukususela ngoko uAdekoya ebese-Edinburgh Sheriff Court etyholwa ngokubulala unyana wakhe.
Ubanjiwe kusamelwe ukutyholwa nesigwebo, kodwa ubungqina bamangqina ingaba bubonakele ngenxa yokusasazwa komfanekiso wakhe ngobubanzi.
Esi sisenzo esiqhelekileyo kwenye indawo e-UK kodwa ubulungisa baseScotland busebenza ngokwahlukileyo kwaye iinkundla zikubonile ukupapashwa kweefoto njengezinto ezinokuthi zithintele.
UProfesa Pamela Ferguson waseUniversity of Dundee ubhala esithi "iintatheli ziba sesichengeni ukuba zipapasha iifoto nezinye izinto zabarhanelwa."
I-Crown Office, ejongene nezotshutshiso, ixele intatheli ukuba akukho luphawu luphinde lwenziwe okungenani de kube kubekwa tyala.
u-Adekoya selokhu eseNkantolo ka-Sheriff yas-Edinburgh etheswe icala lokubulala indodana yakhe.
Uboshiwe njengoba esalinde ukubekwa nokuthethwa kwecala, kodwa noma ibuphi ubufakazi bofakazi bokuzibonela bungonakaliswa njengoba isithombe sakhe sishicilelwe kabanzi.
Lena inqubo evamile kwezinye izindawo e-UK kodwa umthetho waseScotland usebenza ngokuhlukile futhi izinkantolo zibone ukushicilelwa kwezithombe njengokungonakalisa.

Ibhola ekhatywayo yelizwe lase-Italiya, kunye neqela lesizwe lebhola laseburhulumenteni laseJamani liqela lesibini eliphumeleleyo kwihlabathi kwaye babengabaphumeleleyo kwiNdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola eKhatywayo ngo-2006

Imidlalo edumileyo ibandakanya ibhola ekhatywayo, ibhola yomnyazi, ibhola yevoli, ipolo yamanzi, ukubiyela, umbhoxo, ukukhwela ibhayisikile, ihoki yomkhenkce, ihoki yokugudla kunye nomdyarho weemoto weF1.
Eyasebusika imidlalo idumile kwiinginqgi zaseMantla, nama-Taliyani ekukhuphiswano lemidlalo yeHlabathi nemidlalo yee-Olympics.
Ibhola lezinyawo lezwe laseNtaliyane, kanye neqembu lebhola lezinyawo lezwe laseJalimane iqembu lesibili eliphumelele kakhulu emhlabeni futhi bekuyizingqwele zeNdebe yoMhlaba yeFIFA ngo-2006.

Imidlalo ethandwayo ihlanganisa ibhola lezinyawo, i-basketball, i-volleyball, ibhola lasemanzini, umngcweko, iragbhi, ukugibela amabhayisikili, ihoki yaseqhweni, ihoki evamile kanye nomncintiswano wezimoto zeF1.
Imidlalo yasebusika ithandwa kakhulu ezindaweni eziseNyakatho, lapho amaNtaliyane encintisana khona emidlalweni yamazwe onke kanye nasemidlalweni yama-Olimpiki.
Iqembu lebhola likanobhutshuzwayo lezwe lase-Italy, kanye neqembu lebhola likanobhutshuzwayo laseJalimane yiqembu lesibili eliphumelele emhlabeni futhi bebengabanqobi beNdebe Yomhlaba Yesoka ka-2006
Imidlalo edumile ifaka phakathi ibhola, ibhola lomnqakiswano, i-volleyball, ipolo yamanzi, ukubiyela, umbhoxo, ukugibela ibhayisikili, i-hockey yeqhwa, i-hockey kanye nomjaho wezimoto we-F1.
Imidlalo yasebusika iyathandwa eNyakatho Nenkabazwe, lapho amaNtaliyane ancintisana khona emidlalweni yomhlaba nemidlalo yama-Olympics.

Base Soccer yezwe-Italiya, futhi ibhola olusemthethweni iqembu lesizwe germany kanye nezwe in the legama lomnini ngokugcwele-abaqeqeshiwe iqembu lesibili cup world nge cube negative babengabaphumeleleyo yeBhola-2006
Edumileyo imidlalo zihlanganisa soccer, nebhola lomnqakiswano, ibhola yevoli, amaphoyisa amanzi, ubiyela, umbhoxo, ibhayisikile ride, ihoki yomkhenkce, futhi 1 yokugudla ihoki nomdyarho of the car.
Uid imidlalo Kwiinginqgi Eyasebusika enyakatho, kanye nezwe umdlalo taliyani umdwebo ukuncintisana kanye nezemidlalo-Olympics.
Ibhola lezinyawo lezwe lase-Italiya, neqembu lesizwe lebhola lasebuhulumeni laseJalimane liyiqembu lesibili eliwine umhlaba futhi babengabanqobi be-World Cup of Christian Cup ngo-2006

Imidlalo edume kakhulu ihlanganisa ibhola lezinyawo, ibhola lomnyazi, ibhola likavoli, ipolo yamanzi, ukubiyela, ipayipi, ukugibela ibhayisikili, isihoki seqhwa, isihoki sokugudla kanye nomdyarho wezimoto we-F1.
Eyasebusika imidlalo idumile ngezinqgi zaseNyakatho, namaTaliyani ekuncintisaneni imidlalo yeZwe nemidlalo yama-Olympics.
Iqembu lebhola lezinyawo likazwelonke lase-Italy, kanye neqembu lebhola likazwelonke laseJalimane lingamaqembu esibili aphumelele kakhulu emhlabeni futhi abawina iNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2006
Imidlalo edumile ibandakanya ibhola lezinyawo, i-netball, volleyball, ipolo yamanzi, uthango, umbhoxo, ukuhamba ngebhayisikili, iqhwa lomcibisholo, iHockey hockey nomjaho wezimoto we-F1.
Imidlalo yasebusika ithandwa eNyakatho Nenkabazwe, namaNtaliyane kumaWorld Championship nakuma-Olympics.

Ibhola elikhahlanyezwe yizwe lase-Italiya, kanye neqembu lesizwe lebhola lasebuhulumeni laseJalimane liyiqembu lesibili eliphumelele emhlabeni futhi lalingabaphumelele eNdebe yoMhlaba yeBhola eKhatshwayo ngo-2006

Imidlalo edumile ihilela ibhola elikhatshwayo, ibhola lomnyazi, ibhola lamavoli, ipolo lamanzi, ukubiyela, umbhoxo, ukugibela ibhayisikili, ihoki lomkhenkce, ihoki lokugudla kanye lomdyarho wezimoto weF1.
Eyasebusika imidlalo idumile ngezinginqgi zaseManyakatho, nama-Taliyani okuncintisana kwezemidlalo yoMhlaba nemidlalo yama-Olympics.
Iqembu lebhola lezinyawo likazwelonke lase-Italy, kanye neqembu lebhola likazwelonke laseJalimane angamaqembu esibili aphumelele kakhulu emhlabeni futhi abawina iNdebe Yomhlaba Yebhola lika-2006
Imidlalo edumile ibandakanya ibhola lezinyawo, i-netball, i-volleyball, i-polo yamanzi, uthango, umbhoxo, ukuhamba ngebhayisikili, i-hockey yeqhwa, iHockey hockey nomjaho wezimoto we-F1.
Imidlalo yasebusika ithandwa eNyakatho Nenkabazwe, namaNtaliyane kumaWorld Championship nakuma-Olimpiki.
UMuhammad wayenomdla kakhulu kwimicimbi engaphaya kobomi bemihla ngemihla. Wayehlala esiya emqolombeni owaziwa ngokuba ngu "Hira'" kwiNtaba yase "Noor" (ukukhanya) eyokucinga.

Ukuphumla phezu kweentaba ezisemantla e Mecca,umqolomba ulikheswa kwihlabathi liphela.
Ngapha koko, akukho lula tu ukufumanisa nokuba umntu ebesazi ukuba ikho. Nje ukuba ungene ngaphakathi emqolombeni,kukuba wedwa.
Akikho nto engabonwa ngaphandle kwamafu acwengileyo, amahle phezulu neentaba ezininzi ezirhangqileyo.Kuncinci okwelihlabathi okunobonakala okanye kuvakale ngaphakathi emqolobeni.
UMuhammad wayenesithakazelo esijulile ezindabeni zokuphila ezingaphathelene nezinto zalomhlaba. Wayevame ukuya emhumeni owaziwa ngokuthi “iHira” eNtabeni “yeNoor” (ukukhanya) ukuze ayozindla.
Umhume ngokwawo, obekhona kuze kube manje, unikeza isithombe esicacile sokuthambekela okungokomoya kukaMuhammad.
Umhume ohlezi phezu kwenye yezintaba zasenyakatho yase-Mecca, ukude kakhulu nomhlaba wonke.
Eqinisweni, akulula ukuyithola ngisho noma wazi ukuthi ikhona. Uma isingaphakathi emhumeni isuke isihlukaniswe ngokuphelele.
Akukho okubonakalayo phezulu ngaphandle kwesibhakabhaka esibalele, esihle kanye nezintaba eziningi ezizungezile. Kuncane kakhulu okwalelizwe okubonakalayo noma okuzwakalayo uma uphakathi emgedeni.
UMuhammad wayenesithakazelo esikhulu ezindabeni ezingaphezu kwenkambo yokuphila kwansuku zonke. Wayejwayele ukuya emhumeni owaziwa ngokuthi "Hira '" eNtabeni "Noor" (ukukukukhanya) ukuze acabange.

Ngaphandle kwe-iventi yangoLwesithathu, uCarpanedo wakhuphisana kwimidyarho yeeNtshatsheli.
Eyokuqala yakhe yayiSlalom, apho wafumana AWUGQIBANGA kumtyibilizo wakhe wokuqala. Abadlali abayi-36 kwabayi-116 nabo bafumana iziphumo ezifanayo kula mtyibilizi.

Olunye ugqatso lakhe, iGalant Slalom, yambona egqiba kwindawo yeshumi kwiqela labafazi elihleliyo kunye nexesha lokubaleka elidibeneyo le-4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 imizuzu ecothayo kunendawo yokuqala yokugqiba iAustria uClaudia Loesch kunye nemizuzu eyi-1: 09.02 kancinci kunendawo yesithoba Kugqitywe uGyöngyi Dani waseHungary.
Ii-skiers ezine kwiqela lamanina elihleliyo loyisakele ukugqibezela ithuba lalo, kwaye abayi 45 kwi 117 skiers kwi Giant Salom boyisiwe ukuphumelela kwimbaleko.
Ngale kwesehlakalo sangolwesithathu, uCarpanedo uncintisane emijahweni emibili ngayinye yobuShampeni.
Umncintiswano wakhe wokuqala bekuyi-Slalom, lapho Engaqedanga khona umncintiswano wakhe wokuqala. Abancintisanayo abangu-36 kwabangu-116 bathole imiphumela efanayo kulowo mncintiswano.

Omunye umjaho wakhe, i-Giant Slalom, waqeda engoweshumi eqenjini labesifazane elalihlezi nesikhathi esihlanganisiwe esingu-4:41.30, wayesemuva ngo-2:11.60 kuu-Austrian Claudia Loesch owathatha indawo yokuqala futhi wayesemuva ngo- 1:09.02 k-uGyöngyi Dani wase-Hungary owaqeda ekwindawo yesishiyagalolunye.
Abashushuluza eqhweni abane eqenjini labesifazane abahlezi bahluleke ukuqeda imijaho yabo, futhi abangu-45 kwabangu-117 abashushuluza eqhweni eSlalom eNkulu bahluleke ukuthola izikhundla emjahweni.
Ngaphandle kweventi ngoLwesithathu, uCarpanedo ubencintisana emgodini wezimoto.
Eyokuqala kwakunguSlalom, lapho atholwe khona esifundeni sakhe sokuqala. Abadlali abangama-36 kwabangu-116 nabo bathole imiphumela efanayo kulesi silayidi.

Omunye umgijimi wakhe, uGalant Slalom, umbone eqeda endaweni yesi-10 esigabeni sabesifazane ngesikhathi esihlanganisiwe esingu-4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 imizuzu ihamba kancane kunendawo yokuqala yase-Austria noClaudia Loesch nemizuzu engu-1: 09.02 engaphansi kwendawo yesishiyagalolunye Iqedelwe nguGyöngyi Dani waseHungary.
Abashushisi abane eqenjini labesifazane bahlulekile ukuqedela ithuba lawo, kanti abangu-45 kwabangu-117 abashushuluza eGiant Salom balahlekelwa umjaho.

YayiSlalom yakhe yokuqala, lapho wathola kumtyibilizo YAKHE YOKUQALA AWUGQIBANGA. Bathi player-kwabayi 36-116 mtyibilizi bathole impendulo efanayo kuzo.

Omunye uhlanga lwakhe, of iGalant, wabona iqembu labesifazane anqume elihleliyo endaweni emashumini kanye nesikhathi bagijima lokhu elidibeneyo-4: 41,30, 2: 11,60 ngamunye has kwasekuqaleni uClaudia kancane imizuzu kanye imizuzwana Loesch austria-1: 09,02 yesithoba uGyöngyi has a indawo kancane waseHungary Kuze Ukuxazululwa.
The skiers eqenjini ithuba uqede lezi loyisakele elihleliyo of the relief society, futhi ngeke 117 45 skiers in the boyisiwe kwimbaleko Of The Giant ukunqoba.
Ngaphandle kweiventi yangoLwesithathu, uCarpanedo wancintisana emidyarho yamaSosha.
Eyokuqala yakhe yayiSlalom, lapho wathola khona AWUQEDAnga emncintiswaneni wakhe wokuqala. Abadlali abangu-36 kwaba ngu-116 nabo bathola imiphumela efanayo kula ma-mtyibilizi.

Omunye ugqamuka lakhe, iGalant Slalom, yambona eqeda endaweni yeshumi eqenjini labesifazane elihleliyo kanye nesikhathi sokugijima esihlangene esingu-4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 imizuzu ecothayo kunendawo yokuqala yokuqeda i-Austria uClaudia Loesch nemizuzu engu-1: 09.02 kancane kunendawo yesishiyagalolunye Kuqede
Ama-skiers amane eqenjini lamanina elihleli yoyisakele ukuqedela ithuba lalo, kwathi abayi 45 ku 117 skiers ku Giant Salom boyisiwe ukunqoba umsubathi.
Ngaphandle kwendawo yesithathu, uCarpanedo ubencintisana kwiChampions League.
Ekuqaleni kwakhe kwakuyisikhathi eside, lapho uNkulunkulu eqala khona umsebenzi wakhe wokuqala. Abadlali abangu-36 kwabangu-116 nabo bathole imiphumela efanayo kulesi silayidi.

Omunye umgijimi wakhe, uGalant Slalom, umbone eqeda endaweni yesi-10 esigabeni sabesifazane ngesikhathi esihlanganisiwe esingu-4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 imizuzu kancane kunendawo yokuqala yase-Austria noClaudia Loesch nemizuzu engu-1: 09.02 engaphansi kwendawo yesishiyagalolunye kuqedwe uGyöngyi Dani waseHungary.

Ngaphandle kwe-iventi langoLwesithathu, uCarpanedo wancintisana emiqhudelwaneni yamaNtshatshezi.

Omunye umjaho wakhe, iGalant Slalom, wambona eqeda endaweni yeshumi eqenjini labesifazane elihlezi kanye nesikhathi sokubaleka okuhlangene kwe-4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 imizuzu ecothayo kunendawo yokuqala yokuqedela i-Austria uClaudia Loesch nemizuzu engu-1: 09.02 kancane kunendawo yesishiyagalolunye Kuqedwe u-Gyöngyi Dani waseHungary.
Ama-skiers amane eqenjini lamanina elihlezi anqobe ukuqedela ithuba lalo, kanti abayi 45 ku 117 skiers ku Giant Salom boyisiwe ukunqoba emdabeni.

Omunye umgijimi wakhe wesibili, uGalant Slalom, umbone eqeda endaweni yesi-10 esigabeni sabesifazane ngesikhathi esihlanganisiwe esingu-4: 41.30, 2: 11.60 imizuzu ihamba kancane kunendawo yokuqala yase-Austria noClaudia Loesch nemizuzu engu-1: 09.02 engaphansi kwendawo yesishiyagalolunye Kuqedwe nguGyöngyi Dani waseHungary.

Ibhombu enye yadubula ngaphandle kweofisi Yeruluneli Jikelele
Ezinye iibhombu ezintathu zaqhuma kufutshane nezakhiwo zikarhulumente kwisithuba seeyure ezimbini.
Ezinye iingxelo zibeka inani elisemthethweni lokufa kwabantu abasibhozo, kwaye iingxelo ezisemthethweni ziqinisekisa ukuba i-30 yenzakele; kodwa amanani okugqibela awaziwa.
Ibhomu eyodwa iqhume ngaphandle kwehhovisi likandunankulu.
Amabhomu amanye amathathu aqhumile eduze nezakhiwo zikahulumeni esikhathini samahora amabili.
Eminye imibiko ithi inani labafile elisemthethweni isishiyagalombili, futhi umbiko osemthethweni uqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abangaba ngu-30 balimele; kepha izinombolo zokugcina azikaziwa.
Ibhomu elilodwa lidubula ngaphandle kwehhovisi likaJeruluneli Jikelele
Amanye amabhomu amathathu aqhamuka eduze kwezakhiwo zikahulumeni kungakapheli amahora amabili.
Eminye imibiko ibeka inani elisemthethweni lokufa kwabantu abayisishiyagalombili, kanti imibiko esemthethweni iqinisekisa ukuthi bangu-30 abalimele; kodwa izibalo zokugcina azaziwa.
Omunye aphume ehhovisi Jikelele Yeruluneli Ibhomu yadubula
Ezenye izakhiwo zikahulumeni eseduze iibhombu zaqhuma ezintathu esikhaleni amahora amabili.
Eminye imibiko ibeka inani labantu ababulawa abayisishiyagalombili abangokomthetho, abasebenzayo futhi baqinisekise ukuthi imibiko yiyenzakele engu-30; kodwa izinombolo zokugcina zibizwa kanjalo.

Wakhuthuzwa zi-pirates, wahlaselwa eTibet yinja enomgada, wabaleka umtshato eNepal waya kubanjwa eIndiya.
Phakathi naloluhambo, u-Iwasaki wahlangabezana nezinkinga kaningi.
