Ehambhweni lakhe, u-Iwasaki wahlangana nezinkinga ezikhathini eziningi.
Wakhuthuzwa zi-pirates, wahlaselwa eTibet yinja enomgada, wabaleka umshado eNepal waya kubanjwa eNdiya.
Phakathi nohambo lwakhe, u-Iwasaki wahlangabezana nobunzima kaningi.
Wabanjwa inkunzi yizigebengu, wahlaselwa eTibet yinja enolaka, wabaleka emshadweni eNepal waboshwa eNdiya.
Kwamsinya emva kokuqhambuka kwengxwabangxwaba, iBritani yaqalisa ukuvala ulwandlwe lwaseJamani isebenzisa umkhosi waselwandle.
Icebo labonakala lisebenza, ukuqhawula inkxaso ebalulekileyo yamajoni nabazinzi, nangona olu thintelo lophula umthetho ekakuvunyelwene ngawo kwizivumelwano zehlabathi kwisenturi ezimbini ezadlulayo.
IBritani yombe amanzi amazwe ukuze inqande iinqanawe ukuba zingene kwiindawo zolwandle, isonzakalisa neenqanawa ezimsulwa.
Kuba kwakungekho impendulo inqabileyo kweli qhinga, iJamani yayilindele impendulo efanayo kumlo wayo waselwandle ongathintelwanga.
Ngokushesha ngemva kobutha, iBrithani yaqala ukuvimbezela iJalimane ngemikhumbi.

Isu libonakale lisebenza, ukususwa kwezinto ezidingwa ibutho lamasosha nabantu abavamile, nakuba lokhu kuvimbela kuphule imithetho yamazwe wonke elungiswe izivumelwano zamazwe amaningana wamakhulu amabili eminyaka adlule.
I-Britain imba amanzi ezwekazi ukuze ivimbele imikhumbi ukuthi ingene kuyo yonke ingxenye yolwandle, okubangela izingozi ngisho nasemikhunjini evamile.
Njengoba bekunokusabela okulinganiselwe kulendlela, iJalimane beyilindele ukusabela okufanayo empini yayo engavinjelwe yemikhumbi yangaphansi kwamanzi.
Ngokushesha ngemva kwempi, iBrithani yaqala ukuvala izilwandle zaseJalimane ngebutho lasolwandle.
Icebo labonakala lisebenza, linqamula ukusekelwa okubalulekile kwamasosha nabaningi, yize lokhu kuvinjelwe kwephula umthetho ovunyelwe ezivumelwaneni zomhlaba emakhulwini amabili edlule.
IBrithani yamanzi angaphandle ukuvimbela imikhumbi ukungena kolwandle, futhi iyalimaza nemikhumbi engenacala.
Ngoba kwakungekho impendulo engavamile kuleli qhinga, iJalimane lalilindele impendulo efanayo empini yalo yasolwandle engavinjelwe.
Emva ingxwabangxwaba Kwamsinya ukuqhambuka, iBritani ulwandle waqala ukusebenzisa ibutho olwandle eduze ejalimane.

Uhlelo luyasebenza futhi luyabonakala, amanabazinzi yamajoni abalulekile ukusekela, nakuba lokhu kwephulwa kwezivumelwano zokuvimbela umthetho wawo ekakuvunyelweene kwisenturi ezimbili zomhlaba izinyanga ezine zase zidlulile.
Yombe amanzi ukuvimbela imikhumbi amazwe IBritani basesimweni isikhundla phakathi kolwandle, umkhumbi isonzakalisa izandla ahlanzekile.
Ayikho impendulo e-strategic inqabileyo yalokhu, impendulo yakhe iyafana neyayilindele German ongathintelwanga ngasolwandle.
Kwamsinya ngemva kokuqhambuka kwengxwabangxwaba, iBrithani yaqalisa ukuvala ulwandlwe lwaseJalimane isebenzisa ibutho lasolwandle.

Iseluleko sabonakala sisebenza, ukuqhakambisa ukwesekwa okubalulekile kwamasosha nabazinzi, nakuba lolu thintelo lokwephula umthetho ekakuvunyelwene ngawo ezivumelwano zezwe kwisenturi emibili eyedlule.
IBrithani yombe amanzi amazwe ukuze inqande izinqanawe ukuba zingene ezindaweni zolwandle, isinkwa nemikhumbi emsulwa.
Ngoba kwakungekho impendulo eyigugu kuleli qhinga, iJalimane yayilindele impendulo efanayo emlotheni wayo wasolwandle ongavinjelwanga.
Ngokushesha ngemva kwempi, iBrithani yaqala ukuvala izilwandle zaseJalimane impi yasolwandle.

Leli cebo lalibonakala lisebenza, linqamula ukwesekwa okubalulekile kwezempi nezomphakathi, yize ukuvinjelwa kwephula isivumelwano esivumelwane ngezivumelwano zomhlaba wonke emakhulwini amabili edlule.
IBrithani yaminza amanzi ukuze ithande imikhumbi zingene olwandle, futhi yalimaza nemikhumbi engenacala.
Ngoba kwakungekho mpendulo eqondile kuleli qhinga, iJalimane yayilindele impendulo efanayo empini yayo yasolwandle engavinjelwe.
Kwamsinya ngemuva kokuqhamuka kwengxwaba, iBrithani yaqalisa ukuvala ulwandle lwaseJalimane lusebenzisa umkhosi wasolwandle.
Isu labonakala lisebenza, ukuqhuma ukwesekwa okubalulekile kwamasosha nabazinzi, yize lo mqhudelwano wephula umthetho ekuvunyelwene ngawo ezivumelwaneni zomhlaba kwisenturi ezimbili ezedlule.
IBrithani yombe amanzi amazwe ukuze inqande imikhumbi ukuba ingene ezindaweni zolwandle, isakaza nemikhumbi emsulwa.
Ngoba kwakungeyona impendulo enqabile kuleli qhinga, iJalimane yayilindele impendulo efanayo kumulo wayo waselwandle ongavinjelwa.
Ngokushesha ngemva kwempi, iBrithani yaqala ukuvala izilwandle zaseJalimane ngamabutho empi.

Icebo lalibonakala lisebenza, linqamula ukwesekwa okubalulekile kwezempi nezomphakathi, yize ukuvinjelwa kwephula isivumelwano esivumelwane ngezivumelwano zomhlaba wonke emakhulwini amabili eminyaka adlule.
IBrithani yaminza nezwe ukuvimbela imikhumbi ukungena olwandle, futhi yalimaza nemikhumbi engenacala.
Ngenxa yokuthi kwakungekho mpendulo ecacile kuleli su, iJalimane lalilindele impendulo efanayo empini yaso yasolwandle engavinjelwe.
Emva kokuba idama lakhiwe ngo-1963, izikhukula zamaxesha athile ezaziza kusasaza intlenga kuwo wonke umlambo zamiswa.
Ezi ngqimba bezifuneka ukuze kwenziwe iingqimba zesanti namalwandle aza kuba yindawo yokuhlala izilwanyana zasendle.
Ngenxa yoko, iintlobo ezimbini zeentlanzi ziye zaphela kumhlaba wonke, kwaye ezinye ezimbini zibe sengozini, kubandakanya ne-humpback chub.
Nangona izinga lamanzi liyakunyuka ukuya kutsho kancinane ezinyaweni emva kwezikhukhula, amagosa anethemba ayakonela ukubuyisela imigqaliselo yesanti ekhukhulisekileyo ngumsinga.
Ngemva kokuba kwakhiwe idamu ngo-1963, izikhukhula zenkathi ethile yonyaka ezazisabalalisa inzika emfuleni wonke zamiswa.
Lenzika beyidingeka ekwenzeni izindunduma zesihlabathi nezingu, ezisebenza njengendawo yokuhlala yezilwane zasendle.
Ngenxa yalokho, izinhlobo ezimbili zezinhlanzi zaqothulwa, futhi ezinye ezimbili zibe sengozini, kuhlanganise ne-humpback chub.
Nakuba izinga lamanzi lizokhuphuka kuphela amafidi ambalwa ngemva kwesikhukhula, iziphathimandla zithemba ukuthi lizokwanela ukuvuselela izindunduma zesihlabathi ezigugulekile ezansi nomfula.
Ngemuva kokuba idamu lakhiwe ngo-1963, kwaqubuka izikhukhula zezikhathi ezithile ezazizosakaza indlebe emfuleni wonke.
Lezi zingqimba zazidingeka ukwakha izindunduma zesihlabathi nolwandle oluzoba yindawo yokuhlala izilwane zasendle.
Ngenxa yalokho, izinhlobo ezimbili zezinhlanzi seziphelile emhlabeni wonke, kanti ezinye ezimbili sezisengozini, kufaka phakathi i-humpback chub.
Yize izinga lamanzi liyakhuphuka kuze kube kancane ezinyaweni ngemuva kwezikhukhula, izikhulu ezinethemba zinikeza ukubuyisela imifudlana yesihlabathi ekhukhumezayo ngesilinganiso.
Ngemva kokuba ichibi lakhiwe ngo-1963, futhi ukusakazwa kwezikhathi ezithile zezikhula intlenga kulo lonke umfula kwakuyilapho.
Lezi kudingeka ukuba kube ngqimba namalwandle iingqimba isihlabathi indawo izilwane kanye nezilwane zasendle.
Ngenxa yalesi sizathu, izinhlobo ezimbili izinhlanzi lapha emhlabeni wonke, kanti ezinye ezimbili zami basengozini, kuhlanganise futhi humpback chub.
Nakuba umthamo amanzi ngalo kancane emva kazwelonke izinyawo liyakunyuka, izikhulu banethemba ukubuyisela izimiso yesanti ekhukhulisekileyo ayakonela ngumsinga.
Ngemva kokuba idama lakhiwe ngo-1963, izikhukhula zezikhathi ezithile ezazizosakaza ukuhlenga kuwo wonke umfula zamiswa.
Lezi zingqimba bezidingeka ukuze kwenziwe izingqimba zesihlabathi nezilwandle ezizoba yindawo yokuhlala izilwane zasendle.
Ngenxa yalokho, izinhlobo ezimbili zezinhlanzi ziye zaphela kuwo wonke umhlaba, futhi ezinye ezimbili zibe sengozini, kufaka phakathi ne-humpback chub.
Nakuba izinga lamanzi liyakukhuphuka kuze kube kancane kancane ezinyaweni emva kwezikhukhula, izikhulu ezinethemba ziyakonela ukubuyisela imigqaliselo yesihlabathi esikhukhulisekile ngumsinga.
Ngemuva kokuba idamu lakhiwe ngo-1963, kwaqubuka amanzi ezikhukhula angahlakazeka indle kulo lonke umfula.
Lezi zingqimba zazidingeka ukwakha izindunduma zesihlabathi nolwandle oluzoba yindawo yokuhlala izilwane zasendle.
Ngakho-ke, izinhlobo ezimbili zezinhlanzi seziphelile emhlabeni wonke, futhi ezinye ezimbili sezisengozini, kuhlanganise ne-humpback Chub.
Yize izinga lamanzi lizokhuphuka lifike ezinyaweni ezimbalwa ngemuva kwezikhukhula, izikhulu ezinethemba zizokweneliseka ukubuyisa imifudlana yesihlabathi ekhukhulwe yisikhathi samanje.
Ngemva kokuba idama lakhiwe ngo-1963, izikhukhula zezikhathi ezithile ezazizosabalalisa inhlalakahle kuwo wonke umfula wamiswa.
Lezi zingqimba bezidingeka ukuze kwenziwe izintambo zesihlabathi nezilwandle ezizoba yindawo yokuhlala izilwane zasendle.
Ngenxa yalokho, izinhlobo ezimbili zezinhlanzi ziye zaphela emhlabeni wonke, futhi ezinye ezimbili zibe sengozini, kubandakanya ne-humpback chub.
Nakuba izinga lamanzi liyakhuphuka kuze kube kancane ezinyaweni ngemuva kwezikhukhula, izikhulu ezinethemba ziyakonela ukubuyisela imigqa yesihlabathi esikhukhulisekile ngumsinga.
Ngemuva kokuba idamu lakhiwe ngo-1963, kwaqubuka amanzi ezikhukhula angahlakazeka indle kulo lonke umfula.
Lezi zingqimba zazidingeka ukwakha izindunduma zesihlabathi nolwandle oluzoba yindawo yokuhlala izilwane zasendle.
Ngenxa yalokho, izinhlobo ezimbili zezinhlanzi seziphelile emhlabeni wonke, kanti ezinye ezimbili sezisengozini, kuhlanganise ne-humpback chub.
Yize izinga lamanzi lizokhuphuka lifike ezinyaweni ezimbalwa ngemuva kwezikhukhula, izikhulu ezinethemba zizokweneliseka ukubuyisa imifudlana yesihlabathi ekhukhulwe yisikhathi samanje.
Uqhwithela lweshumi oluthiywe njengeNkanyamba yeAtlantic, iStrokropical Jerry, luye lwayileka kuLwandle lweAtlantiki namhlanje.
i-National Hurricane Center (NHC) ithi xa kunje u-Jerry akayongozi kule ndawo.
Isiphepho seshumi esinikwe igama senkathi yeziPhepho zase-Atlantic, iSiphepho Sendawo Efudumele uJerry, saqala oLwandlekazini i-Atlantic namuhla.
INational Hurricane Center (NHC) ithi kulenkathi iJerry ingaba nosongo ezweni.
Isiphepho seshumi esiqanjwe nge-Atlantic Storm, iStrokropical Jerry, sesiwele i-Atlantic Sea namuhla.
INational Hurricane Center (NHC) ithi uma kunje uJerry akayena kule ndawo.
Ngengengenyamba oluthiywe yeshumi yeatlantic of the storm, Jerry iStrokropical, lwayileka uthola lweAtlantiki ulwandle namuhla.
The National Hurricane Center (NHC) wathi uma just-Jerry akayongozi kule ndawo.
Isiphepho seshumi esithiywe njengeNkanyamba ye-Atlantic, i-Strokropical Jerry, iye yayileka oLwandle lwase-Atlantiki namuhla.
iNational Hurricane Center (NHC) ithi uma kunje u-Jerry akayongozi kule ndawo.
Isiphepho seshumi esiqanjwe nge-Atlantic Storm, iStrokropical Jerry, sihlasele i-Atlantiki Ocean namuhla.
INational Hurricane Center (NHC) ithi uJerry akasilo usongo endaweni.
Isiphepho seshumi esizothiywe njengeNkanyamba ye-Atlantic, iStrokropical Jerry, sesiyimelekele oLwandle Lwase-Atlantiki Namuhla.
iNational Hurricane Center (NHC) ithi uma kunje u-Jerry akayona ingozi kule ndawo.
Isiphepho seshumi esiqanjwe nge-Atlantic Storm, iStrokropical Jerry, sesiwele i-Atlantic Ocean namuhla.
INational Hurricane Centre (NHC) ithi uJerry akasilo usongo endaweni.
IJapan ineziqithi ezikufuphi ku-7000 (eyona inkulu iyiHonshu),iyenze iJapan ibe sesona siqithi sikhulu ehlabathini.
Ngenxa yeziqhu zeziqithi enazo iJapan, ElaseJapani lidla ngokubizwa kwijiyografi njenge, "archipelago"
Ijapani ineziqhingi ezicishe zibe ngu-7000 (esikhulu kunazo zonke iHonshu), okwenza iJapani isiqhingi sesi-7 esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni!
Ngenxa yenqwaba/iqembu leziqhingi iJapani enazo, iJapani ivame ukubizwa ngokuthi, ngenxa yendawo ekuyo, njenge-"archipelago"
IJapan ineziqhingi eziseduze kuka-7000 (esikhulu kunazo zonke zaseHonshu), okwenza iJapan isiqhingi esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni.
Ngenxa yeziqhingi zaseJapan, eJapan kuvame ukubizwa ngejografi ngokuthi "i-archipelago"
Ingabe iziqhingi eduze japan futhi nje 7,000 (iyiHonshu esiphezulu), japan ingabe lesi siqhingi esikhulu emhlabeni.
Ngenxa yalesi siqhingi saseyeziqhu sasejapane, ngokuvamile lokhu kubizwa Ngokuthi i-ElaseJapani kwijiyografi, "leziqhingi"
IJapane ineziqhingi eziseduze ne-7000 (enkulu kunazo zonke iyiHonshu),iyenze iJapane ibe sesona siqhingi esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni.
Ngenxa yeziqhumane zeziqhingi enazo zaseJapane, ElaseJapane livame ukubizwa ngokuthi ijiyografi njenge, "archipelago"
IJapan ineziqhingi ezicishe zibe ngu-7000 (esikhulu kunazo zonke okuyiHonshu), okwenza iJapane isiqhingi esikhulu kakhulu emhlabeni.
Ngenxa yeziqhingi iJapan, iJapane kuvame ukubizwa ngejografi "njenge-archipelago"
IJapan ineziqhingi eziseduze kuka-7000 (okuyinhloko iyiHonshu),iyenze iJapan ibe sesiyiqhingi esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni.
Ngenxa yeziqhumane zeziqhingi enazo iJapan, ElaseJapani ngokuvamile ibizwa ejiyografi njenge, "archipelago"
IJapan ineziqhingi ezicishe zibe ngu-7 000 (esikhulu kunazo zonke okuyiHonshu), okwenza iJapane isiqhingi esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni.
Ngenxa yeziqhingi iJapan enayo, iJapane kuvame ukubizwa ngejografi "njengeziqhingi".
I-China yakudala yayinendlela eyahlukileyo yokubonisa amaxesha ahlukeneyo; Inqanaba ngalinye lase China okanye usapho ngalunye olwalusemagunyeni lwaluludidi olwahlukileyo.

Kwakhona phakathi kobukumkani ngabunye kwakukho iminyaka engazinzanga yamaphondo ohlukeneyo. Elona laziwa kakhulu kula maxesha yayilixesha leThree Kingdoms epoch elenzeka iminyaka engama-60 phakathi kweHan neJin Dynasty.
Ngalamathuba imfazwe embi yayiqhubeka phakathi kwabasebukhosini belwela itrone.
Ixesha leThree Kingdoms lelona kwabulawa abantu abaninzi ngalo kwimbali yeTshayina Yakudala, abantu abaninzi bafa belelwa ukuhlala kwesona sihlalo siphakamileyo kwibhotwe eliphezulu eXi’an.
IShayina yamandulo yayinendlela ehlukile yokuveza izinkathi ezihlukile; isigaba ngasinye seShayina noma umndeni ngamunye owawubusa wawuwubukhosi obuhlukile.

Futhi phakathi kobukhosi ngabunye kwakuyiminyaka engazinzile yezifundazwe ezihlukene. Inkathi eyaziwa kakhulu kulezi kwakuyinkathi yemibuso emithathu eyenzeka iminyaka engama-60 phakathi koMbusokaHan noJin.
Phakathi nalesi sikhathi kwakuba nezimpi ezinodlame phakathi kwababusi belwela ubukhosi.

IMibuso Emithathu kwakungenye yenkathi yegazi eliningi kunazo zonke emlandweni waseShayina yakuDala, izinkulungwane zabantu zafa zilwela ukuhlala esihlalweni esiphakeme kakhulu esigodlweni esihle e-Xi’an.
I-China yasendulo yayinendlela ehlukile yokukhombisa izikhathi ezahlukahlukene; Izinga ngalinye laseChina noma umndeni ngamunye emandleni laliyisigaba esihlukile.

Futhi phakathi kombuso ngamunye kwakuyiminyaka engazinzile yezifundazwe ezahlukahlukene. Isikhathi esidume kakhulu kwakuyisikhathi seNkathi Yemibuso Emithathu eyenzeka eminyakeni engama-60 phakathi kukaHan noJin Dynasty.
Ngalesi sikhathi kwakukhona impi embi phakathi kwabasebukhosini besihlalo sobukhosi.
Isikhathi semibuso emithathu kwakuyisikhathi esabulawa kakhulu emlandweni weChina endala, abantu abaningi bafa belwela isihlalo esiphakeme kunazo zonke esigodlweni saseXi’an.
China yayinendlela ukubonisa izikhathi ezahlukene ezahlukene ubudala; umndeni ngamunye Noma Ngalinye Level kuyinto lwaluludidi ezahlukene olwalusemagunyeni base China.

Again umbuso izifundazwe futhi akukho ngabanye engazinzanga phakathi kweminyaka ehlukene. Lesi kwakuyisikhathi esibucayi emibusweni kapa eyaziwa kwenkathi leThree okuningi senziwa eminyakeni 60 phakathi kweHan neJin Dynasty.
Impi phakathi ezimbili amathuba elwa yayiqhubeka kwabasebukhosini sobukhosi.
Imibuso yisikhathi kakhulu leThree abantu abaningi babulawa ngesikhathi yeTshayina yomlando Elidala, abantu abaningi bahlale elele ukufa esigodlweni usihlalo anne eXi ' siphakamileyo high.
I-China yakudala yayinendlela ehlukile yokubonisa izikhathi ezahlukene; Izinga ngalinye lase China noma umndeni ngamunye oneziphathimandla zalolu hlobo oluhlukile.

Futhi phakathi kombuso ngamunye kwakukhona iminyaka engazinzanga yezifundazwe ezihlukahlukene. Lona waziwa kakhulu kulezi zikhathi kwakuyisikhathi seThree Kingdoms epoch elenzeka iminyaka engu-60 phakathi kweHan neJin Dynasty.
Ngalamathuba impi embi yayiqhubeka phakathi kwabasebukhosini belwela isihlalo sobukhosi.
Isikhathi se-Three Kingdoms lesona kwabulawa abantu abaningi ngalo emlandweni weChina Yakudala, abantu abaningi bafa belelwa ukuhlala kwesona sihlalo siphakeme esigodlweni esiphezulu eXi'an.
I-China yakudala yayinendlela ehlukile yokukhombisa izikhathi ezahlukahlukene; Izinga ngalinye laseChina noma umndeni ngamunye ophethe kwakuyisigaba esihlukile.

Futhi phakathi kombuso ngamunye kwakuyiminyaka engazinzile yezifundazwe ezahlukahlukene. Okwaziwa kakhulu kulezi zikhathi kwakuyisikhathi seNkathi Yemibuso Emithathu eyenzeka eminyakeni engama-60 phakathi kweHan neJin.
Ngalamathuba impi embi yayiqhubeka phakathi kwabasebukhosini belwela isihlalo sobukhosi.
Isikhathi semibuso emithathu kwakuyisikhathi esabulala kakhulu emlandweni weChina akudala, abantu abaningi bafa ukuhlala esihlalweni esiphezulu esigodlweni saseXi'an.
I-China yakudala yayinendlela ehlukile yokukhomba izikhathi ezehlukene; Izinga ngalinye lase China noma umndeni ngamunye owawuyiziphathimandla lwaluyizigaba ezihlukile.

Ibuye ibe phakathi kombuso ngabunye kwakukhona iminyaka engazinzanga yezifundazwe ezihlukahlukene. Isaziwa kakhulu kulezi zikhathi kwakuyisikhathi seThree Kingdoms epoch elenzeka iminyaka engu-60 phakathi kweHan neJin Dynasty.
Ngalamathuba impi embi yayiqhubeka phakathi kwabasebukhosini belwela isihlalo sobukhosi.
Isikhathi seThree Kingdoms leso kwabulawa abantu abanengi ngalo emlandweni weChina Yakudala, abantu abanengi bafa belelwa ukuhlala kwesona sihlalo esiphezulu ebhodweni eliphezulu eXi’an.
I-China yasendulo yayinendlela ehlukile yokukhombisa izikhathi ezahlukahlukene; Izinga ngalinye laseChina noma umndeni ngamunye emandleni laliyisigaba esihlukile.

Futhi embusweni ngamunye kwakuyiminyaka engazinzile yezifundazwe ezahlukahlukene. Isikhathi esidume kunazo zonke kwakuyisikhathi seNkathi Yemibuso Emithathu eyenzeka eminyakeni engama-60 phakathi kobuKhosi bukaHan noJin.
Ngalesi sikhathi kwaqubuka impi embi phakathi kwababusi besihlalo sobukhosi.
Isikhathi semibuso emithathu kwakuyisikhathi esabulala kakhulu emlandweni weChina yasendulo, lapho abantu abaningi babefa belwela isihlalo esiphezulu esigodlweni saseXi’an.
